K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-2: gal te tsha ba'i dus yin na bzhin bzang je dpong sa'i khang par zhugs shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-13: gal te de 'di skad ces bdag sen mo mi 'dri'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-17: dge slong des phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te 'du byed thams cad bdag med pa yid la byas nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-19: kha na ba dang khas sman 'dzin pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-20: las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-22: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-0: dge slong @10b dag da ltar du ma zad kyi 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi ngag mi nyan nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-5: da nas dus gzhan zhig na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-7: ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-8: grogs po kho bo cag gnyis ni rdzing gzhan du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-10: grogs po gnyis kho bo yang khrid de song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-11: ngang pa gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-12: khyod ji ltar khrid de 'gro bar bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-15: khyed gnyis kyis rtse mo gnyis nas bzung la deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-16: ngang pa gnyis kyis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-18: kho bo cag gnyis khyer te mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-21: ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal de khyer te steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas ji tsam na ri brags shig gi steng na phar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-22: khye'u dang bu mo dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:10b-24: ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal zhig khyer te song ngo zhes zer ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-1: sbal des kyang dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-2: de nas ri brags gzhan zhig gi steng na phar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-3: yang khye'u dang bu mo dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-5: ngang pa gnyis kyis rus sbal zhig khyer te song ngo zhes zer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-7: bdag gis yun ji srid du mtho 'tsham pa mnags par bya snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-8: ngang pa gnyis kyis kho bo khyer ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar kho bo rang 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-9: shing shor nas de sa la lhung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-10: de dag gis bzung nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-11: lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-12: mdza' bshes phan par 'dod rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-13: smras pa gang zhig mi 'dzin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-14: rus sbal gyis ni shing btang ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-15: de ni lhung zhing las par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-16: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ngang pa ches rgan pa cig shos gang yin pa de ni nga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na ngang pa cig shos gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11a-18: de'i tshe de'i dus na rus sbal gang yin pa de ni 'dun pa 'di yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-0: @11b bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i ltung byed de bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-2: de'i tshe na khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-3: bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-4: bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-7: nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-8: lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-9: nad pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-10: gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-11: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-12: don 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-13: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar bzhed pas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-14: bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:11b-16: gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:12a-3: gol bar gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:12a-4: khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang zhig ga la ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:12a-5: de'i tshe na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gnas mal rab tu mang po dag bla gab med par bzhag cing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-9: de dag de na mtshan thog thag bla gab med par lhags pas nyen par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-10: de dag nang par sngar langs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-16: kho bos khyed cag na ba rnams kyi nad g-yog bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-17: slob dpon khyod kyis bdag cag mi na ba yang na bar byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-18: na ba rnams kyi nad g-yog byas re skan zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-19: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-20: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-22: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-24: bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag lhags pas mtho btsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40a-25: ci'i phyir de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-0: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge @40b 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-5: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-8: 'char ka khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-11: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-13: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-15: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-16: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-17: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:40b-18: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-0: yang dge slong gang khres 'khrugs rngam @41a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-2: yi ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod dam skrod du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-4: mnyan yod na sa'i gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa de na dge slong nad pa zhig 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-5: ji tsam na sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-6: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-7: tshe dang ldan pa sprin kha dog lnga 'dus pas gtsug lag khang rdib par 'gyur srid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-9: kho bo rang 'byung mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-10: dge slong rnams 'gyod pas bsam phyung nas char bab ste gtsug lag khang rdibs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-11: des dge slong de non te dus la bab pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-13: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-14: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-15: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-17: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41a-18: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-0: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab @41b pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-1: yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod dam skrod du 'jud na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-2: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-3: 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-4: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-5: khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-6: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-7: gtsug lag khang nas zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-10: nyal ba dag byar rung ba nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-11: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-12: skrod dam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-13: skrod du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-14: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-15: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-19: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-22: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-23: des ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-24: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:41b-25: dge slong gis ji tsam du khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-0: yi ma rangs nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas dge slong skrod @42a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-1: dam skrod du 'jud na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-3: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-4: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-5: skrod pa'i ltung byed de bcu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-7: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-8: ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-9: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-10: rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-11: khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-14: kha ton dang rnal 'byor dang yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o zhes spro bar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-15: de dag gis slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-16: mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42a-20: mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du de bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-0: de dang lhan cig ljongs @42b rgyur 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-1: 'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-2: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-4: gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog bur 'dug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-6: des de dag la la la gtur pu gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-7: la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-8: la la la bar bur gyi snod gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-9: la la la phor bu gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-10: la la la ril ba spyi blugs gtad nas de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-11: rdul zan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 'gro ba na de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-12: de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-13: de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gand'i brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-14: de dag gis thos nas smras pa; slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gand'i brdungs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-17: lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gand'i brdungs shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-18: slob dpon rnyed pa'i gand'i brdungs pa ma lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-19: de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-20: slob dpon ni grags pa bsod nams che ba lags pas 'thob kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:42b-22: deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-0: de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi @43a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-1: gand'i brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-2: tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-4: bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-8: de dag gis gnas mal mnos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-9: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-20: de dag gis kyang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-21: slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-22: de dag gis gcig la gcig zhus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-23: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mal bshams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-24: rkang pa'i chu dang rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-25: rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas me khang du zhugs te nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-26: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-27: gang gi tshe 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-28: mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lhag khang du 'ongs te tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-29: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43a-30: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-0: @43b 'di na kho bo'i gzhon nu dag cig 'khod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-1: de dag las 'ga' zhig na bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-2: de dag gis de thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-4: gnas khang 'o nir gzims mal bshams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-5: zhabs kyi chab dang zhabs bsku ba yang bzhag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-8: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis su la zhus te rkang pa dag bkrus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-9: slob dpon yun ring du thogs par gyur nas gcig la gcig zhus te sug pa dag bkrus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-11: kho bo khyed dang lhan cig bya ba cung zhig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-13: de dag gis sgom phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-14: des spyos te sgo glegs la rdog pas brdabs nas des me khang thams cad 'gul bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-15: de dag skrag nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-16: 'di stobs dang ldan pa yin pas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang brdib par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-18: de dag gis sgo phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-19: de nang du zhugs nas de dag gi dbus bsgyel te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-20: des de dag kha cig la ni gru mos bsnun /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-21: kha cig la ni pus mos bsnun nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-22: slob dpon bdag cag snad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-25: su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:43b-26: de dag gis gcig la gcig smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-0: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni stobs dang ldan pa yin pas 'dis bdag cag thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta @44a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-2: phyir 'byung bar bya'o zhes de dag phyir byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-3: de dag de na mtshan thog thag bla gab med pa na lhags pas nyen par gyur to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-4: de dag nang par sngar langs te smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-12: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-13: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-15: ji lta bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-17: bdag cag slob dpon 'char kas mtshan thog thag lhags pas mtho btsams so; ;ci'i phyir de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-18: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-19: stan la nyal ba dang 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-0: gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge @44b 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-3: 'char ka khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-6: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-8: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-10: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:44b-12: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar 'don par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-0: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du @45a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-2: phyis gnon byas nas stan la nyal lam 'dug na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-3: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-4: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-5: gtsug lag khang na zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-8: nyal ba dag byar rung ba na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-9: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-10: snga na 'khod pa zhes bya ba ni snga na gnas par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-11: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang gis rig par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-12: gzhan dag gis bstan pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-13: phyis 'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu 'ongs nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-14: su la gnod pa zhes bya ba ni su bde ba la reg par mi 'gyur ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-15: de 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-16: de de nas gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-17: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-18: phyis gnon byas nas zhes bya ba ni gnod pas zil gyis mnan nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-19: stan la zhes bya ba ni gnas mal la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-20: nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-21: 'dug na zhes bya ba ni rkub tshos bzhag na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-22: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45a-25: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-2: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-5: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-6: dge slong gis ji tsam du cung zad dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge slong dag snga na 'khod par shes bzhin du phyis 'ongs nas su la gnod pa de 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyid rkyen du byas te phyis gnon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-7: stan la nyal lam 'dug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-9: ngan dang gsod dang grang dro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-10: chol zangs dang ni bkru sman dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-11: rnal 'byor mthun dang kha ton dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-14: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dge slong gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-15: ljongs rgyur 'dong dang der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-16: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-17: rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya zhing khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-18: dra ba dang phor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-19: ska rags dang lung dpog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:45b-23: yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-2: de dag gis slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-3: mkhan po bdag cag ljongs rgyur mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas khyed la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-7: mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka ni bdag cag gi pha ma lta bur rnam par gnas pa lags pas ci'i slad du bdag cag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur zhes de dag gis de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-8: 'char kas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-9: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i phyir gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyur 'dong bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-11: gnas chos shig ces des de dag mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste gnas 'char bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-12: des de dag la la la gtur bu gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-13: la la la lhung bzed kyi snod gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-14: la la la bar pur snod gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-15: la la la phor bu gtad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-16: la la la ril pa spyi blugs gtad nas de lag pa gnyis brkyang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46a-17: rdul zan las gzhan med par 'jig rten la mtho 'tsham zhing 'gro ba na de dag ri brags shig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-0: de dag der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gand'i brdungs pa @46b dang de dag gis thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-1: slob dpon gtsug lag khang du gand'i brdungs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-4: lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gand'i brdungs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-5: bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-6: slob dpon rnyed pa'i gand'i ma lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-7: de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-8: slob dpon ni grags pa dang bsod nams che ba lags pas 'thob kyi bdag cag la sus stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-9: deng la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-10: de dag dong pa dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gand'i brdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-12: tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal nos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-14: bdag cag las ches rgan pa yang yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-18: de dag gis gnas mal mnos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-19: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-28: ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:46b-29: de dag gis kyang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:47a-0: slob dpon 'char ka yun ring du thogs par @47a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-9: sgo khang them skas kyi gzhi dang khyams dang dpong sa'i khang pa dang me khang dang bkad sa'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-12: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-13: phyis gnon gyi ltung byed de bcu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-15: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-17: der bdag cag gis rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:59b-18: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-2: khyed cag kyang lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-11: yid la bya bas brel ba med par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-12: khyed cag na ba dag gi nad g-yog kyang bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-13: zhes spro bar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-14: de gang gi tshe na dge slong rnams 'di gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'ga' yang de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-15: bsod snyoms pa zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-16: btsun pa nye dga' kho bo cag khyod dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-17: dge slong rnams kyis bsod snyoms pa de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-19: de ni gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas khyod la mtho mtsham par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-21: kho bo ni lo 'das pa yin pas kho bo de la gnas bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-26: yid la bya ba'i rag lus pa cung zad kyang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-27: des kho bo la ci byar yod ces des dge slong de dag gi tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-28: nye dgas gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi mtshams 'das pa de'i tshe na smras pa; bsod snyoms pa gtur bu 'di re zhig khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-29: btsun pa nye dga' ci khyod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60a-33: yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-0: nye dgas smras @60b pa; bsod snyoms pa khyod re zhig mi khyer ba ni yus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-1: ci khyod kho bo bas kyang mkhas pa yin snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-2: ci na khyod kho bo la de skad zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-4: mkhas pa ma yin yang rigs pa tsam smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-6: bsod snyoms pa 'di mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas de gnyis mthar gyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-7: de gnyis ri brags shig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-8: de gnyis der khron pa zhig gi drung du ngal so bar byed pa na de na ri brags kyi gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der gand'i brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-9: bsod snyoms pa des thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-10: btsun pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang du gand'i brdungs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-13: bsod snyoms pa lhung bzed nag po can las med pa dag gis las kyi gand'i brdungs shing bdag cag ngal ba dag gis las bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-14: btsun pa nye dga' rnyed pa'i gand'i ma yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-15: bsod snyoms pa de yin na bdag cag mtshams su phyin na 'thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-16: btsun pa nye dga' ni grags pa bsod nams che ba yin pas 'thob kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-18: bsod snyoms pa song la gal te rnyed pa yod na kho bo'i yang nos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-19: de song ba dang ji tsam na der gnas mal gyi gand'i brdungs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-20: bsod snyoms pa gnas mal nos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:60b-22: kho bo las ches rgan pa yang yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-1: so; ;tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' yang de na 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-10: ma he 'di dag su'i zhes 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-11: bsod snyoms pas kyang bsams pa; btsun pa nye dga' yun ring du thogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-12: des khang thog tu de'i mal bshams nas rkang pa'i chu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-13: rkang pa bsku ba mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-14: gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas 'og khang du mal bshams par zhugs te nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-15: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' yang ji srid du de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla yod pa de srid du 'dug 'dug nas gang gi tshe de'i 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi zla med pa de'i tshe na mig lam chad pa'i dus kyi tshe gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-16: bsod snyoms pa bsod snyoms pa zhes bod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-17: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-18: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'dam bu thibs po'i gseb tu zhugs pa bzhin du ci 'bod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-20: 'di na kho bo'i grogs po bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-21: de na bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-22: bsod snyoms pas de thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-23: btsun pa nye dga' ma 'bod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61a-24: kho bos khyod kyi mal khang thog tu bshams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-0: rkang pa'i chu dang rkang pa bsku ba yang mtha' @61b gcig tu bzhag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-3: bsod snyoms pa 'tham pa cung zhig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-5: btsun pa nye dga' kho bo chad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-7: bsod snyoms pa kho bo khyod dang ji srid mtshan thog thag zad par 'gyur ba de srid du 'tham par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-8: btsun pa nye dga' kho bo chad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-10: nye dga' khang thog tu 'dzegs nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te gnas khang du zhugs nas bsod snyoms pa zhes bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-12: btsun pa nye dga' ci zer zhes byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-13: nye dga' sgra la mkhas pas des bsod snyoms pa'i dpral ba'i thad kar khri rkang gtad de ci nas kyang khri rkang gis khang thog brtol nas bsod snyoms pa de'i dpral bar 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar shugs drag pos mnan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-14: des bsod snyoms pa de'i dpral bar phog ste dpral ba gzhom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-16: btsun pa nye dga' kho bo snad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-18: kva'i bsod snyoms pa ci zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-20: gal te skad phyung na 'dis rgan rims kyis bdag gi khri yang phrogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-21: de nang par sngar langs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-22: btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-26: bsod snyoms pa sdod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:61b-27: kho bos khyod na ba'i nad g-yog bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-0: btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis kho bo mi na ba yang na bar byas pas na ba'i nad g-yog byas re skan @62a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-1: zhes de mnyan yod du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-2: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-3: tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms pa 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-5: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-7: btsun pa nye dgas bdag cag gi dpral ba bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-9: des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-10: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-15: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62a-18: nye dga' khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma @62b yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-1: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-3: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-5: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-6: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-7: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-8: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug gam nyal na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-9: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' ma gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-10: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-12: gtsug lag khang gi zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-15: nyal ba dag byar rung bar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-16: steng gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni khang steng gi nam mkha' la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-17: thog bor bar zhes bya ba ni rtsva'i thog gam lo ma'i thog bor bar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-18: khri zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-19: khri'u zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-20: rtsa ba 'byung ba la zhes bya ba ni rkang pa 'byung ba la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:62b-21: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-2: ljid kyis phab ste zhes bya ba ni mthus mnan te'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-3: 'dug gam zhes bya ba ni rkub tshos 'jog par byed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-4: nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-5: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-6: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-9: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-10: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-11: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-12: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du ljid kyis phab ste 'dug gam nyal na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-13: spang leb kyis g-yogs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-15: shing leb kyis g-yogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-16: shing leb 'bur can gyis g-yogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-17: byin gyis gzhol ba la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-19: bkan pa byas pa la yang ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63a-21: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-3: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-7: kho bo la 'ga' zhig gis bgrangs te gtad dam ci /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-9: lho dang nub dang byang gi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong na ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-12: lteng ka dag tu 'dong na ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-13: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chus rtsva dang lci ba dang sa la 'debs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-14: 'debs su 'jug par byed ces smod par byed /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:63b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa la rmas pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-2: legs par bsgo ba gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-3: des na kho bo la 'gog par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-4: bram zes sgo ba bkug ste legs par bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-5: kva'e nang rje khyim 'di 'phags pa 'dun pa'i yin gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-10: bram ze 'di ni mngon par dad par gyur na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-22: lhung bzed nag po can gzhan 'jug par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69a-23: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa yid bde ba skyes te song nas dus dang dus su bram ze de'i khyim du 'gro bar byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69b-15: btsun pa bdag la kar sha pa ni mchis na bsod nams kyi grogs ma mchis so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69b-18: khyim bdag de gtsug lag khang du song ste rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:69b-21: 'phags pa 'dun pa 'di bdag gi gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83a-12: 'di la don ni 'di yin par blta bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83a-13: sring mo dag ba lang zhes bya ba de ni lus gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83a-14: pha ma'i mi gtsang ba mer mer po las byung ba 'bras chan dang zan dron gyis nye bar bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83a-19: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83a-20: nang gi sha'i tshogs zhes bya ba de ni nang gi skye mched drug po dag gi tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83a-21: phyi rol gyi pags pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba de ni phyi rol gyi skye mched drug po dag gi tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-0: bar gyi chu rgyus dang bar gyi glo ba dang @83b bar gyi mchin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-1: bar gyi rtsa rgyun zhes bya ba de ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-3: ba lang gsod pa'i slob ma mkhas pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-4: gri zhes bya ba de ni shes rab kyi mtshon gyi tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-5: sring mo dag 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pas shes rab kyi mtshon gyis kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-8: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-9: kun nas dkris pa thams cad kun tu gcod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-12: kun tu dmyal bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-13: sring mo dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-14: 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chags par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la bdag gi sems gang yin pa chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-15: zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la bdag gi sems gang yin pa zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-16: gti mug spang ba'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la bdag gi sems gang yin pa rmongs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-17: sring mo dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-18: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-19: 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:83b-20: reg pa'i skye mched drug po dag la kun 'byung ba dang nub par 'gyur bar rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-0: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag la sems nye bar bzhag @84a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag sems legs par nye bar bzhag cing gnas na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag kun tu bsten par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-4: lan mang du bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-5: sring mo dag khyed kyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag tu kun tu bsten pa'i rgyu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-6: goms par byas pa'i rgyu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-7: lan mang du byas pa'i rgyu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-8: legs par yid la byas pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-10: ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-11: sring mo dag khyed cag rnam par grol ba dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-12: bdag cag skye ba ni zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-13: tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-15: srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i shes pa dang mthong ba skye bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-16: sring mo dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-18: dge slong ma de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-21: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-22: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-23: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-0: mtha' gcig tu @84b 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-1: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-3: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-7: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-8: go'u ta mi khyod kyi dus yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-9: song zhig ces skul bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-10: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-15: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-17: rnam par grol zhing mthar thug pa nyid ma thob kyang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:84b-19: dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85a-0: zla ba yar gyi ngo de nyid kyi tshes bcu bzhi la bab pa na mi dag zla ba la nya'am nya ma yin zhes @85a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85a-2: 'di ltar nya ma yin pa'i phyir mthar thug pa nyid du ma gyur pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dga' byed kyi bu dga' byed kyis dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag la legs par gtams shing legs par rjes su bstan nas rnam par grol zhing mthar thug pa nyid ma thob kyang 'di'i tshe dus byed par gyur na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-2: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-3: des mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-4: lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed phyem bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge slong zhig dang dge slong ma'i dbyar khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-6: dge slong ma de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-7: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi phyir stan shom par byed cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:85b-9: btsun pa dga' byed byon pa legs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-0: dge slong drug sde dag la dge slong @87a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-1: ma la ston pa'i res bab pa na de dag ji tsam ba de tsam bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-2: de dag dang lhan cig mtho 'tsham par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-4: kun tu ca co 'don par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-5: gzhog stegs dang phyar g-yeng dang lus sgyur ba byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-6: de na gang dag bdag gir byed pa de dag ni de dag dang lhan cig mtho 'tsham par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-8: kun tu ca co 'don par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-9: gzhog stegs dang phyar g-yeng dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-11: gang dag bdag gir mi byed pa de dag ni 'chag sa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-13: sgo khang dag na gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa 'di lta bu dag bdag cag la kun tu ston par byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-15: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-17: drug sde dag dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-18: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-19: de dag gcig gis gcig bskos te dge slong ma la ston par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-21: ma bskos par dge slong ma la bstan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-22: de dag gis mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dong ste gcig gis gcig bskos nas dge slong ma la ston par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87a-24: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bskos pas dge slong ma la bstan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-0: @87b de dag gis mtshams kyi nang du dge slong nad pa rnams kyis 'dun pa blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-1: lhag ma rnams brel bar byas nas gcig gis gcig bskos te dge slong ma la ston par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-3: mtshams kyi nang du dge slong nad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa blangs te lhag ma rnams brel bar byas nas gcig gis gcig bskos te dge slong ma la bstan par mi bya bar 'di ltar gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-4: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-5: dge slong ma'i ston pa bsko bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-7: je dang por spro bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-8: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong ma'i ston par spro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-9: gal te spro na spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:87b-10: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-0: nyung ngu brjod pas mang @92b po 'dzin par nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-2: sid ces brjod na dham brjed par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-3: dha ma zhes brjod na sid brjed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-5: bram ze thams cad yi ge dang 'bru la mkhas pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-6: 'di rig byed kyi bram zer 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-7: des klog mkhan la rig byed klog par phul pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-8: des aom brjod na bhu brjed par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-9: bhu zhes brjod na aom brjed par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-10: klog mkhan gyis bram ze la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-11: bram ze kho bos bram ze'i khye'u mang po gzhan dag kyang klog tu gzhug dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-12: kho bo lam phran pa klog tu 'jud mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-14: nyung ngu brjod pas mang po 'dzin par nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-16: aom zhes brjod na bhu brjed par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-17: bhu zhes brjod na aom brjed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-19: bram ze thams cad rig byed klog pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-24: bram ze gang yin pa de nyid lha yin pas 'di ni rigs bram ze kho nar 'gyur snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-25: de bul ba mchog tu bul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-26: chung ba mchog tu chung ba yin pas de'i ming lam chung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-27: lam chung ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-28: bram ze de'i gang du cung zad ci la mgron du bos par lam chung ba de khrid de 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:92b-29: dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-3: 'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang nyams pa nyid du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-4: des lam chen pa bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-5: bu kho bo 'das nas khyod ni mya ngan bya mi dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-6: khyod kyi nu bo lam chung ba 'di la khyod kyis mkho ba bstab par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-8: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-9: mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-10: phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-11: gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-12: zhes bya ba yin pas de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-13: de gnyis kyis gos sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-16: dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan te dur khrod du bskyal nas bsregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-17: de'i 'og tu mya ngan bsang ba byas te 'khod do ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-20: bram ze lam chen pa de mnyan yod dang rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-21: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93a-22: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyis 'dul ba'i bya ba byas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-0: ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong @93b ba na mnyan yod du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-1: mnyan yod du skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-2: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis 'khor lnga brgya dang ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu ba na mnyan yod du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-4: thos nas kyang srog chags brgya phrag du ma dag phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-5: lam chen pas de dag phyir 'byung ba mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-9: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu shing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-10: mnyan yod du byon te de gnyis ltar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-12: de gnyis ni rigs mchog spangs te rigs gnyis pa dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i gan du rab tu byung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-13: de gnyis mthong bas ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-14: de na bram ze'i khye'u dad pa can zhig 'dug pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-15: mkhan po de skad ma gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-16: de gnyis ni bdag nyid chen po lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-17: gal te mkhan pos de gnyis las chos gsan par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-18: mkhan po'i thugs mngon par dad par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-21: re zhig gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u dag mi klog par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:93b-22: bdag kyang 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-0: bram ze'i khye'u de dag gi @94a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-1: kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe mi klog pa de'i tshe na lan 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'dong bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-2: lan 'ga' ni yam sreg shing thur 'dong bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-4: de dag mi klog par gyur nas de dag yam sreg shing thur dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-5: lam chen pa de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-6: dge slong zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na shing ljon pa'i drung na 'chag cing 'dug pa de bram ze des thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-7: kye dge slong sangs rgyas kyi bka' cung zhig smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-9: bram ze 'di ni rgol ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-10: 'di la byung rgyal du smra bar mi nus so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-11: des bram ze de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-12: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgya cher bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-14: kye dge slong kho bo yang bya ba yongs su nyams la khyod kyang dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams na ma legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-15: kho bo 'gros phyis kyang 'ong ngo zhes smras te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-16: dus gzhan zhig na yang bram ze'i khye'u de dag mi klog par gyur nas de dag yam sreg shing thur dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-17: lam chen pa yang gcig pu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-18: dge slong des bram ze de thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-19: mthong nas kyang des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-20: de'i tshe na bdag gis bram ze 'di la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94a-21: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgya cher bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-0: da ni bdag gis 'di la rten cing 'brel par @94b 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-1: lugs las bzlog pa rgya cher bstan par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-2: bram ze de dge slong de ga la ba der song ste byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-3: dge slong de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-4: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bram ze de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-5: lugs las bzlog pa rgya cher bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-6: bram ze de mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-7: dge slong bdag rab tu dbyung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-9: bram ze 'di ni rgol ba yin pas rab tu byung na bstan pa la gces pa byed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-10: rab tu dbyung ngo snyam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-11: bram ze de ltar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-13: kye dge slong bdag ni bram ze grags pa can lags pas bdag gis 'di nyid du rab tu 'byung ba'i rngo mi thog na ljongs su bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-15: dge slong des bram ze de ljongs su khrid de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-16: bzhin bzang dge slong gi las ni gnyis te bsam gtan dang klog pa yin na khyod bsam gtan dang klog pa gang 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-18: mkhan po gnyis ka yang bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-19: gdugs la ni bklag par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-20: dgung la ni bsam gtan bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pas nyin mo bklag pa dang kha ton byas pas sde snod gsum po dag lhogs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:94b-23: sde snod gsum dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-1: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-2: mtshan mo bsam gtan byas pas gong nas gong du yid la byed pa'i khyad par thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-3: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-4: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-7: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-8: tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-9: bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-10: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do; ;bya ba byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-11: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-12: bong pa dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-13: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-14: tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rigs pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-15: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-16: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95a-17: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-0: mngon du smra @95b bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-1: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pa rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-2: lam chung ba'i longs spyod srabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-4: yongs su gtugs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-5: des tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba sbyar bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam chen po 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-7: bdag gis thos pas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de bdag gis thob kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-8: bdag mnyan yod du song la bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pa 'khor lnga brgya dang ko sa la dag tu rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-10: mnyan yod na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-11: 'phags pa lam chen pa 'khor lnga brgya dang ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin to zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-12: thos nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa lam chung bas mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-15: 'phags pa lam chen pa 'khor lnga brgya dang ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-16: gnyan yod du 'ong ste de ltar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-18: de 'di dag gi phu nu yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-19: nye du yang ma yin yang 'di dag de ltar 'dong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-20: de bdag gi phu bo yin na bdag ci'i phyir de ltar mi 'gro snyam nas lam chung ba yang 'phags pa lam chen pa blta ba'i phyir song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:95b-21: tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pas de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-2: tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-3: ji ltar rab tu mi 'byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-5: 'phags pa bdag ni bul ba mchog tu bul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-6: chung ba mchog tu chung ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-7: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-8: tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pas de la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam zhes bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-10: su la rag lus snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-11: bdag nyid la rag las par mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-12: lam pa thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rig gces pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-14: thos pa gces pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-15: thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa gces pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-16: gal te 'dod na rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-18: tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pas lam chung ba de rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-19: rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas des de klog tu gzhug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-20: lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa mi bya zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-21: 'jig rten kun las yongs 'dzin 'dod bral ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-22: dran dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can gyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-23: gnod ldan sdug bsngal gang yin bsnyen mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-24: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di zla ba gsum gyis kyang lob par ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96a-25: ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi gzhan dag gis thos nas lobs par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-0: gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du song ste dris pa dang de dag gis de la @96b bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-1: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-2: gcig ni dbyar zla 'bring po nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-3: gnyis pa ni ston zla 'bring po nya la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-4: nyan thos chen po rnams la yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-5: de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-6: gdams ngag mnos te grong dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la lhags nas ji ltar thob pa ni rjod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-7: ma thob pa ni thob par bya ba'i phyir 'og tu 'dri bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-8: tshe dang ldan pa la ma chen pa'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-9: nye gnas gang dag ljongs su dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-10: chos gos byas pa dang ldan pa chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-11: tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pa ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-12: tshe dang ldan pa lam chen pa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-13: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas de dag kha cig ni ji ltar thob pa rjod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-14: kha cig ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa dag gi kha ton dag dang yongs su dri ba dag tshol bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-15: de na gang dag bul ba mchog tu bul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:96b-16: chung ba mchog tu chung ba de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:97a-3: tshe dang ldan pa lam chung ba yang drug sde dag la sten par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:97a-5: bsnyen bkur byed pa na nye dgas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:97a-6: lam pa khyod kyi mkhan po gcig pa 'di dag kyang mkhan po las kha ton dag dang yongs su dri ba dag tshol bar byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:97a-7: khyod kyang song la re zhig mkhan po las kha ton dag dang yongs su dri ba dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:97a-9: bdag gis ci yang ma bklags te zla ba gsum gyis tshigs su bcad pa gcig bklags na de yang ma lobs pas bdag gis kha ton dag dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-4: phu nu mo dag bdag cag gis ci nas kyang phyin chad thos pa nyung ngu 'ga' yang dge slong ma la ston par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu zan mo'i bu de mi dga' bar bya'o zhes de dag gis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-6: mi mo drug gis ni mnyan yod du zhugs la lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-7: srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la sang bdag cag dge slong ma'i ston pa nyan thos chen po 'di 'dra ba zhig byon par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-8: khyed cag las gang gis der bden pa dag mthong bar ma gyur pa des yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor bar bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-10: de dag las mi mo drug gis ni yal ga khru bcu gnyis pa dag las seng ge'i khri bshams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-11: mi mo drug gis ni mnyan yod du zhugs te lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:101b-12: srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la sang bdag cag dge slong ma'i ston pa nyan thos chen po 'di 'dra ba zhig byon par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-0: khyed cag las gang gis der bden pa dag mthong @102a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-1: bar ma gyur pa des yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor bar bya dgos par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-2: srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag kha cig ni ltad mo skyes pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-3: kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na der 'dus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-5: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-6: de mnyan yod du bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-7: rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa phye ma bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te snam sbyar thogs nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge slong zhig dang dge slong ma'i dbyar khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-9: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-11: dge slong ma'i ston pa de gang yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-12: ci dge sbyong snga ma yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-13: 'on te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-15: khyed kyis phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong 'ga' zhig dge slong ma la ston par byed ces thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102a-16: dge sbyong snga ma 'di nyid dge slong ma'i ston pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-0: 'dis zla ba gsum gyis tshigs su bcad pa gcig @102b bklags na de yang ma lobs pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-1: des dge slong ma sde snod gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-4: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can dag la ji ltar ston par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-5: dge sbyong ma sgre byi mo 'di dag gis bdag cag brid par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-8: ji lta byed pa yang bltas te re zhig sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa 'khor de'i nang du zhugs nas seng ge'i khri ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-10: ji tsam na yal ga khru bcu gnyis pa dag las seng ge'i khri bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-11: ci re zhig dad par gyur pa dag gis bshams pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-12: 'on te mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa can dag gis bshams pa yin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-13: ji tsam na mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa can dag gis bshams par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-15: glang po'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyang ste seng ge'i khri de ji ltar gnas su bzhag pa de ltar mnan nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ci nas kyang kha cig gis mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-16: kha cig gis ni ma mthong ba de ltar seng ge'i khri la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-18: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-19: spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:102b-20: 'gro ba dang 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-2: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa me'i khams la yang snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste sngon po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-7: shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-8: cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-9: lus kyi smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun dag 'byin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-10: lus kyi stod nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun dag 'byin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-11: shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-12: de phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus te 'khor gyi gong du seng ge'i khri bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-13: 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pas dge slong ma rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-14: sring mo dag kho bos zla ba gsum gyis tshigs su bcad pa gcig bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-15: kho bo tshigs su bcad pa de nyid nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du tshig gzhan dag dang yi ge gzhan dag dang tshig dang yi ge gzhan dag gis don rnam par 'byed par spro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-16: sring mo dag de la lus zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lus kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya ba bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag gis nyes par spyod pa bzhi mi bya ba bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-0: yid kyis zhes bya @103b bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya ba bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-1: sdig pa mi bya zhing zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes bya ba bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-2: 'jig rten kun la zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar len pa'i phung po thams cad bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs 'dzin rnam pa gsum bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-8: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don kyang rnam par phye ba de tsam gyis srog chags khri nyis stong gis bden pa dag mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-9: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-10: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-11: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-12: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-13: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-14: kha cig gis ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-15: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-16: 'khor phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-18: dge 'dun la bab par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:103b-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pas 'khor de dag phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-0: @104a *// dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-1: dge slong dag rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'khod pa de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-2: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa lam pas deng skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par ma dad par gyur par byas gor ma chag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-4: mngon sum du mi dga' ba brjod pa ni sdug bsngal ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-5: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la dri'o zhes de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-6: tshe dang ldan pa deng tshe dang ldan pa lam pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ji snyed cig mngon par ma dad par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis w'a ra n'a sir drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ces gang thos pa de deng tshe dang ldan pa lam pas rjes su bskor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-13: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don kyang rnam par phye ba de tsam gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-14: srog chags khri nyis stong gis bden pa dag mthong ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-16: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104a-17: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
