K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-2: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-3: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-4: 'khor phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang chos la 'bab pa dang dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-6: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos sems bsgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-7: lam pa 'di ni mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-8: de lta bas na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-10: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-11: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-13: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-14: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-15: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-16: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-17: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-18: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-19: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:104b-20: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-1: bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-2: ma bskos par zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-3: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-4: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-6: ston pa zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-8: chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-9: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-10: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-13: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-14: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na; dge slong dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bskos shing mtshams kyi nang du ma bskos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-15: gang dag sko bar byed pa de dag la nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-16: de bskos pa des dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105a-18: de bskos pa des dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105b-6: gang dag sko bar byed pa de dag la nyes byas su 'gyur la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:105b-10: de bskos pa des dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106a-7: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la bskos shing dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-0: de yang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos pa yang yin la gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu yin zhing grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan la des dge slong @106b ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-1: gal te sun phyung bar gyur na yang des ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin yang pham par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad po dag rgya cher brjod par mi nus na gang dag sko bar byed pa dag la nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-2: de bskos pa des dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-3: dge slong dge 'dun gyis mtshams kyi nang du bskos shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-4: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ma bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-5: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la bskos shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-6: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-7: de yang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-8: mang du thos la gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu yin zhing grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan la des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing gal te sun phyung bar gyur na yang des ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir byas la pham par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad po dag rgya cher rjod par nus kyang lci ba'i chos brgyad po dag rgya cher rjod par mi nus na gang dag sko bar byed pa de dag la nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-9: de bskos pa des dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-10: dge slong dge 'dun gyis mtshams kyi nang du bskos shing mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ma bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:106b-11: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la bskos shing dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-0: de yang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos la gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu yin zhing grong khyer pa'i skad dang ldan la des dge slong ma la @107a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-1: lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing gal te sun phyung bar gyur na yang des ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du phyir byas la pham par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad po dag rgya cher rjod nus shing lci ba'i chos brgyad po dag kyang rgya cher rjod nus na gang dag sko bar byed pa de dag ltung ba med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-2: de bskos pa des dge slong ma la ston na yang ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-3: dge slong ma la ston pa phyi ma ni sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-6: khan ma tho ba med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-7: khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-8: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-9: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-10: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-11: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-13: btsun pa dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa lam pa la gnod pa bgyi'o snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-14: phan pa nyid bgyis pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-15: dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107a-16: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang de dag gis de la gnod pa bya'o snyam pa las phan pa nyid byas par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa @107b las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-2: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-3: 'dod pa 'di dag ni lan tsha dang 'dra ste ji lta ji ltar bsten pa de lta de ltar skom par 'gyur bas de yang dang yang du rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la ji tsam na bu bcu gnyis btsas nas des de dag khyim dbub bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-6: dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-7: bram ze de yang rgas pa'i gnas skabs su mya ngan gyis non pas mig gnyis ldongs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-8: de'i mna' ma bcu gnyis po de dag nyes par spyod pa sha stag yin te; gang gi tshe de dag gi khyim thab dag phyi rol du dong ba de'i tshe na skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-9: bram ze de sgra la mkhas pas des 'di ni bdag gi bu rnams kyi sgra yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-10: 'di ni skyes pa gzhan dag gi sgra yin no zhes bya bar shes pas des skyes pa gzhan dag gi sgra thos pa na mna' ma rnams bsdigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-12: bram ze 'di bdag cag la gnod pa'i phyir zhus pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-14: de dag gis de la 'bras chan rtsub po dang rtsabs bskol ba byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-15: bram ze des bu rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-16: bu dag kho bo mna' ma 'di dag gis 'bras chan rtsub po dang rtsabs bskol ba byin no /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-17: de dag gis chung ma dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:107b-18: khyed cag gis ci'i phyir yab la 'bras chan rtsub po dang rtsabs bskol ba gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-2: yab kyi bsod nams dag pas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-3: de'i don du snod du 'bras s'a lu thug po che dag stsal na 'bras chan rtsub por 'gyur zhing chab zho stsal na rtsabs bskol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-4: ci'i phyir de dag de ltar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-6: gal te khyed cag thugs mi ches na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-7: bdag cag gis khyed kyi mngon sum du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-8: de dag gis gcig la gcig smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-9: bdag cag gis khyim thab dag la dam bcas pa'i skabs de grub par bya dgos so zhes de dag gis rdza mkhan bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-10: bzhin bzang khyod kyis rdze'u kha cig la nang gnyis yod pa byed nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-12: nus so zhes de rdze'u kha gcig la nang du gnyis yod pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-13: de dag gis rdze'u nang gcig tu 'bras rtsub po dag blugs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-14: nang gcig tu ni 'bras s'a lu thug po che dag blugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-15: rdze'u cig shos kyi nang gcig tu ni zho blugs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-16: nang gcig tu rtsab mo blugs te g-yos byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-17: khyim thab dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-19: je dang por yab bshos gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-22: je dang por yab bshos gsol pa de'i 'og tu kho bo cag la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-23: de dag gis de dag gi mdun du rdze'u'i nang gcig phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108a-24: 'bras chan rtsub mo bcus shing rdze'u cig shos kyi nang gcig phye ste rtsab mo bskol ba bcus nas gyos po la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-0: de'i 'og tu rdze'u yi nang gcig bye ste 'bras s'a @108b lu thug po che'i chan bcus shing rdze'u cig shos kyi nang gcig phye ste zho'i tshod ma bcus nas khyim thab rnams la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-1: bu rnams kyis pha la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-2: yab khyod kyi bsod nams dag pas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-3: bdag cag gi mngon sum kho nar rdze'u gcig gi nang du 'bras s'a lu thug po che dag stsal cing rdze'u cig shos kyi nang du chab zho stsal te g-yos bgyid du stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-4: khyod kyi zhal du ni 'bras chan rtsub po dang rtsabs bskol ba mchis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-5: bdag cag gi g-yar du ni 'bras s'a lu thug po che'i chan dang chab zho'i tshod ma mchis pas bud med dag gis ma nongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-7: kho bos lag pas gcal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-8: ci'i phyir kho bo'i bsod nams dag zad par gyur snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-9: des de dag gis ma tshor bar lkog tu de dag gi tshang mang du song ste lag nom gyis btsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-10: rdze'u kha gcig la nang gnyis yod pa dag lag pas zin nas de dag gzhan du sbas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-11: bu dag 'ongs shing lhags pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-12: bu dag kho bo'i bsod nams dag zad pa la ltos zhes rdze'u de dag bstan nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-13: bu rnams gzhan gyi khyim dag na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-14: rdze'u gcig la ni kha gcig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-15: bdag cag skal pa med rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-16: rdze'u nang gnyis la'ang kha gcig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-17: de dag gis chung ma de dag te por brdegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:108b-19: bram ze 'di bdag cag la gnod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-1: cag gis 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-2: phyogs der sbrul khas bsdigs pa zhig 'ongs nas de dag gis de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-4: des smras pa; sbrul ji lta bu 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-10: 'di dag la sbrul shi bas ci bya ste 'di dag bram ze 'di gsod par 'dod gor ma chag snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-11: chos nyid kyis na sbrul khros pa'i dug ni mgo dang mjug ma'i gnas gnyis su 'pho bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-12: des sbrul nag po khros par byas te mgo dang mjug ma bcad nas rked pa'i cha de dag la byin no; ;de dag gis pho sha'i khu sha byas te bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-13: yab pho sha'i khu sha gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-15: ci'i phyir 'di dag gis bdag la pho sha'i khu sha ldud par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-16: dug cung zhig sbyin 'dod gor ma chag snyam nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-17: ji ltar shi yang blas btung ngo snyam nas de dag gis de la sbrul gyi pho sha'i khu sha blud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-19: de'i rlangs pas ling tog phyid nas bram ze des mig mthong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-21: ci nas kyang snon du gzhug pa'i thabs bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-22: des sa la bsgyel te nyal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-23: kho bo shi la thug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-24: kho bo shi la thug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109a-26: myur du shi bar gyur cig snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-0: de dag @109b gis de la yang sbrul gyi pho sha'i khu sha blud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-1: de yang 'thungs pa dang de'i rlangs pas de'i ling tog rgya cher phyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-2: de'i mig gis snga mkho bzhin gsal bar mthong nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-3: mna' ma de dag sngon bram ze ldongs par gyur ba'i gnas skabs na de khyad du bsad de bag med par spyod pa de bzhin du yang spyad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-4: bram ze de dbyug pa thogs te langs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-6: da ltar kho bos mi mthong snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-7: da kho bo'i mig sbrul gyi pho sha'i khu sha'i rlangs pas phog pas ling tog thams cad phyid de sngon gyi gnas skabs bzhin du thams cad gsal bar mthong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-8: bu mo dag phyin chad bag yod par spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-11: de'i dus na bram ze gang yin pa de ni lam pa 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-13: mna' ma bcu gnyis po gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-14: de'i tshe na yang 'di dag gis de la gnod par bya'o snyam pa las phan pa nyid byas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-15: yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:109b-16: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa lam pa gdams ngag cung zhig gis gdams pa mdzad pas 'khor ba'i dgon pa nas phyung ste shin tu mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa mdzad pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-0: dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di gdams ngag @110a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-1: cung zhig gis gdams pas dbang phyug gi bdag po chen po la bzhag par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-3: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-6: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod pa de la bu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-7: des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-8: bzang mo bdag cag la bu lon 'phrog pa nor 'phrog pa byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-11: rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-13: gal te chung ma 'di la kar sha pa na mang po dag gtad par gyur na; skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig 'gyur pa sten par 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la kar sha pa na nyung zad cig byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-14: ri brags de na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa de khyim bdag de'i chung po grogs yin pas khyim bdag des tshong dpon de'i lag tu kar sha pa na mang po dag gtams nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-15: gal te kho bo'i chung ma gos dang zas yongs su nyams par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-16: khyod kyis zas dang gos kyis de la mkho ba bstabs par gyis shig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-17: de zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110a-18: de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-0: chung ma des khye'u de nye du'i @110b stobs dang lag stobs kyis bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-1: khye'u des ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-2: ma bdag gi pha dang mes po dag gis las ci zhig byas par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-4: gal te 'di la rgya mtsho chen por gru po che spyod par gyur to zhes byas na 'di yang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'gyur zhing de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-5: bu khyod kyi pha dang mes po dag 'di nyid ni tshong ba byed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-6: ma kar sha pa na dag byin cig dang bdag gis kyang 'di nyid du tshong bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-7: bu kho mo la kar sha ba na dag ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-8: bu kho mos khyod kyang nye du'i stobs dang lag stobs kyis bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed pa yin pas kho me la kar sha pa na dag gis 'byor pa yod re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-9: 'di ltar tshong dpon 'di khyod kyi pha'i chung po grogs yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-10: 'di las kar sha pa na dag long la las gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-11: khye'u de tshong dpon de'i gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-12: tshong dpon de yang mi gzhan zhig gis lan gsum gyi bar du tshong la dor byas pas de de la nan tur byed cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-13: de'i khyim nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas phyag dar gyi steng du byi ba'i ro zhig bzhag ste phyir phyung nas dor bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-14: tshong dpon des mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-15: mi gang nus pa yin na des byi ba'i ro 'dis kyang bdag nyid 'dzin par nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:110b-16: khye'u des de thos nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-0: tshong dpon 'di ni bdag nyid chen po yin pas @111a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-1: 'di byung rgyal du smras par mi byed pas byi ba'i ro 'dis bdag nyid 'dzin par nus gor ma chag snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-2: khye'u de bu mo mngag gzhug de'i phyi bzhin song song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-3: bu mo mngag gzhug ma des phyag dar por ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-4: khye'u des byi ba'i ro de blangs nas tshong dus su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-5: de na tshong khang na byi la zhig btags shing 'dug nas khye'u des byi ba'i ro de byi la la bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-6: des de mthong nas mchong par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-7: tshong pa des khye'u de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-8: byi ba'i ro'o ni byi la 'di la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-10: 'dir rin med par ji ltar sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-13: tshong pa des khye'u de la sran ma dag gis snyim pa bkang ste byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-15: gal te bdag gis 'di chos par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-16: gzhi chad par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-17: khye'u de sran ma de dag sla nga la brngos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-18: chu grang mos ril ba bkang ste ri brags su song nas phyogs gang du shing thun dag ngal so bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs der song ste bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-19: shing thun dag lhags nas khye'u des de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-20: zhang po dag shing khur zhog la yud tsam zhig ngal sos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-21: de nas shing thun de dag gis shing khur dag bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-22: khye'u des de dag la sran ma nyung zad nyung zad byin zhing chu grang mo yang 'thung du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-23: shing thun rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-24: tsha bo khyod gar 'gro shing thur 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111a-25: kho bo cag ji tsam du sngar dong na yang da 'khor ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-0: khyod da song @111b na nam zhig 'khor bar 'gyur zhes de dag gis de la shing re re byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-1: shing re re bo de dag gis khye'u de'i shing khur longs nas des de khyer te phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-2: des de dag btsongs te sran ma dag nyos nas de dag brngos te chu grang mos bum pa bkang nas yang phyogs de nyid du song ste bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-3: shing thun de dag kyang lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-4: des de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-5: zhang po dag shing khur zhog la yud tsam zhig ngal sos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-6: de nas shing thun de dag gis shing khur dag bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-7: khye'u de yang de dag la sran ma dag gis bgo bsha' byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-8: chu grang mos ngoms par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-10: tsha bo khyod nyin gcig bzhin du sran ma dang chu thogs la 'di nyid du sdod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-11: kho bo cag gis khyod la shing khur gyi gong shing khyer te 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-12: khye'u des nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin bya bar brtsams nas des de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-13: zhang po dag khyed cag shing khur dag tshong 'dus su ma khyer bar kho bo'i sdum par zhog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-14: kho bos khyed cag la rin bsdoms te byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-15: de dag gis shing khur de dag de'i khyim du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-16: dus gzhan zhig na nyi ma bdun du yul ngan byung nas khye'u des shing de dag btsongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-17: des khe sbogs mang po grub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:111b-18: de nas khye'u des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-0: tshong pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste shing 'tshong ba 'di ni tha chad yin te 'di ltar tsan dan gyis 'tsho na yang shing gis 'tsho ba kho nar zad pas bdag @112a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-1: gis bza' bca'i zong dgram par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-2: des bza' bca'i zong dgram zhing de chos dang rigs pas tshong byed pas de der yang khe sbogs mang po grub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-4: tshong pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste bza' bca' 'tshong pa 'di ni tha chad yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-5: bdag gis spos 'tshong gi zong dgram par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-6: des spos 'tshong gi zong dgram zhing des chos dang rigs pas tshong byed pas des der yang khe spogs mang po grub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-8: tshong pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste spos 'tshong 'di ni tha chad yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-9: bdag gis dbyig gi zong dgram par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-10: des dbyig gi zong dgram zhing des chos dang rigs pas tshong byed pas des dbyig tshong pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-11: de'i ming byi dbyig pa byi dbyig pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-12: dbyig tshong pa de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-13: byi dbyig pa 'dis bdag cag thams cad zil gyis mnan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-14: ci nas kyang 'di rgya mtsho chen por 'jug cing der tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de ltar nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-15: de dang ha cang thag mi ring bar 'khod de longs gtam smra bas 'khod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-16: shes ldan dag 'di lta ste dper na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-17: mi glang po che'i gnyar zhon nas rta'i rgyab tu zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112a-18: rta'i rgyab tu zhon nas khyogs spyil la zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-0: khyogs spyil @112b la zhon nas rkang pas 'gro ba de bzhin du byi dbyig pa 'di yang pha mes dag rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che spyod cing 'gro bar gyur pa las 'di da ltar dbyig tshong nyid kyis tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba sbyor bar byed do zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-1: byi dbyig pas thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-3: khyod kyi pha mes dag rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che spyod cing 'gro bar gyur ba las der yang de dag shi nas khyod dbyig tshong tsam gyis tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba sbyor bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-4: byi dbyig pa khyim du song ste ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-5: ma kho bo'i pha mes dag rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che spyod par gyur pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-7: 'dis 'ga' zhig las thos par gyur gor ma chag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-8: 'di la rdzun gyi tshig smra ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-12: ma bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug gi gnong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-13: mas smras pa bu 'di nyid du 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-14: byi dbyig pas yang dang yang du 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-15: mas de dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-16: byi dbyig pas srang chen por tshong pa'i tshogs rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-17: khyed cag las gang ded dpon byi dbyig pa dang lhan cig sho gam med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:112b-19: gru btsas med par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par spro ba des rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon gyis shig ces dril bsgrag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-0: de nas tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'gro @113a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-1: ba'i zong sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-2: de nas ded dpon byi dbyig pas dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang dge bar 'gyur ba byas te shing rta dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-8: bong bu dag la zong mang po bkal te tshong pa de dag dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-9: de na de la mi lnga yod de sdud par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-10: tshar gcod par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-14: sdud par byed pa gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-15: de na bza' ba dang btung ba sbyor ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-16: tshar gcod par byed pa gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-17: de na rtsod pa byung ngo cog nye bar zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-18: byi dor ba gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-19: gru 'chos par byed par gang yin pa'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-20: chu phyags pa gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-21: de na chu phyags par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-22: rlung yor thogs pa gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-23: de na rgyu skar dag la rnam par lta bar byed pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-24: de mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-25: tshong pa de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po mthong nas skrag ste gru bo cher po 'jug par mi spro nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-26: ded dpon byi dbyig pas rlung yor thogs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-27: kva'e nang rje rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgrogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-28: de nas rlung yor thogs pas bsgrag par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113a-29: 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-1: rin po che chen po che ba 'di lta bu 'di lta ste nor bu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-11: g-yas su 'khyil ba dag yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-12: khyed cag las gang rin po che de lta bu dag gis bdag nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-16: bran mo dang las byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-19: blon po dang nye du dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-20: snag gi gnyen mtshams dag legs par bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-21: dus dang dus su dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la mthon por 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-22: skal ba can du 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-23: rnam par smin pa bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-24: phyi ma la mtho ris su 'gro ba'i yon 'bul bar 'dod pa de rgya mtsho chen por zhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-25: 'jig rten ni 'byor ba 'dod pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs gru bo cher zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-26: des de dag gru bo ches mi bzod par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-27: ded dpon byi dbyig pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-28: da bdag gis phyir zhugs shig ces ji skad smra bar bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-29: des rlung yor thogs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-30: kva'e nang rje rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgrogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-31: de nas rlung yor thogs pas bsgrag par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-32: 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:113b-33: rgya mtsho chen po 'di na 'jigs pa chen po che ba 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-2: nya chen mid pa mid kyi 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-5: chu srin kumbhi ra'i 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-6: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-7: chu'i nang nas byung ba'i ri dvags la thug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-8: rlung nag po'i 'jigs pa dag yod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-9: 'dir chom rkun pa nor 'phrog pa sngon po dang dkar po dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-10: de dag gis khyed cag thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang 'bral bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-11: khyed cag las gang bdag nyid dang pha ma dang bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-12: chung ma dang bran mo dang bran mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-14: zho shas 'tsho ba dang mdza' bshes dang blon po dang nye du dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-15: snag gi gnyen mtshams sdug pa dag yongs su gtong bar mi 'dod pa de rgya mtsho chen por ma 'jug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-16: 'jig rten ni dpa' bo nyung la sngar ma mang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-17: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs phyir byung ba dang de de dag grus bzod par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-18: de'i 'og tu rlung yor thogs pas sgra lan gsum bsgrag pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-19: de'i 'og tu nyag thag gcig bkrol zhing gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i bar du bkrol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-20: des gru bo che rlung yor chen po thogs pas legs par bzung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-21: rlung gi shugs stobs dang ldan pas bskyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114a-22: sprin chen po bzhin du song ste rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gi phul nas ji tsam na rin po che'i gling du phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-0: de nas @114b rlung yor thogs pas sgra bsgrag par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-1: 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-2: rin po che'i gling 'di nyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-3: nor bu mching bu rin po che 'dra ba dag kyang yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-4: khyed kyis de dag nye bar brtag cing brtag cing phyis khyed cag 'dzam bu gling du son pa na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar de ltar rin po che dag long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-5: rin po che'i gling 'di nyid na srin mo khrung khrung gzhon nu ma zhes bya ba dag yod de de dag gis skyes pa dag ci nas kyang 'di nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar mtho 'tsham par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-6: khyod kyis de dag bsnyen par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-7: rin po che'i gling 'di nyid na myos par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-8: gang gis de dag zos pa de zhag bdun du brgyal zhing 'dug par 'gyur bas khyed kyis de dag bza' bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-9: rin po che'i gling 'di nyid ni mi ma yin pa dag 'khod de de dag zhag bdun las lhag par khyed 'khod par mi bzod pas zhag bdun 'das nas rlung gang gis 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-10: gru bo che bya ba ma byas par khyer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu gtong bar 'gyur bas khyed kyis de la yang ma thug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-11: tshong pa de dag gis de thos nas sems bsdus shing bag yod par 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:114b-12: de dag gis rin po che dag nye bar brtags shing brtags shing gru bo che 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-0: dper na til dang 'bras thug po che dang rgya shugs dang rgya sran dag bzhin du bkang ste rin po @115a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-1: che'i gling nas 'phags nas rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis bdas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-2: 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-3: de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du gru bo che legs par grub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-5: de nas ded dpon byi dbyig pa la mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-8: ma ci bu lon pa dag bcad nas de'i 'og tu khyim dbub par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-10: bu khyod kyi phas kyang bu lon pa yod par ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-11: mes bos kyang ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-12: khyod la bu lon pa ga las byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-14: ma kho bo nyid shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-15: zhes des rin po che bzhi las byas pa'i byi ba bzhi byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-16: sprog ma gser gyis bkang ste byi ba bzhi po de dag sprog ma'i phyogs bzhir bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-17: tshong dpon de'i gan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-18: tshong dpon de yang de nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-19: shes ldan dag ded dpon byi dbyig pa des rtsva'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-21: gang dang gang blangs pa de dang de dag thams cad gser du 'gyur te ji tsam du de bsod nams dang ldan zhing dbang che bar grags pa la ltos zhes de'i bsngags brjod cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-22: de de ltar de'i bsngags pa rjod pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-23: sgo ba de'i gan du song ste ded dpon byi dbyig pa sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115a-25: ded dpon byi dbyig pa 'jug tu chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-0: su zhig ded dpon byi @115b dbyig pa zlog par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-1: de nas ded dpon byi dbyig pa nang du zhugs nas des tshong dpon de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-6: ded dpon kho bos khyod la cung zad kyang byin par mi dran no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-8: bdag gis khyod dran par bya'o zhes des dran par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-11: khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-13: 'o na khyod kho bo'i chung po grogs kyi bu yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-14: khyed kyi pha 'gro ba na kho bo'i lag tu kar sha ba na mang po dag gtams pas kho bo nyid kyis khyod la sbyin par bya ba yin no zhes tshong dpon des gser gyi ril ba chus bkang ba'i mchod yon gyis bsus nas bu mo thu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te ded dpon byi dbyig pa'i chung mar byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-15: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon byi dbyig pa gang yin pa de ni lam pa 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-17: de'i tshe yang ngas 'di la gdams ngag cung zhig gis gtams pas dbang phyug gi bdag po chen po la bzhag par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:115b-18: da ltar yang ngas 'di la gdams ngag cung zhig gis gtams pas 'khor ba'i dgon pa nas phyung ste shin tu mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go ///
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-1: ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-2: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-3: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-4: bul ba mchog tu bul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-5: chung ba mchog tu chung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-7: dge slong dag rigs kyi bu lam pa nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-8: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-9: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas lam pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-10: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-13: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi; 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-14: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-15: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-16: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-18: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-19: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-20: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116a-21: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-0: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig @116b rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-1: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-2: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-4: de dge slong gi 'khor nyi khri dang w'a ra n'a si na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-5: de'i gsung rab la lam pa 'di dge slong sde snod gsum par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-6: des chos kyi ser snas 'ga' la yang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yang ma bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-7: yang ri brags shig na phag 'tshong zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-8: chu klung gi pha rol dang tshul rol gyi ri brags der dus ston byung ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-10: gal te phag dag gsad du ni sha de snyed nyo bar mi 'gyur pas gson po nyid du bkur bar bya zhing der 'phral la bsad cing bsad cing btsong bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-11: des phag mang po dag gcig la gcig sbrel te grur bcug nas 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-13: gru de bskyod pa na bub par gyur nas de dag der tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-14: phag 'tshong de yang rgyun phyogs su khyer ba na chu klung de'i 'gram na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya tsam 'khod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-15: de dag las rang sangs rgyas gcig cig chu'i don du chu 'gram du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-16: des de mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-17: ci 'di re zhig shi ba yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-18: 'on te gson pa yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-19: des glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i lag pa brkyang ste de phyung nas bye ma bdal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:116b-20: der kha sbub tu bzhag nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-1: chu zag nas des 'du shes phyir rnyed de langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-2: mi'i rjes mthong nas de de'i rjes bzhin du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-3: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya mthong nas des de dag la lo ma dang 'bras bu dang so shing gis bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-4: de dag gis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-5: gang gi tshe rang sangs rgyas de dag skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan byed pa de'i tshe na de yang mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-6: des der 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed nas 'du shes med pa'i sems can lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-7: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-8: phag 'tshong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong lam pa 'di nyid yin te 'dis chos kyi ser snas 'ga' la yang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yang ma bstan pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-9: phag dag bsad pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-10: 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang nas 'dir skyes pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas bul pa mchog tu bul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117a-11: chung ba mchog tu chung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-0: dge slong dag de ltar na gdams ngag med pa la nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod de @117b de lta bas na dge slong gis gdams ngag med par bsam gtan mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-1: bsam gtan byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ci dgyes par bzhugs nas rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-3: rgyal po'i khab na 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-4: bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs shes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-5: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-8: bcom ldan 'das 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-9: chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-10: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-11: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-12: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-13: rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-16: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:117b-17: de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-0: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu @118a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-2: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-4: bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-5: bzod par dka' ba yin pas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa lam pa ma gtogs so zhes gsol ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-6: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-7: de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-9: rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-12: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118a-13: btsun pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-0: bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi @118b dge 'dun sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te btsun pa lam pa ni ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-1: 'tsho byed khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams ji ltar 'phel bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-2: de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-3: rjes su yi rang ba byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-5: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-6: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-7: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-8: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa gcig pu ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-9: btsun pa kun dga' bo de'i dge ba'i chos rnams ji ltar 'phel bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-10: de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan dag bshams nas chur bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-11: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g-yar dgongs 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:118b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-2: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-3: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-4: byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-5: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-6: kun dga' bo lam pa'i byug ris zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-7: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis gser gyi ril ba bhring ga ra thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-8: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis chab kyi rgyun ma bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-10: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-11: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das chab kyi rgyun bzhes par mi mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-13: da dung dge slong gi dge 'dun ma tshogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-14: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-18: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-19: bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis g-yar ma drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119a-21: gal te 'tsho byed khyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-2: 'o na ci lam pa dge 'dun las phyi rol tu gyur pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-5: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-6: 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas bod par ni bya mod kyi de la gus par byas te brim par ni mi bya'o snyam nas des mngag pa btang ste song la de bos shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-7: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa yang 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-8: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu sprul te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-9: mngag pa de song ste lam pa lam pa zhes bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-10: dge slong du ma dag gis aang zhes lan btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-11: mi de 'ongs te 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-12: bdag der mchi ste lam pa lam pa zhes bos na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ka'i gnas na sngar dge slong dag gis gang zhing 'khod pa de bzhin du dge slong dag gis gang zhig 'khod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-13: dge slong du ma dag gis aang zhes lan btab na de dag las gang bod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-14: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-17: lam pa yang dag pa gang yin pa de shog cig ces gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:119b-19: lam pa yang dag pa gang lags pa de gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-1: pa lam pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus nas der song ste rang gi byug ris su 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-2: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brim par brtsams nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa la gus pa ma byas par brims so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-4: nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis smad pa len par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-5: 'di'i yon tan bsgrag par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed len par byed pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-7: bcom ldan 'das de la ma stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-8: chos nyid kyis ni ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed blangs par ma gyur gyi bar du dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi lhung bzed dag len par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-9: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-10: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi lhung bzed dag len par mi byed snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-11: bdag nyid kyis yon tan bsgrag pa'i phyir ro snyam du rig nas ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pas stan phyed las 'phags pa byas te glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-0: 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos rgan pa'i mtha' logs @120b na 'dug pas mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-1: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par ston pa 'di gnas brtan gang yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-2: de lhung bzed kyi rjes bzhin song ba dang ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa lam pa yin par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-3: mthong nas de brgyal te sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-4: chus btab pas srog phyir lon nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-5: tsan dan rtag tu bsil ngad yon tan ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-6: autpal rtag tu dri bda' dri med gser //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-7: rtag gsal dag pa'i bee d'urya 'od bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-8: byis pa'i skye bo'i sdig pa rtag tu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-9: mtshungs med gor ma'i ri mo rtag pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-10: 'phags pa'i skye bo rtag tu thugs rje mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-11: dgra bcom dag gi bzod pa brtan pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-12: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-16: btsun pa 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos kyis gang gi tshe dang ldan pa lam pa'i yon tan dag mngon par ma 'tshal ba de'i tshe na gus pa ma lags pa la brtson zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:120b-17: gang gi tshe yon tan dag mngon par 'tshal ba de'i tshe na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar bgyi ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-0: dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang des gang gi tshe 'di'i yon tan dag mngon par mi shes @121a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-1: pa de'i tshe na gus pa ma yin pa la brtson zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-2: gang gi tshe yon tan dag mngon par shes pa de'i tshe na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-4: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na byang lam nas ded dpon zhig gis zong rta lnga brgya bdas te yul dbus su phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-5: de'i rgod ma'i mngal du rta cang shes zhugs nas de gang gi nyi ma la zhugs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-6: rta de dag phyin chad skad 'byin par mi byed nas ded dpon gyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-7: bdag gi rta rnams la nad 'ga' zhig byung ngam ci na des rta 'di dag skad 'byin par mi byed do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-8: dus gzhan zhig na rgod ma de 'brangs pa las rte'u pho zhig byung nas de gang gi nyi ma la byung ba de nyid kyi nyi ma nas bzung ste; rta de dag phyin chad sna sgra 'byin par yang mi brtson nas ded dpon gyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-9: rte'u sems can skal chad 'di byung bas 'di'i nyes pas bdag gi rta rnams la nad byung bar gyur to snyam nas des rgod ma de rtag tu zhon zhing de la rtsva dang chas kyang sbyin par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-10: de mthar gyis mchod gyur ces bya ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-11: der de dbyar gyi nam la bab nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121a-12: gal te da song bar gyur na rta rnams kyi rmig pa 'drul bar 'gyur bas bzod du mi rung bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-0: dbyar gyi nam la 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam nas de @121b dbyar gyi nam la de nyid du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-1: de na gnas pa'i bzo bo dag gis de la rang rang gi bzo dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-2: de 'gro ba'i dus kyi tshe bzo bo dag lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-3: des de dag la bgo bsha' dag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-4: de na rdza mkhan gcig cig 'dug pa des kyang de la bzos bsnyen bkur byas pas de la chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-5: rje'i sras ded dpon de'i phyir bzhud la cung zhig slongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-6: rdza mkhan des ded dpon 'phags pa'i mdun du 'jim pa'i gong bu thogs te bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-7: ded dpon des de mthong nas de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-8: kva'i nang rje khyed ha cang phyis te 'ongs pas nga'i phan thams cad thal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-9: ded dpon de rte'u de la bkra mi shis pa'i blo skyes pas ded dpon des rdza mkhan de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-10: 'di ltar kho bo la rte'u gcig cig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-11: gal te 'dod na khrid de song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-14: bdag ni rdza ma bgyid par 'gyur la 'dis kyang gcog par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-15: de nas rte'u des rdza mkhan de'i rkang pa gnyis la lces bldag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-16: de rdza mkhan de rte'u de la rjes su chags pa skyes nas de khrid de khyim du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-17: de la chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-18: rje'i sras khyod kyis de las cung zad thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-21: khyod ni rdza ma byed par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:121b-23: rte'u des chung ma'i rkang pa gnyis la yang lces bldag par brtsams pa dang chung ma de yang rte'u de la rjes su chags pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-0: @122a *// rte'u de rdza ma so btang ba dang ma btang ba dag gi nang du 'gro ba na rdza ma 'ga' yang mi gcog nas rdza mkhan des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-2: shes bzhin du 'gro bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-3: dus gzhan zhig na rdza mkhan de sgro ba thogs te sa len du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-4: rte'u de yang de'i phyi bzhin thog thag 'brang zhing 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-5: rdza mkhan des sas sgro ba bkang ba dang rte'u des rgyab bzed nas rdza mkhan des sa'i sgro ba de rte'u de'i rgyab tu bkal nas des de khrid de khyim du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-6: rdza mkhan des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-7: bzang mo rte'u bzang po zhig ste kho bos phyin chad sa bskur dgos par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-8: kho bos der dgal bar byas khyod kyis 'dir phog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-9: chung mas de legs so zhes rte'u de la phub ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-11: de'i tshe na w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab mo dang 'thab pa dang 'khrug long dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-12: nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-13: s'a lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-14: de'i rta cang shes dus la bab nas nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122a-15: rgyal po tshangs byin gyi rta cang shes dus la bab po zhes thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-0: @122b de dag gis de la yang na ni sgyu dpya 'jol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-1: yang na ni w'a r'a n'a si'i phyi rol tu skyed mos tshal du ma byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-2: de lta mi byed na gnya' ba nas btags te bkri'o zhes phrin spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-3: rgyal po tshangs byin de dag la sgyu dpyal 'jal bar yang mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-4: 'jigs pas phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal du yang 'byung bar mi byed cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-5: ded dpon de yang mthar gyis w'a ra n'a sir phyin pa dang rgyal po tshangs byin gyis byang lam nas ded dpon zhig gis zong rta lnga brgya ded de w'a ra n'a sir phyin zhes thos nas des blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-6: shes ldan dag ngas yun ji srid cig tu 'dir zhugs te 'dug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-7: deng la rta cang shes tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-8: de dag ded dpon de'i gan du dong ste de dag gis rta de dag mthong nas gcig la gcig smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-10: rta 'di dag ni rta cang shes kyis btul ba sha stag yin na 'di na rta cang shes ni 'ga' yang mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-11: de dag gis rgod ma de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-12: shes ldan dag rgod ma 'di las rta cang shes 'brangs na de ni mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-13: de dag ded dpon gyi gan du song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-14: ded dpon khyod kyis rta 'ga' zhig btsongs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-15: gzhan la byin pa yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-17: btsongs pa ni 'ga' yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-18: 'di ltar kho bos mchod gyur gyi gnas su rte'u zhig bkra mi shis so snyam nas rdza mkhan zhig la byin pa ni yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:122b-19: de dag gis gcig la gcig smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-0: @123a *// ded dpon 'di ni blun po zhig yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-1: snying po gang yin pa bor nas snyigs ma dag ded de 'dir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-2: de dag gis rgyal po la zhus te mchod gyur du dong nas de dag rdza mkhan de'i drung du song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-7: kho bo cag gis khyod la bong bu sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-8: khyod kyis kho bo cag la 'di byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-12: glang bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-16: khyod deng gros kyis shig dang kho bo cag sang yang 'ong ngo zhes zer te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-17: chos nyid kyis ni 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe na dud 'gro dag kyang smra shes pa yin pas rte'u des rdza mkhan de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-20: ci'i phyir sbyin par mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-21: ci khyod kyi snying lam na kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khyod kyis khal byed cing phub ma dang sran phub za snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-22: kho bos rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bar bya zhing gser gyi snod nas bzang chas zil dngar gyis bcin pa dag bza' bar bya dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-23: de dag rte'u zhes zer na de dag la rta cang shes zer du ngo tsha'am ci zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-24: gal te rin gyi phyir byin cig ces zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123a-25: de dag la yang na gser 'bum byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-0: @123b yang na 'di'i brla g-yas pas gser ci tsam 'dren nus pa de tsam byin cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-1: phyi de nyin par de dag 'ongs te rdza mkhan la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-2: kva'i nang rje khyed kyis gros byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-5: khyed rta cang shes zer zhes zer du ngo tsha'am ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-7: glen pa 'dis 'di rta cang shes yin nam ma yin ci shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-8: 'di ltar rta 'di nyid byas pa gzo ba yin pas 'di nyid kyis 'di la smras par gyur gor ma chag snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-10: rta cang shes yin yang rung rte'u yin yang rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-14: yang na 'di'i brla g-yas pas gser ji tsam 'dren nus pa de tsam byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-16: 'di mthu dang ldan yin pas ches mang po dag 'dren par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-18: de dag gis rgyal po tshangs byin la gser 'bum gyis rta cang shes khugs so; ;zhes spring pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-19: rgyal po tshangs byin gyis de dag la rin ci tsam gyis khugs pa de tsam gyis long zhig ces spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-20: de dag gis gser 'bum gyis blangs nas de dag rta cang shes de khrid de w'a ra n'a sir lhags nas de dag gis de rta bres kyi dang por btags te de la rtsva dang chas byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-21: de de mi za nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:123b-22: khyod kyis rta cang shes nad pa zhig khrid de 'ongs sam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-3: 'di ltar je 'di la rma'o zhes de nas 'dul sbyong bas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-4: mgyogs 'gro gang tshe ran chas chu med pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-5: rdza mkhan bres na mgo skam rus pags tsam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-6: rang sos gtubs pa'i rtsva dag za ba soms //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-7: de'i tshe mang pos khyod la bsams ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-8: 'di na mgyogs 'gro stong gi thogs 'dren cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-9: rgyal pos chibs ran mchog dag nyer bstabs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-10: ci'i phyir mi za dris pa bdag la smros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-11: de nas rab mgyogs drang po brtan ldan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-12: ma bzod 'khrugs bcas mgyogs 'gro mchog gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-13: de las nyer zhi legs par bsams byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-14: 'dul sbyong blo ldan mi mchog de la smras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-15: 'dir khyod kho bo yon tan de nyid shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-16: kho bo ji bzhin khyod kyis ma rig min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-17: mkhas pas brnyas na sa steng mi rgyu zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-18: kho bo 'di na myur du shi yang bla //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-19: skye bo ngan pas yun ring brnyas gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-20: gal te yon tan khyod ldan de brnyas min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-21: skye bo mdzangs pas skad cig brnyas gyur na; ;zhi ba gal te yon tan de brnyas yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-22: 'dul sbyong bas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-23: lha 'di ni bro 'tshal ba ma lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-24: 'di ltar rim pa ma bgyis pas de'i slad du 'di ran dang chas mi 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-26: lha shul dpag tshad phye dang gsum tshun chad du mdzes par bgyi zhing grong khyer yang mdzes par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124a-27: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-0: dpung gi tshogs yan @124b lag bzhi dang bcas pas bsu bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-1: phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de zangs ma'i glegs bu dag gis g-yog par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-2: rgyal po'i sras bu thu bos mgo'i steng du gdugs srog shing brgya ba gzung bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-3: rgyal po'i sras mo thu mos rnga yab gser can nor bus spras pas sbrang ma dag bskyab par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-4: rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pas gser gyi snod nas zil dngar gyis bcin pa'i bzang chas kyi zas bstab par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-5: rgyal po'i blon po dam pas gser gyi chol zangs kyis rtug pa dor bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-7: de lta na 'di rgyal po yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-8: nga rgyal po ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-10: lha 'di la dus thams cad du bsnyen bkur de ltar bgyi mi 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-11: 'di ltar dgung bdun gyi bar du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-12: dgung bdun 'das nas bka' nyan par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-13: 'das pa gang lags pa de da bgyi bar mi spyod kyang lhag ma gang lags pa de mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-14: rgyal pos phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de zangs ma'i glegs bu dag gis kyang g-yogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-15: rgyal po'i bu thu bo yang mgo'i steng du gdugs srog shing brgya pa 'dzin tu bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-16: rgyal po'i bu mo thu mo yang rnga yab gser can nor bus spras pas sbrang ma dag skyob tu bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-17: rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa yang gser gyi snod nas zil mngar gyis bcin pa'i bzang chas kyis zas stobs su bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-18: rgyal po'i blon po dam pa yang gser gyi chol zangs kyis rtug pa 'dor du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:124b-19: sa bdag 'dul sbyong bcas pa de la chags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-0: @125a *// shin tu dri zhim byug pa mchog 'chang zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-1: sa bdag btsun mo zil mngar bzang chas kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-2: snod bkang mgyogs 'gro mchog phyir 'dzin par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-3: rgyal po skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa la rta cang shes phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-4: des rgyab smad nas rgyal pos 'dul sbyong ba la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-8: 'di ltar rgyal po bcibs dka' bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-9: de'i slad du 'di 'dis rgyab smad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-10: rgyal po zhon te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-11: de 'gro ba na chu byung nas de de la mi rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-12: rgyal pos 'dul sbyong ba la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-14: lha mi 'jigs te 'di ltar rnga ma'i chab kyis rgyal po gsher bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas de'i slad du rgal bar mi bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-15: rgyal pos de'i rnga ma gser gyi sbubs su bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-17: rgyal po de skyed mos tshal du song ste bag med par 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-18: nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis rgyal po tshangs byin skyed mos tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-20: de dag lhags nas grong khyer gyi sgo dag bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-21: rgyal po tshangs byin gyis nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis grong khyer gyi sgo dag bzung ngo zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-22: de rta cang shes la zhon pa dang w'a ra n'a si dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125a-23: skyed mos tshal gyi bar du rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba autpal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-0: padma dkar pos khebs pa zhig gis chod nas rta cang shes kyis bsams @125b pa; rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba gnod pa dang nyam nga ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-1: phongs par gyur pa bdag gis yal bar dor ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-2: bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-3: rta cang shes des padma'i 'dab ma dag gi steng du rkang pa bzhag ste sge'u chung nas w'a ra n'a sir zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-4: rgyal po dga' nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-5: shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i srog phyung ba de la ci sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-6: lha rgyal srid kyi phyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-8: 'di ni dud 'gro yin pas 'di la rgyal srid kyi phyed kyis ci bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-9: 'di ltar 'di las brten te zhag bdun du sbyin pa dag sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-10: bsod nams dag bya zhing dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-11: rgyal pos de las brten te zhag bdun du sbyin pa dag sbyin pa dang bsod nams dag bya bar brtsams shing zhag bdun du dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston dag byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-12: ded dpon des mi dag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-13: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston 'di byung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-14: de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-15: rgyal pos mchod gyur ces bya ba'i gnas de nas rdza mkhan zhig las gser 'bum gyis rta cang shes nyos te 'dir 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-16: des rgyal po 'di'i srog phyung nas rgyal pos de las brten te zhag bdun du sbyin pa dag sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:125b-17: bsod nams dag byed cing dus ma yin par ku mu da'i dus ston byas gso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-0: ma la rte'u de cang shes su ma @126a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-2: je song la de lta'o snyam nas de'i gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-3: rta cang shes des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-4: kva'i nang rje khyod kyis rta lnga brgya po dag gis ci thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-6: kho bo gcig pus kyang rdza mkhan de la gser 'bum byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-7: de brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas chus btab pas srog phyir rnyed nas rta cang shes kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-8: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na rta cang shes gang yin pa de ni lam pa 'di nyid yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-10: de'i tshe yang des gang gi tshe de'i yon tan dag mngon par mi shes pa de'i tshe na de la gus pa ma yin pa la zhugs par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-11: gang gi tshe de'i yon tan dag mngon par shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-12: da ltar yang des gang gi tshe 'di'i yon tan dag mngon par mi shes pa de'i tshe na 'di la gus pa ma yin pa la zhugs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-13: gang gi tshe yon tan dag mngon par shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bzod pa gsol bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126a-15: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lam pas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-0: bcom ldan 'das @126b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-1: smon lam gyi dbang gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-3: dge slong dag sngon byung ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur pa na gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-4: de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-5: smon lam 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-6: bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:126b-11: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas @127a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-1: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed cing ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-2: sh'akya'i seng ge sh'akya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sems sgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-3: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-4: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-5: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-6: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-7: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-9: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-10: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127a-11: ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod @127b na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-2: dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-3: dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-4: de nas autpa la'i mdog 'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ga la ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-5: phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-6: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-7: bud med kyi yul ni shes rab chung ba yin no snyam nas des de la don dang tshig dang yi ge mdor 'dus pa 'dus pa dag gis chos bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-8: de shes rab can yin pas gong nas gong du 'dri bar byed nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis lan btab cing des de la ji tsam na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab pa de tsam gyi bar du chos bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-9: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-10: stan las langs te dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-11: ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo dag bcad par gyur nas dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo btsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:127b-16: lde mig dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-0: 'di nyid du 'khod do snyam nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na kun dga' ra ba zhig 'dug pa der de dag dong @128a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas de dag gis shing ljon pa dag rgan rigs kyis bsko bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-3: de na de dag shing ljon pa dag sgo ba rnams la aa yya aa yya aa ha da aag ae aa ga ha de zhes 'bod pa'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-4: g-yon can lnga brgya tsam mnyan yod 'joms par 'dod pa dag lhags pa de dag gis sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po de thos nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-5: shes ldan dag mnyan yod re zhig sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-6: shes ldan dag je btsun mo'i 'khor gyis thos pa 'di dag gzhom par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-7: autpa la'i mdog gis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-8: mi mdzes pa 'ga' zhig gis rig par mi 'gyur ram snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-9: ji tsam na 'joms par 'dod pa'i g-yon can lnga brgya tsam po de dag mthong nas des 'phags skyes po'i dpung sprul te rnga pa ta had brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-11: shes ldan dag bdag cag 'phags skyes po'i dpung gis bskor te bdag cag zin par gyur na mi rung gi /
