K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-12: 'bros par bya'o zhes de ltar rig nas de dag bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-13: autpa la'i mdog gis dge slong ma de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-14: nu mo dag g-yon can 'joms par 'dod pa lnga brgya tsam 'dir lhags nas kho mos de dag bsdigs nas bros kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128a-15: khad kyis dal bu dal bus lag brdas sgo phye shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-0: dag nang phar sngar @128b langs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-1: bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-2: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi chos 'dre ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-3: lhag par 'dre shing tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed pa bzang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-4: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci phyir dge slong dag nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-9: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-12: dga' byed khyod kyis nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-15: mi sbyor ba dang ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-18: brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:128b-19: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-0: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' @129a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-1: bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-2: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-3: dge slong dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-4: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-5: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-6: bskos kyang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-7: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-8: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-9: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-10: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-11: dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-12: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-15: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-16: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-17: dge slong gis nyi ma nub pa la nyi ma nub par 'du shes pas dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129a-18: dge slong gis nyi ma nub pa la yid gnyis za bas dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-0: dge slong gis nyi ma nub pa @129b la nyi ma nub par 'du shes pas dge slong ma la ston na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-1: dge slong gis nyi ma ma nub pa la yid gnyis za bas dge slong ma la ston na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-2: mtshan thog thag chos nyan par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-3: gtsug lag khang gi sgo drung du ston pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-4: sgo ma bcad par 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-5: grong khyer gyi nang na gtsug lag khang ngam dbyar khang 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-6: khyim gzhan du song ste ston pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-8: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-9: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-10: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-11: btsun pa autpa la'i mdog gis dge slong ma lnga brgya g-yon can gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-13: dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-14: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis don mthun mang po seng ge'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-18: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:129b-19: des chung ma la smras pa bzang mo kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-0: lam du khyod kyi g-yog sus byed par @130a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-3: chung mas bdag mi khrid do snyam nas du bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-4: zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis khyim bdag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-5: jo bo sa ci'i slad du 'di dur stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-7: mi khrid do snyam nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-13: der bdag cag gis 'di'i g-yog bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-14: khyim bdag gis de khrid de song nas don mthun de dag dgon pa'i lam zhig tu mtshan mo btab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-15: don mthun de dag lam gyis dub pas nyal nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de mel tshe byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-16: ji tsam na der seng ge 'ongs nas de sa mgal dum thogs te de bsdigs pa dang bros par 'gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-17: lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-18: gang phyir bya ba thams cad la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-19: skyes pa 'ba' zhig mkhas pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-20: de dang de la bud med kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-21: zin la mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-22: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni autpa la'i mdog 'di nyid yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-23: de'i tshe de'i dus na don mthun lnga brgya gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong ma lnga brgya po 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130a-24: de'i tshe na yang 'dis don mthun mang pos seng ge'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-0: da ltar yang 'dis dge slong ma lnga brgya g-yon can gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su @130b bskyabs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-1: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-4: dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-5: dga' byed khyod kyis dge slong ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-6: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis de la don dang tshig dang yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-8: bud med kyi yul ni shes rab 'chal ba'i phyir brda mi phrad cing 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dri mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-9: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-10: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-11: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:130b-12: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-1: bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-2: btsun pa 'phags pa dga' byed kyis dge slong ma rnams la don dang tshig dang yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan na bud med kyi yul ni shes rab 'chal ba'i slad du brda mi 'jal cing 'jigs pa'i slad du 'dri ba'i rngo mi thog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu lags so zhes bka' stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-4: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-5: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-8: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-11: de dag gis ji ltar bya ba dag mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-12: bca' ba lnga po rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-17: bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-22: lhung bzed dang chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-23: dra ba dang phor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-24: shur bu dang lcag phod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-27: dge slong ma zhig gis 'o thug khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131a-28: drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa la chos bstan par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-0: rgol ba dag kyang @131b tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-1: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-2: drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-3: nye dga' dge slong ma de mthong nas de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-8: gal te nye dgas kyang 'o thug rnyed par 'gyur na rtag pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-9: de bzhin du dge slong ma kha cig gis ni zho thug khyer te 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-10: kha cig gis ni hvags kyi la du khyer te 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-12: kho bo ko tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge slong ma la ston snyam gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-13: kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston snyam mi sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-14: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma rnams la ston par byed ces zer zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-16: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-19: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:131b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-2: nye dga' khyod dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag ni zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-5: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-7: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-9: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-10: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-11: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-12: yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-13: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-14: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-15: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-16: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad zer na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-17: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di ba dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-18: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-19: bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132a-20: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-0: ston to zhes @132b zer na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-3: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-4: dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-5: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-8: gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-9: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-10: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-11: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad tsam dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-12: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston pa bden na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-14: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-15: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-18: mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-21: de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad par gyur cing nor zad pa dang longs spyod zad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:132b-22: des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-0: bzang mo kho bos da nor sgrub par @133a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-7: rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-10: rje'i sras bud med kyi yul ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-11: sred pa spyad pa lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-12: dus dang dus su spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-13: tshong dpon de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-14: dge slong gi gan du rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-15: mnyan yod pa'i tshong dpon rab tu byung ngo zhes de grags shing bsod nams che bas des de'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang na ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag grub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-16: dus gzhan zhig na snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-18: dge slong ma des de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133a-19: mdun du 'dug nas de de'i snam sbyar de la yang yang du rtogs nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133b-13: grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:133b-18: mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134a-5: sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-0: spyod lam dang spyod @134b pa ma 'khrugs pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-10: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-11: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-16: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-19: nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-20: gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-21: ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:134b-22: chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ljongs rgyur gshegs pa na 'ga' zhig chos gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa ljongs rgyu bar mi 'gyur ram snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-0: sku thams cad kyis g-yas phyogs nas glang po che'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de chos gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs @135a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-1: dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-2: gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-3: kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas bdag gis chos gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-5: kun dga' bo 'o na ci'i phyir dge slong 'di chos gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-8: kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos dag sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-11: kun dga' bo dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa ni 'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos gsum tshang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-12: 'on te ma tshang snyam du mi sems par 'di ltar thob bo cog len par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-13: nye du la ni byin yang len par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-16: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-0: sangs rgyas @135b bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-1: dge slong khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-4: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-6: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad pa mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-8: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-10: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-11: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin na ltung byed do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-12: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-13: dge slong ma zhes bya ba yang chos 'di pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-14: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang mes po dang phrugs pa las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-15: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:135b-21: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-1: ni bslang ba mi dgos par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-3: dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-4: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-7: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-8: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-9: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos sbyin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-10: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos byin na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-11: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-12: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par yid gnyis za bas gos byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-13: bor brlag byung ba la sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-14: legs par smra ba la sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-15: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos kyi sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-16: rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa la sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-17: rin gyi phyir sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-18: brje ba'i phyir sbyin pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-20: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-21: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136a-22: gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-3: dge slong ma sbed ma'i chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-4: des ras yug chen zhig rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-5: de su zhig bdag gi chos gos 'tshem par 'gyur snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-6: dge slong ma rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-7: sbed ma khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-8: phu nu mo dag kho mo chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-9: kho mos ras yug chen po zhig rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-10: kho mo'i chos gos su 'drub par 'gyur mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-11: sbed ma khyod gser gyi snod kyi slong mo la rgyu'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-12: khyod kyi dge slong 'phags pa 'char ka rab tu shes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-14: des kho mo'i chos gos drubs par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-15: khyod kyis de lan 'ga' bcol ba yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-16: lan 'ga' yang bcol ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-17: ci khyod chu sgra grags pas lham 'bud dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-18: song la chol cig dang 'drub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-19: sbed ma 'char ka'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-20: de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-21: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i ras yug chen mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:136b-22: sbed ma gang la ras yug chen 'di lta bu yod pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-0: sar pa las snam sbyar nyis rim byas te snying las chung @137a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-1: ngus [*dus?] dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-3: 'phags pa bdag khyod la ras yug chen mi 'bul ba ni ma lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-4: 'di ltar bdag gis chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings pas khyod kyis bdag gi snam sbyar tshems te stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-6: gal te re zhig btsem par byar yang bcu gnyis sde dag las gang dang gang dag la chos gos btsem par bya ba byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi gan du khyer te 'ong bas de snyed cig btsem par yang ji ltar nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-7: gal te mi btsem du ni tshig pa'i g-yar tshul kyang mi ster bar 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-8: 'di ltar ci nas kyang shing gi snod du bskol ba bzhin du dang po gang yin pa de nyid tha mar 'gyur ba de ltar btsem par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-11: sbed ma bzhag ste song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-12: drug sde dag der dong nas de dag gis ras yug chen de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-13: btsun pa 'char ka ras yug chen 'di su'i lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-17: 'o na 'khod de ci rung btsem par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-18: de ltar gyis shig de dag gis ras yug chen de brgyangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137a-19: dras shing drubs nas 'char kas snam sbyar de dang tshon sna lnga'i skud pa khyer te 'chag tu song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-0: des der song ste snam @137b sbyar de la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bdag nyid sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa zhig skud ris su btsems nas de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te snam sbyar de bltab nas chos gos kyi gdang la bkal te bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-1: sbed ma yang 'ongs nas 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-2: sbed ma kho bos kyang snam sbyar btsems na khyod kyang 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-3: des snam sbyar de bzhin blta ba bzhin du sbed ma'i phrag pa la bkal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-4: re zhig ji srid du tshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye zhig //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-5: ltung ba bcas par gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-6: sbed mas snam sbyar de de bzhin blta ba bzhin kho nar dbyar khang du 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-7: de la dge slong ma khrims zlas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-9: 'phags pa 'char kas snam sbyar ji ltar btsems pa bltas 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-10: sbed mas de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-12: re zhig ji srid du tshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-13: ltung ba dang bcas par gyur ta re zhes zer ro zhes ltar ma ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-14: sbed ma dbyar khang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-15: de la dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-16: sbed ma 'phags pa 'char kas snam sbyar ji ltar btsems pa bltas 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:137b-19: re zhig ji srid du tshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-0: ltung ba dang bcas par gyur te zhes zer @138a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-1: ro; ;dge slong ma grogs mo dag 'di la ltung bar 'gyur ba ci yod ces de'i rgyab logs su 'dug ste snam sbyar hu ra ces phrogs nas phye ste bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-2: dge slong ma rnams kyis de la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas 'char ka sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa skud ris su btsems pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-3: rta gad kyis btab ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-4: sbed ma khyod la 'phags pa 'char kas yun ring po zhig gis gzod 'khyud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-5: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-6: nu mo dag khyed mgo byi zhing mchan khung spun pa yin na ci dgod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-8: 'phags ma ji ltar 'phags pa 'char kas mi mdzes pa bgyis pa la gzigs /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-10: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:138a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon @139b med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-1: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-2: dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang ba spre'u zhag gis bskus te 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-3: 'ong na yang glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-4: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-5: yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-6: gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-7: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:139b-8: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149a-17: sbed mas smras pa dran no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149a-18: bsod snyoms pa zhig snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149a-19: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-0: de mthar gyis mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim bdag gi @149b chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-1: khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas de mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-2: gal te langs te bsod snyoms phul bar gyur na btsun pa 'char ka'i gtam spangs par 'gyur ro snyam nas des lag pas song zhig ces brda byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-3: 'char kas sbed ma lag brda byed pa mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-4: sbed ma khyod kho bo 'dug bzhin du skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig lag brda byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-6: 'phags pa bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lag brda mi bgyid de 'di ltar bsod snyoms pa zhig mchis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-8: gal te langs te bsod snyoms phul bar gyur na 'phags pa'i bka' mchid spangs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-9: bdag gis de la mchis shig ces lag brda bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-11: sbed ma khyod kyi snying lam du kho bos khyod la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i gtam byas snyam mam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-12: 'di ltar kho bos lag pas bcal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na khyod kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed kyang mi nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-13: sbed mas bsod snyoms pa de bos te bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-14: des de khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas zas kyi bya ba byas te gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:149b-16: bsod snyoms pa des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-0: btsun pa 'char ka la gtam bya zhing @150a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-1: thos nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-2: btsun pa 'char ka mchog tu dga' ba bskyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-3: deng don gyis na bdag gis khyod kyi bsod snyoms zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-5: des dang por khyod bos snyam mam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-6: des khyod song zhig ces lag brda byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-7: kho bos de'i 'og tu de phyir 'bod du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-9: bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byin te btsun pa 'char ka de ni khyod kyi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-10: de'i tshe na btsun pa 'char ka de nyid na 'dug par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-12: khyod bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug tu rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-14: mi rung yang srid de kho bo de ltar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-15: bsod snyoms pa khyod kyis deng de ltar kho bo'i bsod snyoms zos shing gal te mi bzod na kho bo las brten te bslab pa'i gzhi 'char chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-16: ci de kho bos yal par bor du re'am zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-17: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150a-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-0: @150b de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-2: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-5: 'char ka khyod bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug par byed pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-8: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-10: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-13: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:150b-14: yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-0: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin @151a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-2: bud med kyi yul dang zhes bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa sprod pa las byung ba'i chos sten nus pa dang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-3: lhan cig ces bya ba ni de dang lhan cig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-4: gcig pu gcig dang zhes bya ba ni de dang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-5: dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-6: skyabs yod pa na zhes bya ba ni lngas bskyabs pa na ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-12: stan la zhes bya ba ni gzhi la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-13: 'dug na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du rkub tshos 'jog par byed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-17: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-18: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151a-19: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa bskyabs yod pa na stan la 'dug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-1: sgo ma bcad par 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-2: gzhan dag 'jug cing gzhan dag 'byung na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-4: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-5: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-6: gcig pu 'dug pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-8: gang gi tshe sbed ma rab tu byung nas de dge skos byed pa na dge slong ma rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bsod snyoms la dong ba na sbed ma gtsug lag khang du phyag dar byed cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-11: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-12: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-13: sbed ma dge slong ma'i dbyar khang na phyag dar byed cing 'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-14: 'phags pa 'char ka byon pa legs so byon pa legs so zhes des phyags ma phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'greng ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:151b-16: 'char kas de la ji tsam pa de tsam gyis chos bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-0: sngon dgod pa dang rtses pa @152a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-1: dang dga' ba byas pa dang dga' mgur spyod pa dag dran par bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-2: sbed ma khyod kyis bdag cag skyed mos tshal dang 'dun sa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-3: lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-4: bza' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-5: btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-6: gnas mal 'di dang 'di lta bu bshams pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-10: de na dge slong ma rgan mo nad pa zhig 'dug nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-11: 'di gnyis ci'i phyir ma bag mar blangs pa tshun chad kyang gcig la gcig rjod par byed snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-14: dge slong ma dag mchi bar 'gyur zhing dbyar khang du phyag dar ma bgyis par mchis pas dge slong ma dag smod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-15: zhes des phyags ma blangs pa dang 'char ka song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-16: sbed mas gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang dge slong ma de dag kyang lhags nas de la de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152a-17: sbed ma khyod kyis ci byas na dbyar khang 'di de kho na bzhin du phyag dar dang bcas par 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-0: phu nu mo dag gang tshun chad nas khyed cag bsod snyoms la dong @152b ba de tshun chad nas kho mo sa la ma 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-1: dge slong ma rgan mo nad pa des thos nas des dge slong ma rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-2: gang tshun chad khyed cag bsod snyoms la dong ba de tshun chad nas sbed ma ma 'dug pa de ni bden te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-3: 'di ltar 'phags pa 'char ka byon par gyur nas 'di de dang lhan cig 'greng zhing ma bag ma blangs pa tshun chad kyang gcig gis gcig la brjod do; ;dge slong ma de dag gis sbed ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-4: sbed ma khyod kyis de lta byas pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-5: phu nu mo dag bden no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-6: dge slong ma de dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'greng bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-8: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-9: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'greng bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:152b-11: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-0: @154a *// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-1: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba na ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po phye ma bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-6: 'od srung da ltar khyod ni rgan po rgas pa gog tu gyur pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-7: nga'i smad g-yogs sha na'i gos phyag dar khrod dag ni lcis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-8: 'od srung khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du shog la gang zag gis mgron du bos pa dag bdag gir gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-9: khyim bdag gi gos mtshon gyis dras pa dag kyang kha dog ngan par gyis la chongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154b-0: rjes su yi rang ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te @154b song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154b-1: de'i tshe na mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de la yun ring po nas smon pa 'di lta bu skyes te kye ma bdag gis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po lha dang mis mchod pa khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te bshos gsol na ci ma rung snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154b-2: khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po dge 'dun la gtad pa thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:154b-3: thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-7: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-8: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-9: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-10: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-12: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de las kyi mtha' gnyis byed du 'dzud de tshong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-14: des dgon par zhing rmos nas sa bon btab ste zhing de'i drung du spyil bu byas nas zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160a-15: bsod snyoms pa zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-0: des der byul na zhing de'i drung na spyil bu @160b mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-2: phyogs 'di go skabs dben pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-3: 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam nas des de nyid du 'dug par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-4: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms brgyus nas de nyid du gnas 'cha'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-5: der mi'i dris ri dvags dang bya 'ga' yang mi 'ong zhing der lhas kyang dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas zhing de shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-6: khyim bdag de yang don legs par grub ste bkra shis shing bde bar 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-7: de nas khyim bdag des rdzas sbas nas khrus byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-10: rje'i sras khyod kyis dgon pa'i zhing de la sa bon btab nas yul gzhan du bzhud na gal te sa bon gyi skyin pa tsam grub par gyur tam je gzigs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-11: khyim bdag de der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-12: ji tsam na zhing de lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-14: bdag gis 'dir rib ma yang ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-15: srung ma'i mi 'ga' yang ma bzhag par zhing 'di lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur ba de la rgyu ci yod snyam nas de der byul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-16: mi'i rjes mthong nas de rjes bzhin du spyil bu der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-17: ji tsam na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-18: skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-20: 'di'i mthus zhing 'di shin tu lo tog phun tshogs par gyur to snyam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:160b-21: 'phags pa spyil bu 'di na bzhugs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-1: 'phags pa zhing 'di bdag gi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-2: 'phags pas me tog dang 'bras bu dang tshems shing dag ci ba der longs spyod du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-3: 'phags pas sang bdag gi sdum par bsod snyoms gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-4: khyim bdag kho bo ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas bsod snyoms 'ba' zhig la rgyu'o zhes des de dang du ma blangs nas khyim bdag des de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-5: bzang mo bang ba sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-6: zhing las lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-8: 'di bdag la ku re zer snyam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-9: rje'i smras khyod kyis der rib ma yang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-10: srung ma'i mi 'ga' yang ma bzhag na bdag la ku re bgyir ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-12: bzang mo ci kho bo khyod la ku re byed snyam mam 'di ltar yid ches par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-13: zhing de'i lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-14: chung mas smras pa ci'i slad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161a-16: kho bos zhing de'i drung du spyil bu byas te spyil bu der dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pas de'i mthus zhing de shin tu lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-0: 'o na khyod kyis ci'i slad du de sang bsod @161b snyoms la spyan ma drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-2: kho bos de spyan drangs na bsod snyoms pa de'i zhal nas khyim bdag kho bo ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas bsod snyoms 'ba' zhig la rgyu'o zhes des dang du ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-4: de dag ni zhabs la phyag 'tshal te spyan drangs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-6: 'o na khyod kyis zhal zas sta gon gyis shig dang kho bo der song la zhabs la phyag 'tshal te spyan drang bar bya'o zhes de song ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-7: 'phags pas sang bdag gi sdum par bsod snyoms gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-8: bsod snyoms pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-9: khyim bdag kho bo ni bsod snyoms 'ba' zhig la rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-11: 'phags pa khyod kyis bdag gi sdum par bsod snyoms mi gsol du mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-13: khyim bdag de dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-14: khyim bdag des cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-15: bzang mo kho bos bsod snyoms pa de sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na des kyang cang mi smra bas dang du blangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:161b-16: zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-0: khyim bdag gi chung ma des kha zas grang cha gang dag yin pa de dag ni @162a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-1: de nyid kyi nyin mo sta gon byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-2: drod bag gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyi de nyin par sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-3: dge slong bsod snyoms bdag bsod snyoms la 'jug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-4: bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig bsod snyoms pa de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-8: kho bo khyim bdag cig gis mgron du bos pas dus shes par byas te 'gros khyod song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-10: bsod snyoms pa rnyed pa dang ldan zhing bsod snyoms pa bsod nams chen por gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-11: zas kyi tshod shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-12: kho bos kyang de la dus shes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-13: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-14: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-17: khyim bdag gis chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-18: 'phags ma bdag gis bsod snyoms pa zhig spyan drangs pa de 'phyis te zan gcad par gyur na mi rung bas bdag brel gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-21: gal te kho mos bsod snyoms pa de khrid de 'ong na khyod kyis kho mo la bsod snyoms sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162a-24: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma 'di la sus sbyin par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-0: bdag gis gsol @162b lo; ;gtsug lag khang srung ba dag sus sbyin par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-3: bsod snyoms pa dag gis bsod snyoms brgyus nas da tsam phyir 'byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-4: gang da gzod 'jug pa de bsod snyoms pa de yin no snyam nas de grong khyer gyi sgor song ste bsdad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-5: bsod snyoms pa des kyang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-6: deng bdag gis bsod snyoms la brgyu mi dgos pas dge ba'i phyogs la tron bya zhing dus shes par byas te 'gro snyam nas des dus shes par byas nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-7: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'jug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-8: de sbom dga' mos mthong nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-9: bsod snyoms pa de 'di yin no snyam nas des de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-10: 'phags pa sdum pa ga ge mo zhig tu spyan drangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-12: 'phags pa bdag gis khyim der khyod kyi bsngags pa brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-14: sring mo ci kho bos khyod la kho bo'i bsngags pa rjod cig ces byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-16: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-17: 'di ni dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas yin par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:162b-18: bdag gis zan gcad pa ni bla'i bdag ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas de phyir ldog par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-0: 'phags pa bdag gis khyod kyi gdung @163a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-1: yang ma 'tshal mtshan yang ma 'tshal bas bdag gis khyod kyi bsngags pa brjod re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-3: sring mo gal te khyod kyi tshig snga ma bden na phyi ma rdzun la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-4: gal te phyi ma bden na ni snga ma rdzun no zhes de phyir log ste spyil bu de nyid du song nas de ji srid du lus las mdangs ma yal ba de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas gang gi tshe lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-5: bsod snyoms pa gzhan dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-6: gal te zas gzhan gyi yin zhes de lto yang gzhan gyi yin snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-8: ji tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa de tsam gyis zas zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-12: 'o na ci'i phyir glos phab ste nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-13: des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-15: de lta bas na sngar khyim du bos pa ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-17: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-18: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163a-20: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-0: dge slong de lta bas na @163b snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-1: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-2: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za na sngar khyim du bos pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-3: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-4: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-5: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de bdag nyid kyis rig pa'am gzhan gyis brjod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-6: dge slong mas zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-7: sbyor du bcug pa'i zhes bya ba ni sbyor du bcug pa ni gnyis te tshul khrims kyis sbyor du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-8: thos bas spyor du bcug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-9: zas zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-10: za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-11: sngar khyim du bos pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni sngar khyim du mgron du bos pa bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-15: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge pa'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-17: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:163b-18: 'di lta ste dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim gzhan du mgron du bos par gyur ban des slong ma 'ongs te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:164a-1: dge slong gang dag mgron du bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:164a-2: che ge mo dang che ge mo la sogs pa dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:164a-3: zan ci lta bu dag sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:164a-4: sum phel gyi zan dag go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:164a-7: dgra bcom pa dag yin pas de dag la gtsang phye sbyin par bya'o //
