K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-19: zan ji lta bu dag sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-20: sum phel gyi zan dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-21: mi rung ste dge song de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-23: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la gtsang phye sbyin par bya'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-24: zhun mar ji lta bu sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-26: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-28: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la ba mar sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165a-29: lan tshva ji lta bu sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-1: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-3: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la rgyam tshva dang ba tshva dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-4: rgya mtsho'i tshva sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-5: btung ba ji lta bu blud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-7: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-9: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la dar ba blud par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-10: zan spag pa ji lta bu sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-11: tshva dang sbyar ba'i ldum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-12: mi rung ste dge song de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-14: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la tshogs pa dang btsos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-18: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-20: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la hvags kyi 'khur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-23: mon 'khur sbag par ji lta bu sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-24: tshva dang sbyar ba'i ldum mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-25: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-27: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la bsngo sha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-28: sreg sha dang sha rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-31: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:165b-33: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la hvags chab dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-5: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-7: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la 'bras s'a lu'i chan sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-8: sran tshod ji lta bu blud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-9: mon sran gre'u'i sran tshod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-10: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-12: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-13: de dag la mon sran sde'u'i sran tshod blud par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-14: bya na ji lta bu sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-16: mi rung ste dge slong de dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-18: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pas de dag la sha rnam pa sna tshogs dang hvags tshod dang zho dang 'o tshan blud par bya'o zhes sbyor du bcug nas dge slong gis gal te shes bzhin du zos na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-21: ma mo 'dzin pa dag yin pa bden na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-23: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-24: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-25: dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-27: yang yang dang ni 'dug gnas gcig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166a-28: phye dang bca' dang stobs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-0: 'dus dang dus min gsog 'jogs @166b dang; ;kha nas mid dang bsod pa nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyi kun tu spyod pa ni dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-6: mi rgyur 'gro ba yin pas de gnyis kyi de dag tu brgyus nas 'dzam bu gling du 'ongs te 'khor bzhi po dag la sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbyung ba dang gtub pa dang gcad pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-7: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-8: yi dvags rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-9: lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-10: mi rnams kyi tshol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-11: chags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang dag yin pa de dag rjod par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-12: gang la la'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag des khrid de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:166b-13: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-0: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis la yang dag @167a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-2: yang dag par rjes su ston du 'tshol bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyang de la yang dag par 'doms par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-4: yang dag par rjes su ston par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyis yang dag par gtams shing yang dag par rjes su bstan pa na de dag tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par dga' zhing gong du khyad par yang rtogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-6: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis 'khor bzhi po dag gis kun tu bskor cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-8: kun dga' bo gang gis dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis 'khor bzhi po dag gis kun tu bskor cing 'khod pa'i rgyu ni gang yin rkyen ni gang yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-9: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyi kun tu spyod pa ni dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyu ba dang dud 'gro rgyu ba dang yi dvags rgyu ba dang lha rgyu ba dang mi rgyur mchis pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167a-10: de gnyis kyis de dag tu brgyus nas 'dzam bu gling du mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-0: 'khor bzhi po dag la sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbyung @167b ba dang gtub pa dang gcad pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-1: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-2: yi dvags rnams kyi bkres pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-3: skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-4: lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-5: mi rnams kyi tshol ba dang chags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang dag lags pa de dag brjod par bgyi pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-6: gang la la'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag des khrid de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ga la ba der mchis te mchis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-7: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis la yang dag par 'doms su 'tshol bar bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-8: yang dag par rjes su ston du 'tshol bar bgyid cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-9: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyang de dag la yang dag par 'dom par bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-10: yang dag par rjes su ston par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:167b-11: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyis yang dag par gtams shing yang dag par rjes su bstan pa na de dag tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par dga' zhing gong du khyad par yang rtogs par bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-0: @168a *// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis 'khor bzhi po dag gis kun tu bskor cing mchis pa'i rgyu ni de lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-2: kun dga' bo thams cad du dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis dang sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis lta bu dag mi 'byung bas de'i phyir sgo khang du cha lnga pa'i 'khor lo bri bar rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo khang du cha lnga pa'i 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-4: dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bri ba mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-6: 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-11: dge slong rnams kyis gang du gang bri bar bya ba mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-13: mthar sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-15: yi dvags kyi 'gro ba bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-17: nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-18: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-19: 'dzam bu'i gling yang bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168a-20: dbus su 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-0: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mya ngan las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dkar po ston par @168b bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-1: brdzus te skyes pa'i sems can zo chun rgyud mo'i tshul gyis 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-2: kho ra khor yug tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las ldog pa dag bri bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-3: thams cad mi rtag pas bzung ba bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-4: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-5: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-6: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-7: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-8: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-9: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-11: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-12: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-13: zhes bya ba yang bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo khang du cha lnga pa'i 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-15: dge slong rnams kyi sgo khang du cha lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'drir bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-16: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lhags nas 'phags pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-17: bris pa 'di ci lags zhes 'dri ba na de dag gis kho bo cag gis kyang mi shes so zhas smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:168b-19: der bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la de ston par 'gyur ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas @169a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-1: de dag bye brag med par byis pa yang rung rmongs pa yang rung mi gsal ba yang rung mi mkhas pa yang rung ba las sko bar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-2: de dag bdag nyid kyis kyang mi shes na bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la ston par 'gyur ba lta ga la shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-4: nus pa las bsko bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-5: rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-8: des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-9: bzang mo bdag cag gi nor 'phrog pa longs spyod 'phrog pa byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-10: kho bo zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go ;rje'i sras de ltar mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-11: de zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-12: de de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-13: chung ma des khye'u de nye ngu'i stobs dang lag stobs kyis bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed nas des yi ge dang yig 'bru dag slob tu bcug nas de 'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud la shin tu mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169a-14: khye'u de ne'u ldangs dang lhan cig 'od ma'i tshal du song ste gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-0: des sgo khang na cha lnga pa'i 'khor lo bris pa mthong nas des dge slong la dris @169b pa; 'phags pa bris pa 'di ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-2: bzhin bzang 'di dag ni 'gro ba lnga ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-7: mi dag go ;des yang dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-8: 'phags pa 'di dag gis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba dag tu skyes shing des da ltar dbyung ba dang gtub pa dang gcad pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-9: bzhin bzang 'di dag gis mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag cher kun tu bsten cing goms par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-10: lan mang du byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes shing des da ltar dbyung ba dang gtub pa dang gcad pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:169b-11: 'phags pa 'di dag gis kyang las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes shing des da ltar gcig la gcig 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170a-0: bzhin bzang 'di dag gis ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ches srab pa dang ches chung ba dag kun tu bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes shing de da ltar gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar @170a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170a-2: 'phags pa 'di dag gis kyang las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas yi dvags rnams su skyes shing des da ltar bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170a-3: bzhin bzang 'di dag gis ni ser sna kun tu bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas yi dvags rnams su skyes shing des da ltar bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170a-4: 'phags pa 'o na 'di dag gis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lha rnams su skyes shing des da ltar lha'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170a-5: bzhin bzang 'di dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam cher kun tu bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas lha rnams su skyes shing des da ltar lha'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170a-6: 'phags pa 'di dag gis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mi rnams su skyes shing des da ltar bde ba chung ngu nyams su myong bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-0: bzhin bzang 'di dag gis ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam chung ngu kun tu bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas mi rnams su skyes shing des da ltar bde ba chung ngu nyams su myong @170b bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-1: 'phags pa 'di la bdag 'gro ba gsum po sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags dag ni mi 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-2: 'gro ba gnyis po lha dang mi gnyis ni 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa bdag gis las ci bgyis na des bdag lhar skye bar 'gyur ba mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-5: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar rab tu byung la tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-6: gal te tshe 'di nyid la kun shes pa rtogs par gyur na de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-7: gal te kun tu spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pas dus byed par gyur na khyod lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-9: bzhin bzang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-10: de ni rngo mi thog na thabs gzhan 'ga' mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-13: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi dag long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-15: bzhin bzang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-16: 'phags pa de yang rngo mi thog na thabs gzhan ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:170b-19: bzhin bzang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol cig dang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-0: 'phags pa kar sha pa na du tsam dag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs @171a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-2: bzhin bzang kar sha pa na lnga brgyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-3: 'phags pa de ni rngo thog go zhes des dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-4: ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-5: yum bdag deng 'od ma'i tshal du mchis nas bdag gi de na cha lnga pa'i 'khor lo bris pa mthong ste de na 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-6: lha dang mi dag bris na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-7: yum khyod ngan bu lha rnams su skye bar bzhed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-8: bu kho mo sems can thams cad lha rnams su skye ba yang 'dod na khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-9: yum khyod kyis bdag la kar sha pa na lnga brgya stsol cig dang bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-10: bu khyod kyang kho mos nye du'i stobs dang lag stobs kyis bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed pa yin pas kho mo la kar sha pa na lnga brgya'i 'byor pa ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-11: yum bdag gla rngan gyi slad du las bgyid du mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-12: bu khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa yin pas khyod kyis gla rngan gyi phyir las byed par mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171a-14: des de dus kyis 'chu bar shes te gnang nas khye'u de gla mi'i srang du song ste bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-0: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis gla mi gzhan dag khrid na @171b de 'gas kyang ma khrid nas des der nyi ma nub par byas nas nam sros pa dang khyim du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-1: mas de mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-2: bu khyod kyis ded gla rngan gyi phyir las byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-4: yum bdag sus kyang ma khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-5: bu gla mi dag ni 'di mi 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-6: gla mi dag ni skra yegs shing gos dri ma can dag gyon nas gla mi'i srang du song ste sdod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-7: khyod kyang gal te gla rngan gyi phyir las byed par 'dod na skra yegs par gyis la gos dri ma can dag gyon te gla mi'i srang du song la sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-8: des phyi de nyin par skra yegs par byas shing gos dri ma can dag gyon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-9: gla mi'i srang du song ste bsdad pa dang tshong dpon zhig khyim rtsig par byed pa de gla mi'i srang du 'ongs nas des gla mi gzhan dag khrid de khye'u de ma khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-11: yab bdag gis kyang gla rngan gyi slad du las bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-13: bu khyod shin tu gzhon pas khyod kyis gla rngan gyi phyir las byed par mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-15: ci khyod kyis bdag la dang por gla rngan stsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-17: mjug tu gla rngan sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-19: bdag gis je deng las bgyi yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-20: gal te khyod mnyes par gyur na gla rngan stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:171b-21: tshong dpon des khye'u de khrid nas khye'u des tshong dpon de'i khyim du gla rngan gyi phyir las bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-1: g-yos las byed pa na khye'u de myur ba myur bar las byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-2: de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-3: tsha bo khyod ci'i phyir g-yos las mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-5: zhang po dag kho bo sngon nyes par spyad pas dbul po'i khyim dag tu skyes shing des da ltar gla rngan gyi phyir las byed pa yin na gal te da g-yos las byas par gyur na 'di nas shi 'phos pa dag gi 'gro ba ji ltar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-7: tsha bo khyod gsar bu bul ba yin pas thams cad kyi tha na las par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do; ;khye'u de 'jig rten pa'i gtam rgyud la mkhas pa yin pas des gla mi de dag la gtam rgyud smra zhing myur ba myur bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-8: gla mi de dag kyang gtam rgyud mi thos kyis dogs nas de'i phyi bzhin myur ba myur bar lhags nas de'i nyin mo gla mi de dag gis las mang du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-9: khyim bdag gis kun tu spyod pa ni phye ma bred kyi dus kyi tshe las kyi mtha' dag la so sor rtog pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-10: tshong dpon de dgongs kar 'ongs te las kyi mtha' dag la so sor brtags pa dang ci tsam na nyis 'gyur gyi las byas par mthong nas des lag dpon gyi mi la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-11: ci khyod kyis las mi gzhan dag bkug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172a-15: 'o na ci'i phyir deng las mang du zin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-0: @172b khyim bdag gi bu 'di nad med par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-1: 'di 'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud la mkhas pas 'di 'jig rten gyi gtam rgyud zer zhing myur bar myur bar las byed pa na gla mi gzhan dag kyang gtam rgyud mi thos kyis dogs pas myur ba myur bar 'di'i phyir bzhin 'dong zhing las byed pas des na deng las mang du zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-2: tshong dpon des khye'u de la gla rngan nyis 'gyur sbyin par brtsams pa dang khye'us smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-4: bdag la gdugs tshod gnyis kyi gla rngan gcig car stsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-5: ma yin te 'di ltar kho bo khyod la dga' bas bya dga' sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-7: gal te khyod bdag la dgyes na ji srid du bdag khyod kyi sdum pa na sug las 'tshal ba de srid du bdag gi gla rngan khyod kyi phyag tu gzhag tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-9: de ltar gyis shig ;gang gi tshe de'i khyim zin pa de'i tshe na khye'u de'i gla rngan brtsis na kar sha pa na lnga brgyar ma chog nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-10: khye'u de ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-13: kho bos brid par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:172b-14: yab khyod bdag nyid chen po lags pas khyod kyis bdag ga la brid de 'di ltar bdag gis kar sha pa na lnga brgya'i ched du gla rngan gyi slad du las bgyis shing; sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-0: bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi'o snyam na de dag ma 'tshal bas yang bdag gi gzhan du @173a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-1: gla rngan gyi slad du las bgyi 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-2: tshong dpon de dad pa can zhig yin pas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-3: bu kho bos kha bskang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-4: yab bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skya bar mi 'gyur ba snyam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-5: bu khyod bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-7: song la bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-8: de nas khye'u de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-9: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gi bu des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-10: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kar sha pa na lnga brgya'i tshad du gla rngan gyi ched du tshong dpon che ge mo zhig gi sug las bgyis na de dag ma 'tshal nas tshong dpon des de'i kha skong bar bgyid na blang bar bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-11: bzhin bzang tshong dpon de dad pa can yin pas long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-12: bcom ldan 'das bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur lags pa snyam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-14: khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173a-15: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des tshong dpon de las kar sha pa na lnga brgya mnos te ma'i gan du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-0: yum kar sha pa na lnga brgya po 'di dag gis zhal zas sta gon mdzod cig @173b dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-1: bu kho mo la snod spyad 'ga' yang med cing mi blas dang gnas mal 'ga' yang med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-2: tshong dpon de nyid snod spyad dang mi blas dang gnas mal mang ba yin la dad pa can yin gyi song la de nyid la gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-3: khye'u de tshong dpon de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-4: yab bdag gi sdum pa na snod spyad dang mi blas dang gnas mal cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-5: khyod nyid kyis zhal zas sta gon mdzod cig dang bdag mchis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-6: rang [*ngang?] gi sug pa nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-7: tshong dpon de dad pa can yin pas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-8: bdag gi khyim gsar du brtsigs pa der sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-9: legs so snyam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-10: bu zhog ste song la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang gdugs tshod la spyan drongs shig dang kho bos zhal zas sta gon bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:173b-11: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des tshong dpon de'i lag tu kar sha pa na lnga brgya gtad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug nas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-0: bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge @174a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-1: slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-3: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-4: tshong dpon des kyang de nyid kyi mtshan mo zhal zas sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chur bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g-yar dgongs 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-6: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas tshong dpon de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-7: drug sde dag gis dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-8: su'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-9: khyim bdag gi bu che ge mo zhig gi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-10: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-11: de ni gla mi yin pas de ci zhig sbyin par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174a-12: khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim du dong la g-yar tshus bzar 'dong ngo zhes de dag khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag tu dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-0: 'phags @174b pa dag gdan tshus gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-1: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis khye'u tshus zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-4: drug sde dag kyang khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag tu khye'u tshus zos nas de nyid du dong ste 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-5: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed cing stobs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-6: de de na rgyu ba na drug sde dag gus par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-8: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-9: bcom ldan 'das 'di na 'phags pa kha cig gus par bgyis te mi 'tshal na bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur lags pa snyam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-11: bzhin bzang re zhig gnas mal gyi longs spyod kyis kyang khyod lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-12: kha zas kyi longs spyod kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gi bu de la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:174b-14: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-0: yang dag par gzengs bstod par @175a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-2: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-3: rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-6: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-7: tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po nas rgyal po'i khab tu lhags nas rgyal po'i khab tu dus ston byung bas tshong cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas de na tshong pa dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig 'dug pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-8: shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-9: khyim gang du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gsol pa'i khyim de na gor ma chags par bza' ba dang btung ba lhag pa'i chos cung zad yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-10: der dong la rin gyis btsal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-11: de dag gis smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-12: tshong dpon che ge mo zhig gi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol to zhes thos nas de dag zong thogs te der dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175a-13: tshong dpon bdag cag tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po nas rgyal po'i khab tu lhags nas rgyal po'i khab tu dus ston byung bas tshong cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas bdag cag ltog par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-0: khyod kyi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod dag @175b gsol bas bza' ba dang btung ba lhag pa'i chos cung zad yod na rin gyi phyir byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-2: bzhin bzang dag je lta'o zhes de khyim bdag gi bu de'i gan du song ste smras pa; bu tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po nas rgyal po'i khab tu lhags nas rgyal po'i khab tu dus ston byung bas tshong cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas de dag ltogs par gyur te rin gyis bza' ba dang; btung ba tshol du 'dir lhags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-3: lhag pa'i chos mang du yod nas rin gyi phyir byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-5: yab bdag rin gyi slad du mi stsol gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-6: sbyin pa'i chos kyi slad du de bzhin du stsol gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-7: de dag mchis su stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-8: tshong dpon des tshong pa de dag 'dug tu bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-9: khye'u des bza' ba dang btung bas de dag tshim par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-10: tshong pa de dag lus tshim pas ched du brjod pa 'di skad ces ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-11: tshong dpon gang gi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol cing bdag cag tshong pa lnga brgya yang bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par byas pa'i tshong dpon des ni rnyed pa dag legs par rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-13: bzhin bzang dag 'di ni kho bo'i zas ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-14: khyim bdag gi bu 'di'i zas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-16: 'di khyim bdag gang gi bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:175b-18: khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-0: de dag gi ded dpon gyis @176a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-2: 'o na 'di bdag gi chung po grogs kyi bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-4: de lta na 'di bdag cag gi zhang po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-5: gzhan dag gis kyang smras pa; de lta na 'di bdag cag gi tsha bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-7: mang po dag gis ni gcig dbyung bar nus la gcig gis ni mang po dag kyang dbyung bar mi nus so zhes des gzhi gting ste rin po che bzhag nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-8: shes ldan dag gang gis ci yongs su btang ba des de bzhin 'dir zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-9: der la las ni rin po che gcig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-11: la las ni mang po dag bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-12: de ltar der rin po che'i phung po chen po rnam par bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-13: ded dpon gyis khye'u la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-16: shes ldan dag bdag gis rin gyi phyir ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-18: kho bo cag khyod la rin byin pa ma yin te 'di ltar rin po che gcig gis kyang zas 'di lta bu brgya snyed 'grub pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176a-25: de nas khye'u de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-0: bcom @176b ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-1: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gi bu des 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam la bza' ba dang btung ba stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-2: de dag bdag la dga' bas dga' ba'i dbang du bgyis pa bgyid na bdag gis blang bar bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-4: bcom ldan 'das bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur lags pa snyam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-6: bu de ni me tog yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-9: khye'u des rin po che de dag blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-10: rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon bu med pa zhig dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-11: nor can dag dang tshong dpon dag dang ded dpon dag 'dus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-12: shes ldan dag bdag cag gis gang zhig grong khyer gyi tshong dpon du dbang bskur bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-13: bdag cag gi nang na sems can gang bsod nams che bar grags pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-15: bdag cag gis ji ltar shes par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:176b-17: sa bon kha dog sna tshogs dag rdza ma so btang ba'i nang du blugs shing gang gis kha dog gcig pa sha stag zin par 'gyur ba de bdag cag gis tshong dpon du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-0: de dag gis sa bon kha dog sna tshogs dag @177a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-2: de dag gis gzung bar brtsams pa dang gzhan thams cad kyis ni sa bon kha dog sna tshogs dag zin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-3: khyim bdag gi bu des ni sa bon kha dog gcig pa sha stag zin nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-4: bdag cag gis gla mi tshong dpon du dbang bskur bar ji ltar bya zhes de dag gis lan gsum gyi bar du de ltar byas pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-8: mi ma yin pa dag gis che bzhi phyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-9: khyim bdag gi bu 'di nyid tshong dpon du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-10: zhes de dag gis khye'u de grong khyer gyi tshong dpon du dbang bskur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-13: 'di la gcam gsag par bya'o snyam nas tshong dpon des kyang rang gi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177a-14: grong khyer gyi tshong dpon de'i chung mar byin nas de'i khyim nor mang zhing longs spyod dag gis 'phral kho na mngon par mtho bar gyur nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-0: de nas tshong dpon 'phral la mthos 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi khyim na dpal gyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad @177b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten nas bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol ba las gyur pa yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-1: de nas tshong dpon 'phral la mthos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-2: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon 'phral la mthos la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-3: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-4: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-5: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-6: rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-9: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:177b-10: de nas tshong dpon 'phral la mthos stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de longs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-4: nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chur bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-5: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g-yar dgongs 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-8: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas tshong dpon 'phral la mthos kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178a-11: de nas tshong dpon 'phral la mthos kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bca' dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed cing stobs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:178b-0: rnam grangs du mas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim @178b par byas shing bstabs nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-6: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-7: khyim bdag la 'di ltar 'dis aa mra'i 'khur ba zos so zhes bya ba de ltar rig par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-8: ji srid du 'dis bdag klan ka ma rnyed pa de srid du bdag gis 'di la brjod par bya'o snyam nas des khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-9: khyim bdag bdag 'ba' zhig gis aa mra'i 'khur ba dag zos par ma zad kyi drug sde 'di dag gis kyang aa mra'i 'khur ba dag zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-11: 'phags pa ci'i phyir de skad ces bdag 'ba' zhig gis aa mra'i 'khur ba dag zos par ma zad kyi drug sde 'di dag gis kyang aa mra'i 'khur ba dag zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-12: zhes zer zhes des spyos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-13: 'phags pa ci kho bo la aa mra'i 'khur ba dag med snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-14: des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181a-15: shes ldan dag aa mra'i 'khur ba dag gis sprog ma dag phye shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-0: de nas dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pas bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das @181b ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis bsod snyoms sgrub pa'i dge slong la dge slong ji ltar zas bsod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-2: dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pa la dge slong ji lta zas bsod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-5: des gsol pa; btsun pa te por zas bsod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par ni bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-6: 'di ltar khyim bdag drag shul can gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun spyos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-8: des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-10: dge slong khyim bdag drag shul can gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gnas su spyos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi slad rol tu zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:181b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-1: dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-4: dge slong dag khyed yang yang za ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-7: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-9: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-11: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-13: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-14: yang yang za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so; ;dge slong na ba zhig sman pa'i gnas su song ba dang des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-16: bzhin bzang kho bo la sman ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182a-17: 'phags pa je zhal tshus gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-0: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis @182b ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-1: 'phags pa de khyod kyi sman lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-2: gzhan du khyod kyis 'tsho bar mi spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-3: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-4: 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can lags pas de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-5: dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-7: de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-8: dge slong dag mchod rten gyi las dang dge 'dun gyi las dag byas pa na de dag bkres nas glos phab ste nyal zhing dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par mi nus pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-9: 'phags pa dag bstan pa la gcig tu brtson par bgyi ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-10: ci'i slad du glos phab ste gzims shing dge ba'i phyogs la tron mi mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-11: bzhin bzang dag kho bo cag bkres so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-12: 'phags pa dag zhal tshus gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-13: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-14: zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-16: de lta bas na las kyi dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:182b-17: dge slong gzhan dag lam du zhugs pa na bkres par gyur nas glos phab ste nyal zhing dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par mi nus pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-0: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag @183a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-1: lhags nas de dag gis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-3: bzhin bzang dag kho bo cag bkres so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-5: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-6: zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-8: de lta bas na lam gyi dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ci dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-10: mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-13: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-14: khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang du mi mngags te song la dge slong dag spyan drongs shig dang gdugs tshod gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183a-15: mi de gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-0: ji tsam @183b na dge slong gcig kyang mi snang nas de phyir log ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-1: khyim bdag de na dge slong med de bdag gis gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-4: mi de der song ba dang ji tsam na dge slong dag zan zos te phyir byung ba mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-6: khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-7: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-8: kho bo cag zan zos zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-9: mi de song ste khyim bdag de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-10: khyim bdag dge slong dag gi zhal nas kho bo cag zan zos zin to zhes byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-11: kva'i nang rje song la khyim bdag gi mchid nas tshur spyon gdugs tshod gsol dang ras yug chen 'bul lo zhes byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-13: 'phags pa dag khyim bdag gi mchid nas tshur gshegs gdugs tshod gsol dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-14: ras yug chen 'bul lo zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-15: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-16: kho bo cag gis spangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-17: mi de song ste khyim bdag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-18: khyim bdag dge slong rnams kyi zhal nas bdag cag gis spangs so zhes byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-19: khyim bdag des bdag gis bkrabs pa'i dge 'dun gyis bshos ma gsol to zhes zan bcad pa bsgrubs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:183b-20: de'i ngos kyi khyim mtshes dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag gos byin na'ang longs spyod par mi btub pas khyim bdag 'dis dge slong dag gis zan ma zos pa'i phyir zas bcad pa byas so zhes smod par byed /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-6: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang de'i shas che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-7: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-9: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-10: yang yang za na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-11: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-15: gos sbyin pa'i tshe dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-16: de la de ni dus yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-17: yang yang za na zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du za na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-18: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184a-19: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:184b-14: gos med cing gos kyi rin yang med pa las te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:186b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so; ;ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi don du 'dug gnas byed du bcug ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:190b-12: de bzhin du rim gyis ji tsam na 'bras chan rtsub po dang rtsabs mo bskol ba dag sbyin par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:190b-14: dga' bo nye dga' spyod yul tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:190b-17: bdag cag sgo 'phar brgya snyed 'das kyang lto khengs pa ba sgrub par dka' na da ltar 'di na bdag cag grib ma bsil ba dag la 'khod du yod na 'bras chan rtsub po dang rtsabs bskol ba yang mi 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:190b-18: gcer bu pa des kyang 'khor 'khor nas gcer bu pa de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-1: bdag cag gi spyod yul phrogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-6: kho bo de nas bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-7: sus sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-9: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong ji snyed lhags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-13: bdag cag mi drug cu yod na de dag shin tu brdegs te bskrad par mi nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-15: bdag cag gis shes pa can rem zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-16: ces brjod pa na drug sde re re la bdag cag mi bcu bcu rub ste shin tu brdeg par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-18: je khyim bdag la dri bar bya ba snyam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-19: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag khyim bdag gi gan du dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-20: khyim bdag khyod kyis 'dug gnas su la phul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-22: su la yang ma phul te 'di ltar gang de na 'dug pa da la bdag bsod snyoms kyis mkho ba stobs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-23: de dag gis smras pa; khyim bdag ni re zhig dbus na gnas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-24: zhes de dag 'dug gnas su dong nas drug sde dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-25: kva'e sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag khyed gang nas lhags te 'dir 'khod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-26: 'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang yang ma yin la 'dug gnas kyang ma yin gyi phyir byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191a-27: gal te byung na ni byung du zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-0: mi 'byung na kho bo cag gis khyed la mtshams chen po @191b gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-1: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-2: kva'e gcer bu pa sgre byi dag ci zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-3: 'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang yang ma yin la 'dug gnas kyang ma yin gyi phyir byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-5: gal te 'khod na ni 'khod du zad gal te mi 'khod na kho bo cag gis khyed la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-6: gcer bu pa can gyis shes pa can rem zhig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-7: drug sde re re la gcer bu pa bcu bcu rub ste de dag gis brdeg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-8: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-9: dga' bo nye dga' tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis smad par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-10: mig dang rna ba dag srungs shig ces de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-11: sgra byi dag phod yang dag na phyogs 'dir snun cig ces rkub tshos la sogs pa bstan te de dag rdeg tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-12: gang gi tshe gcer bu pa dag ngal bar gyur cing rdeg mi nus pa de'i tshe na drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag shin tu rem zhig ces drug sde re res kyang lag ngar brkyang pas kyang gcer bu pa lnga lnga sa la brdabs shing lag ngar bskums pas kyang gcer bu pa lnga lnga sa la brdabs nas de dag shin tu brdegs par brtsams te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:191b-13: dga' bo nye dga' pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung bar byung bar gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-0: rtsa ba'i ltung ba srungs shig ces drug sde dag gis de dag thal lcag dag dang khu tshur dag dang rdeg pa dag dang lcug ma dag gis shin tu gtal cing brims nas de dag gis gcer bu ba dag rdeg bzhin @192a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-1: du 'dug gnas kyi nang nas phyi rol tu 'dzings te byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-2: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis de dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-6: dge sbyong g-yul 'gyed pas char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-7: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-8: dga' bo nye dga' spyod yul tshig cing me mdag zhi bar ma gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-9: tshur sheg mnyan yod du 'dong ngo zhes de dag mnyan yod du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-10: lho lam nas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i rgol ba 'char ka zhes bya bar mnyan yod du 'ongs nas de 'gyed 'dod cing 'gyed pa'i yo byad kyi phyir tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-11: kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig bslabs te de'i phyir kho bo khyod dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab par byed par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-13: bram ze kho bo khyod dang 'gyed par mi 'dod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-15: de nas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-23: lag bzang ga la ba der song ste de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192a-24: kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig blangs te de'i phyir kho bo khyed dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab par byed par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-1: bram ze kho bo cag khyed dang 'gyed par mi 'dod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-3: de nas 'jig rten rgyang pan pa de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-5: kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig blangs te de'i phyir kho bo khyod dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa byed par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-6: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag cung zad yod dam snyam du bsams na yod par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-7: su la rag las snyam na bdag nyid la rag las par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-8: 'gyed pas gdul ba yin nam snyam na yin par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-9: yun ji srid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na zhag bdun 'das nas 'dul bar 'gyur bar mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-11: de ltar bya'o zhes des nyi ma dang po la 'gyed pa lhag ma dang bcas par btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-12: phyi de nyin par yang 'gyed pa lhag ma dang bcas par gtang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:192b-13: de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du yang 'gyed pa lhag ma dang bcas par btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-0: thams cad du lho lam nas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i rgol ba 'char ka zhes bya ba 'ongs nas de dang 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu gnyis nyi ma bdun pa deng gi bar du bkye na gcig gis kyang tshar ma chod la gnyis pas kyang tshar mchod do ces sgra grags nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag kha cig na ltad mo skyes @193a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-2: kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na der 'dus par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-4: bdag gi 'gyed pas gdul ba dag 'dus sam snyam na 'dus par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'jig rten rgyang phan pa de pham par byas shing rdugs par byas te 'gyed pa lhag ma ma lus par btang nas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa kun tu rgyu 'char ka tshar bcad pa dang de yang dad par gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-6: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-7: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-9: de de ltar rab tu phyung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-10: tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193a-11: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-0: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so @193b zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-1: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-2: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa; tsan dan bzhag pa lta bur rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-4: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-5: de nas 'khor de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di lta bu'i rgol ba tshar bcad do zhes ya mtshan skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin shes nas 'di ltar srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bden pa dag mthong zhing kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-7: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:193b-8: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-0: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan par byas te 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol pa dang chos la 'bab pa dang dge 'dun la bab par rnam @194a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'jig rten rgyang phan pa 'char ka snga dro tshar bcad nas phyi dro drug sde dag mnyan yod du lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-3: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-4: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-6: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus lho lam nas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i rgol ba bram ze kun tu rgyu 'char ka zhes bya ba 'gyed 'dod cing 'gyed pa'i yo byad kyi phyir 'ongs pa tshar bcad de g-yul las rnam par rgyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-7: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-9: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshogs can gnyis pa chos kyi dmag dpon chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor bas rgol ba gcig tshar bcad pa 'di ngo mtshar ci che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-10: gal te tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshar bcad par ma gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das slad na bzhugs pas de ngo mtshar mi che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-11: kho bo cag mi drug gis gcer bu pa drug cu tshar bcad pa ngo mtshar che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-12: rig pa'i gnas gang la dbyug pa'i rig pas lus la chos bshad pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-14: de'i tshe na ni 'tsho na da tsam 'tsho'am shi gtol med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194a-15: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis rlom par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-0: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan @194b 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-3: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-6: dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-9: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-11: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-13: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-14: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-15: 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pa'i dge slong gis bsod snyoms gcig bza' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-16: de las lhag par za na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:194b-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-1: yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-2: de nas khyim bdag de zong thogs te ri brags de nyid du phyin nas de khyim bdag de'i tshong khang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-3: khyim bdag gis gcer bu pa dag la brims par brtsams nas des khyim bdag de'i gan du mi mngags te grogs po sbyin gnas dag la brim par byas tshur shog ces sbran pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-4: khyim bdag de dad pa can yin pas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag yin gor ma chag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-6: song la blta'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-7: ji tsam na gcer bu pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba dag cig yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-8: mngon sum du mi snyan pa brjod pa ni sdug bsngal ba yin pas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-9: de dag zos te dong ba dang khyim bdag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-10: grogs po zhing bzang zhing sa bon bzang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-12: grogs po sa bon ni bzang na zhing ni gcer bu pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba'i sdig pa'i lta ba can dgon dung tshva sgo can tha chad sdig pa can gyi sa gzhi sha stag yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-14: grogs po zhing ches bzang ba gzhan yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-16: yod de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-18: grogs po de dag gi ming yang ma smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195a-20: ci de dag 'dir lhags par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-0: @195b gang dag drug sde dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-1: de dag gis re zhig ci byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-4: grogs po khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po nas nor bu mching bu dag blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-5: khyim bdag gis smras pa; bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos bzang po gzhan dag kyang yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-6: yod de gal te khyod kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-7: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-9: ma 'gags pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po gzhan dag mthong bar gyur na khyod mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-11: gal te de dag 'dir byon par gyur na bdag gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyis mkho ba bstab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-13: da ni bdag song la bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-14: khyim bdag des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der song ste mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-15: de nas khyim bdag des zong tshong khang du sbas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-16: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:195b-17: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:196a-0: btsun pa ri brags ga ge mo zhig na khyim bdag che ge mo zhig mchis pa des phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi slad du 'dug @196a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:196a-1: gnas bgyid du stsal te de de na gang gnas pa de la bsod snyoms kyis mkho ba stobs par bgyid cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:196a-2: de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag mthong bar 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du der dge slong dag cig bka' stsal na legs so //
