K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:200b-18: de dag gis drug sde dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te; stan ches dma' ba dag blangs nas mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:200b-19: drug sde dag gis de dag la chos bstan nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-2: bzhin bzang dag lto gang bas chog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-4: shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag yang dang yang du lto gang bas chog go zhes gsung ba las na 'di dag la na bza' mi mnga' gor ma chag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-5: 'di dag la na bza' dbul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-6: de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis drug sde dag la la ba srin bu'i mdog lta bu re re bskon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-7: de nas drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-8: bzhin bzang dag khyed cag yang dang yang du bsod snyoms zo zhig ces zer na bsod snyoms ji lta bu sbyin pa bltas 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-9: drug sde dag las gcig gis thab snod lta bu bzed nas 'dir lugs shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-10: don mthun de dag gis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-11: snod 'di re che zhig bkang bas 'di dag thams cad kyi lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis lam rgyags las snod de bkang ste phul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-12: drug sde gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin gzhan du mthar gyis re re nas thab snod lta bu re re bzed pa dang ji tsam na don mthun de dag gis lam brgyags las thab snod lta bu'i snod drug bkang ste phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-13: don mthun de dag gi lam brgyags thams cad zad par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201a-14: 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis 'dir shul brgyags nyung shas shig 'tshal te mchis pa de dag thams cad bas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-0: bdag @201b cag gis mi 'di kar sha pa na dag bskur te 'phags pa dag dang thabs cig mnyan yod du gtang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-1: 'phags pa dag gis bdag cag gi shul rgyags dag 'jol te stsol la sel ba dang bcas te gtang du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-2: bzhin bzang dag de ltar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-3: don mthun de dag gis drug sde dag gi phyi bzhin mi zhig kar sha ba na dag bskur te btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-4: drug sde dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-5: bzhin bzang je las 'di gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-6: des de byas nas drug sde dag gis yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-7: bzhin bzang las gzhan 'di yang gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-8: des de yang byas pa dang drug sde dag gis mi de ring zhig bkol bkol nas ji tsam na nyi ma yol bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-9: de'i 'og tu btang ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-11: mi de rang gis lam brgyags dag nyos te 'phags pa dang mnyan yod kyi nye 'khor thibs bor son pa na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas de gcig pu don mthun dag gi nang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-12: don mthun dag gis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-16: ci'i phyir chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-18: 'phags pa dag gis khyod kyi sel ba ma btang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:201b-20: shes ldan dag don gyis na de dag nyid kyis bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-0: de dag gis kho bo las sha stag byed du bcug nas ji tsam na @202a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-1: nyi ma yol bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-2: de'i 'og tu btang ste da nyos la song shig ces zer nas kho bo rang gis lam rgyags dag nyos te 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-3: mnyan yod kyi nye 'khor thibs por son pa na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-4: de dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-5: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste 'di ltar phan pa bya'o zhes zer la gnod pa kho na byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-8: 'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-11: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-14: de la bu mo g-yas zhar ma zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202a-15: bu mo de'i na zla gzhan thams cad bag mar btang ba na bu mo de g-yas zhar yin pa'i phyir slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-0: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de'i chung ma de rang @202b gi las dag gis dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-1: gnyis pa blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-2: de bzhin du chung ma bdun pa'i bar du blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-3: khyim bdag de yang skur pa gdab par 'gyur ba'i las dag gis chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-4: khyim bdag des yang bu mo bslangs pa dang mi ster cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-5: nged kyis ci'i phyir bu mo yongs su gtang mi sbyin no zhes kyang zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-6: khyim bdag des yugs mo dag bslangs pa dang yugs sa mo de dag kyang kho mo cag gis ci'i phyir bdag yongs su btang na khyod kyi khyim du 'jug ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-7: khyim bdag de rnam pa thams cad du yi chad nas rang nyid kyis khyim gyi so tshis dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-8: dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung po grogs shig 'ongs nas des khyim bdag de mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-11: khyim gyis so tshis dag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-13: khyed ci'i phyir rang nyid kyis khyim gyi so tshis dag byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-15: kho bos chung ma gcig blangs pa dang de rang gi las dag gis dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-16: gnyis pa blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-17: de bzhin du bdun pa'i bar du blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:202b-19: gzhan dag ci'i phyir mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-1: bu mo yongs su gtang mi sbyin no zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-3: yugs mo dag ci'i phyir mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-5: bslangs te de dag kyang kho mo cag gis ci'i phyir bdag yongs su gtang na khyod kyi khyim du 'jug ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-7: g-yas zhar ma ci'i phyir mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-9: song la slongs shig dang de dag bu mos yongs su skyo ba yin pas ster bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-10: khyim bdag de g-yas zhar ma'i pha'i khyim du song ste bde legs bde legs zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-14: bu mo'i slong mo slong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-17: de dag des yongs su skyo ba yin pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-21: nyi ma mang ge mo zhig la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-22: des de ltar gyis shig ces smras te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-23: de'i chung po grogs de yang 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis grogs po la g-yas zhar ma slongs shig ces bskul ba de ni bdag gis ma legs pa zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-24: de mtshan ngan pa yin pas des grogs po gsad par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-25: khyed kyis g-yas zhar ma thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-28: des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203a-29: rgya skegs shing gi so shing dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-0: nub tu sngas bstan @203b nyal ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-1: shin tu gnyid che zho 'thung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-2: chung ma g-yas zhar len byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-3: zhi ba'ang gnas nas nyams par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-5: rdo la lcags ni bab pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-6: khyod kyang chung ma gsod byed la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-7: de yang g-yas zhar yin pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-8: khyed gnyis gang rgyal gang pham lta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-9: grogs po bu mo da mtshan ngan ma yin pas khyod dus byed par gyur na mi rung gi ;de bor la kho bo'i sring mo yugs sa mo zhig yod pa de long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-11: grogs po da dor bar mi nus te 'on kyang 'di la thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-12: g-yas zhar ma'i ma des kyang bag rdzongs sta gon bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-13: khyim de drug sde dag gis khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim yin pas drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-14: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-15: ji tsam na 'khur ba dag sreg par byed pa mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-16: sring mo dus ston la bab tu nye'am ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-18: 'phags pa dag khyed kyi lcam mo bag mar mchi ba la thug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-19: de'i bag rdzongs sta gon bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-20: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-21: sring mo kho cag gis cung zad mi thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-22: 'phags pa dag khyed cag la su zhig gis dbul 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:203b-24: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-0: sring mo re zhig phugs na yod pa na gzhan @204a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-2: da 'phral du ci sbyin pa bltas 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-3: des bag brkyang ste de dag gi lhung bzed thams cad 'khur ba dag gis bkang nas drug sde dag gis de'i kha zas thams cad bsdus te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-4: ji tsam na khyim bdag de 'ongs pa dang chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-5: rje'i sras sbyin gnas dag byon par gyur nas de dag gis kha zas thams cad bzhes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-7: khyo ga de la bag rdzongs sta gon byed kyi bar du re zhig nyi ma nyung shas shig sdod cig ces gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-9: bzang mo des sdod par mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-10: je bu mo bag mar gtang bar gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-11: phyis nye du dag zan sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-13: rje'i sras de ni chung ma gsod pa lags pas de la gzhan sus kyang bu mo stsol bar mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-16: khyim bdag de de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-17: bu bdag cag gis kha zas dag sta gon byas par gyur pa gang yin pa de sbyin gnas dag gis bzhes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-18: de nye du dag gi phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-19: kha zas sta gon byed kyi bar du nyi ma nyung shas shig sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-22: gal te nyi ma de nyid la bag mar rdzong zhing sbyin na bag mar blang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-23: gal te mi sbyin na kho bo chung ma gzhan len gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-24: khyod kyi bu mo dor bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-25: khyim bdag de chung ma'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204a-26: bzang mo khyo ga de na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-0: gal te nyi ma de @204b nyid la bag ma rdzong zhing sbyin na bag ma blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-2: kho bo chung ma gzhan len gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-3: khyod kyi bu mo dor bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-5: rje'i sras de chung ma gsod pa lags pas gzhan su zhig gis de la bu mo stsol bar 'gyur zhes des bag rdzongs sta gon bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-6: khyo ga des kyang grogs po'i sring mo yugs sa mo blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-7: g-yas zhar ma'i ma des kyang kha zas sta gon byas nas yang khyim bdag de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-8: rje'i sras da khyo ga de'i gan du bzhud la bag ma len du shog cig ces gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-9: khyim bdag de de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-10: bu da bag ma len du shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-12: khyed kyis nyi ma de las yol bar byas pas da kho bo mi len to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-13: khyim bdag des khyo ga de bzung ste rgyal po'i pho brang du 'o dod bos nas shags la bkug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-14: khyo ga des khyim bdag de pham par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-15: g-yas zhar ma'i ma des bdag gi bu mo ma lom mo zhes ngu zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-16: de'i ngos kyi sdum mtshes dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-17: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-18: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste 'di ltar bu mo byin zin pa'i bar chad byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-20: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:204b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-1: 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-4: dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu byas par gyur pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-7: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-9: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-13: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205a-14: dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim rnams su dong ba las gal te de dag la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis phye dag dang 'khur ba dag dus kyis stobs par gyur la 'dod na dge slong de dag gis lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-0: de las lhag par len na ltung @205b byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-1: lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blangs nas phyi rol kun dga' ra bar dong la dge slong 'khod pa rnams la'ang bgo bsha' bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-2: bdag cag kyang bza' bar bya ste de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-3: dge slong zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-5: rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-6: gnyis las lhag pa ni rab tu mang po dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-7: khyim rnams su zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis khyim rnams su'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-8: dong ba las zhes bya ba ni song ba las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-9: gal te de dag la zhes bya ba ni dge slong de dag la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-10: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis zhes bya ba la dad pa can zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-11: sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-12: chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-13: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-14: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-15: phye dag ces bya ba ni phye dang 'de gu dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-16: 'khur ba dag ces bya ba ni bag tshos dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:205b-17: dus kyis stobs par gyur la zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du stobs par gyur la'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:210b-16: re zhig song zhig ces bya ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:210b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis spangs pa bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas drug sde dag spangs pas kyang za bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:210b-21: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis spangs pas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na ci'i phyir dge slong dag spangs pas kyang za bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:210b-22: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-0: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams @211a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-1: kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-4: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-7: dge slong dag ngas dge slong gis spangs pas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na khyed spangs pas kyang za bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-8: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-11: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-13: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-15: dge slong dag de ltar bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211a-16: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-0: yang dge slong gang zas zos zin cing spangs pa las bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' ba'am za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan @211b 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-2: khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas dge slong nad pa rab tu mang po dag gi nad g-yog rab tu mang po dag yod pa de dag gis bdag nyid zos nas nad pa rnams kyi lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms dag mnos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-3: dge slong nad pa rnams kyis za bar ma nus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-4: dge slong nad g-yog gis kyang bdag cag gis spangs so zhes za bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-5: kun dga' ra ba pa dang dge tshul dag kyang med nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-6: de dag gis kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zas kyi phung po chen po rnam par bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-7: der bya rog dag za ba na bya rog gi sgra 'byin pa chen po byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:211b-10: kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i nang na bya rog gi sgra 'byin pa chen po byung bar gyur ba 'di ci las gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-0: btsun pa khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sdum pa gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas dge slong bro 'tshal ba rab tu mang po dag gi bro g-yog rab tu mang po dag mchis pa de dag gis bdag nyid 'tshal nas bro 'tshal ba rnams kyis @212a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-1: g-yar bltams pa'i bsod snyoms dag mnos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-2: dge slong bro 'tshal ba rnams kyis 'tshal bar rngo ma thog cing dge slong bro g-yog dag gis kyang bdag cag gis spangs so zhes 'tshal bar mi bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-3: kun dga' ra ba pa dang dge tshul dag kyang ma mchis nas de dag gis kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zas kyi phung po chen po rnam par bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-4: der bya rog dag 'tshal ba na bya rog gi sgra 'byin pa chen po byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-6: ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-7: sbyin pa po rnams kyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir lhag por gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na lhag bor byas te bza' bar rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag por byas te bza' bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams kyis lhag por ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212a-11: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis bca' ba'am bza' ba rnyed cing za bar 'dod na dge slong des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-0: byin len byas la dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la spyod lam las @212b ma nyams pa gang yin pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-1: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du tsog bur 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-3: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-4: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 'tshal lags shing spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-5: yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par bgyis pa las bca' ba dang bza' ba rnyed cing 'tshal bar 'tshal na lhag por bgyis te bdag la stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-6: des kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas 'di skad ces khyod kyir gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-7: bzhud cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-8: de la dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bdag nyid kyis khams gnyis sam gsum zos nas lhag por bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-9: de la dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-10: bza' bar mi bya bar lag par byin nas khyod kyir [*kyis] gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-11: bzhud cig ces brjod par bya bas lhag por bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-12: gal te ze na 'ga' tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-13: rgyu lngas lhag por ma byas par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-15: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-19: spyod lam las nyams pa byed du 'jud pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-20: rgyu lnga po de dag gis ni lhag por ma byas par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-21: rgyu lngas ni lhag por byas par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:212b-23: mtshams kyi phyi rol ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-2: rgyab ma yin pa nas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-3: glo ma yin pa nas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-4: spyod lam las ma nyams pa byed du 'jud pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-5: rgyu lnga po de dag gis ni lhag por byas par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-6: gzhan yang rgyu lngas ni lhag por ma byas par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-8: mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-12: spyod lam las nyams pa byed du 'jud pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-13: rgyu lnga po de dag gis ni lhag por ma byas par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-14: rgyu lngas ni lhag por byas par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-16: mtshams kyi phyi rol ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-18: lhung bzed kyi gzhir ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-19: thu bar ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-20: spyod lam las ma nyams pa byed du 'jud pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-21: rgyu lnga po de dag gis ni lhag por byas par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-22: gcig gis lhag por byas pa mang po dag gis bza' bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-24: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-25: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-26: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-27: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213a-28: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-0: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par @213b bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-1: yang dge slong gang zas zos zin cing spangs pa las lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-2: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-3: drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-4: zas zos zin cing spangs pa las zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-5: lhag por ma byas par zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang bar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-6: bca' ba'am bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-7: 'cha' 'am zan zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-8: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-11: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-12: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong gis spangs pa la spangs par 'du shes pas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am bca' ba 'cha' 'am zan ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-13: dge slong gis spangs pa la yid gnyis za bas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:213b-14: dge slong gis ma spangs pa la spangs pa la 'du shes pas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' 'am zan nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-0: @214a *// dge slong gis ma spangs pa la yid gnyis za bas lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-2: btsun pa thug pa ji lta bu spang bar bgyi 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-3: nye bar 'khor gang la kha gzar gyen du 'greng ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-4: btsun pa skyo ma ji lta bu spang bar bgyi 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-5: nye bar 'khor gang la sor mo lnga mngon pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-6: nye bar 'khor mgul du btung ba la ni spangs pa med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-8: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-9: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-10: stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed de sum cu bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-12: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-13: de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad pa dang nor zad pa dang longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-14: bzang mo kho bos rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor sgrub pa mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214a-16: rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-0: de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong gi gan du song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la @214b mgo bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-4: bzhin bzang kho bo rab tu byung nas gsar bu yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-5: kho bos rab tu 'byin du mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-7: 'phags pa bdag dang po kho nar khyed kyi gan du mchis pas khyod kyis bdag dge slong 'ga' zhig la gtad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-8: dge slong de'i mkhan po spong ba pa dgon pa na bsam gtan byed pa zhig yod nas des de khrid de mkhan po'i gan du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-9: mkhan po rigs kyi bu 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na mkhan pos thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di rab tu dbyung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-10: rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-12: bu bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag shan pa'i gnas su gtang ba ni bla'i rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas 'doms par mi byed rjes su ston par mi byed pa ni mi rung ngo zhes bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-14: mkhan po rab tu dbyung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang bdag gis 'di klog pa dang slob tu stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-15: dge slong des de rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-16: bzhin bzang 'di khyed kyi slob dpon yin pas klog pa dang slob tu 'jud par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:214b-17: kun tu spyad pa gang yin pa de 'di la dris te gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-0: des klog pa dang slob tu 'jud pa na @215a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-1: rgan zhugs de brjed ngas pas yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin nas des de mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-2: ltung ba 'chags su 'jud par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-4: bdag gis slob dpon 'dis bdag rtag tu mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-5: ltung ba 'chags su 'jud pas bdag gis kyang 'di mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-6: ltung ba 'chags su bzhugs pa'i thabs ci yod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-7: khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim bdag de la chos bstan par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-9: dge slong des rgan zhugs de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-11: khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag ltar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-12: de gnyis khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag tu dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-14: 'phags pa gnyis gdugs tshod gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-15: khyim bdag kho bo cag gnyis zan zos zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-17: snoms te bzhud la lhag por mdzad de gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-18: des rgan zhugs kyi gdong du bltas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215a-21: de gnyis kyis byin len byas te dong nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-0: rgan zhugs khyod chu 'tshag gam 'on te @215b gtsug lag khang du song ste lhag por byed du 'jud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-2: lhag por bgyid du stsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-3: dge slong des chu btsag par btsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-4: rgan zhugs kyis bsod snyoms khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-5: gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas des bdag nyid kyi bsod snyoms la lhag por byed du bcug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-6: de'i bsod snyoms la lhag por byed du ma bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-7: dge slong des chu btsags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-8: gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-9: rgan zhugs lhag por byed du bcug gan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-12: dge slong des 'dug ste zos pa dang rgan zhugs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-13: slob dpon je skabs phye shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-15: rgan zhugs kyis smras pa khyod la ltung ba byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-16: chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-20: khyod kyis lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-22: kho bos khyed la lhag por byed du bcug gam zhes ma dris sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-24: bdag gis bdag nyid kyi bgyid du stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:215b-26: rgan zhugs kho bo ltung ba mi 'chags kyi 'di ltar khyod ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro zhes des dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-0: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du dge slong zas zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang @216a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-2: 'di zo zhig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-4: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-7: dge slong khyod shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-8: 'di zo zhig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-11: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-13: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-0: dge slong dag @216b de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-1: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-2: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-4: 'di zo zhig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-5: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-6: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig pa'am gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-7: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-8: zas zos zin cing spangs pa la zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-9: yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-10: skabs tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-12: ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang dge slong 'di ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-13: de nyid rkyen du byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-16: 'di zo zhig ces bya ba ni bca' ba dang bza' ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:216b-17: lhag por ma byas pa'i zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-0: bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya @217a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-1: ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga mo dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-2: dus kyis stobs na zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du stobs na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-3: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-4: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-7: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-8: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-9: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-10: dge slong gis ji tsam du cung zad shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-11: 'di zo zhig ces lhag por ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-13: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-14: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-15: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed de sum cu lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-0: de'i tshe na lhas byin dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing bza' ba za nas dge slong don nyung @217b ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing bza' ba za bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-5: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-8: lhas byin khyod dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba'i nang na 'dus shing za ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-11: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-13: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-15: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:217b-16: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-0: 'dus shing za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad @218a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-1: do; ;dge slong rab tu mang po na ba dag sman pa'i gnas su dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-2: de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-3: bzhin bzang kho bo cag la je sman ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-5: 'phags pa dag zhal tshus gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-9: ma lags te dge slong snyung ba ji snyed pa dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-10: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-11: 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa thugs rje can lags pas de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-12: zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-14: de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-15: dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi dang mchod rten gyi las dag byas nas de dag bkres pas glos phab ste nyal cing dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par mi nus pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-16: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-17: de dag gis dris pa 'phags pa dag bstan pa la gcig tu brtson par bgyi ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-18: ci'i slad du glos phab ste gzims shing dge ba'i phyogs la tron mi mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-21: ci'i slad du zhal tshus mi gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218a-24: ci dge 'dun thams cad gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-0: ma lags te khyed cag kho na @218b gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-1: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-3: de lta bas na las kyi dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-4: dge slong dag don mthun dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'dong ba na ci tsam du ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag gis smras pa; bzhin bzang dag kho bo cag ri brags su bsod snyoms la rgyu'i bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-5: don mthun dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-6: 'phags pa dag shul 'di na chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pa mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-7: tshur gshegs dang bdag cag nyid kyis bsod snyoms gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-8: ci gcig gis thams cad sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-9: ma lags te la las bzhi la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-11: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes dge slong de dag gis shas cher zan bcad pa byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-13: de lta bas na lam gyi dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-14: dge slong rab tu mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig grur zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-15: ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ri brags zhig tu phyin nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-16: bzhin bzang dag kho bo cag ri brags su bsod snyoms la rgyu'i bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:218b-17: don mthun dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-1: dag gru'i shul 'di na chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pa mchis kyis tshur gshegs dang bdag cag nyid kyis bsod snyoms gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-2: ci gcig gis thams cad sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-3: ma lags te la las bzhi la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-5: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes dge slong de dag gis shas cher zan bcad par byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-7: de lta bas na grur zhugs pa ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug phud kyi dus ston dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-10: lo lnga'i dus ston bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-11: de na dge slong rnams kyis 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-12: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-15: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-16: ci dge 'dun thams cad gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-17: 'phags pa dag bdag cag la dge 'dun thams cad gsol ba'i 'byor pa gang lags pa de lta bu ga la mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-18: 'di ltar la las nyi shu gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219a-19: la las sum cu gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-0: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom @219b ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-2: de lta bas na 'dus pa chen po'i dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-3: gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bden pa dag ma mthong ba de'i tshe na 'od ma'i tshal kun tu 'tsho dag la phul bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-4: gang gi tshe bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-5: 'od ma'i tshal kun tu 'tsho dag las phrogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phul lo; ;rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun tu 'tsho dag gi nang du rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-7: 'phags pa dag 'di bdag gi zhang po lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-8: ji srid du 'gyur ba bsten par mi bgyid kyi bar du 'di gcig pu gzhag tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-9: gang gi tshe 'gyur ba bsten par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-10: bdag gis 'di yang bskrad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-11: zhes rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kun tu 'tsho de la kha zas kyi mkho ba stobs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-12: dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag kun tu 'tsho des mthong nas de shin tu dad pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-13: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-14: bdag gis kyang dge slong rnams kyi gdugs tshod bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-16: ci dge 'dun thams cad kyi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:219b-17: ma lags te bdag gis rgyal pos zhal zas kyi mkho ba stobs par bgyid pa ltar bdag la dge 'dun thams cad kyi gdugs tshod bgyi ba'i 'byor pa gang lags pa de lta bu ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-1: nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'i gdugs tshod bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-2: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus shing za ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-5: de lta bas na dge slong gi zas kyi dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-7: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-8: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-10: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-11: 'dus shing za na dus ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-12: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-18: dge sbyong gi zas dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-19: de la de ni dus yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-20: 'dus shing za na zhes bya ba ni mi mthun par za na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-21: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220a-23: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-0: gzhan @220b yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-1: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-2: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-3: na ba dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-4: dge slong na ba zas gcig gis 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-5: las dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-6: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi las tha na phyag dar re lde tsam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-7: dkyil 'khor ba ma la tsam byas pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-8: lam dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-9: dge slong dpag tshad phyed du song ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-10: de'i phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-11: grur zhugs pa dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-12: dge slong grur zhugs te dpag tshad phyed du song ba'am de'i phyed du song ste phyir 'ongs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-13: 'dus pa chen po dus so zhes bya ba ni spags pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-14: dge sbyong gi zas dus te zhes bya ba ni 'di las phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba dag 'khod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-15: de yang dge sbyong zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-16: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-17: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-18: dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas 'dus shing bza' ba za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-19: dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du yid gnyis za bas 'dus shing bza' ba za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:220b-20: dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol tu mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes pas 'dus shing bza' ba za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-1: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu yid gnyis za bas 'dus shing bza' ba za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-2: gnas gnyis po gzhi'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-3: khang khyim gyi gnas de gnyis yod na de na gang dag gzhi'i gnas su za ba de dag gis khang khyim nas dge slong dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-4: ma dris par za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-5: gang dag khang khyim du za ba de dag gis kyang gzhi'i gnas nas dge slong dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-6: ma dris par za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-7: gsum za zhing gcig las byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-8: gsum rdzogs par bsnyen cing gcig rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-9: zas brim pa tha na lan tshva pho tshums gang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-10: ldam ldum srang gcig tsam 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-11: gnas so sor nges pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-12: sbyin bdag na re gang dag 'di na 'khod pa de dag la sbyin no zhes zer na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-14: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-15: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do; ;'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-0: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos nye bar 'khor la sogs pas sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas @221b pa de'i tshe na de dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-1: bud med kyi yul ni sred pa spyad pa yin pas bud med kyis de dag mthong nas brang brdungs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-2: 'di dag skyed pa gang dag gis 'di dag skyes ma thag gi kha lan tshvas 'gengs par mi nus pa dang bla phrag tu khron pa bcug ste 'brang bar ma nus pa de dag gis ci thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-3: bcu bdun sde dag nyam nga bar gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-4: bdag cag gis zan bcad par gyur pa ni bla'i tshig ngan pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos par gyur pa ni mi rung ngo zhes de dag de nyid nas phyir log ste de dag gis zan bcad par byas nas de dag gis ji srid du lus la mdangs yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas gang gi tshe lus las mdangs yal bar gyur pa de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-5: nye dgas de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-6: ae ma'o bcu bdun sde dag ci gal te zas gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-8: ci tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa tsam gyi zas zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-11: kho bo cag gis ma zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-12: 'o na ci'i phyir glos phab ste nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:221b-13: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-0: grong khyer gyi skabs mo can dag ni skyed mos tshal la dga' bas de dag bza' ba dang btung ba khyer @222a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-1: te mnyan yod kyi phyi rol rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong nas 'cha' bar byed za bar byed 'thung bar byed pa na bcu bdun sde dag gis de dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-2: lto ba la nyug par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-3: tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-4: mgon po khyed kyis legs gsungs mang po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-5: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten 'di na spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-6: bkres nyams lus kyi tshor ba ma mchis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-7: thub pa de ni khyod kyis legs gsungs mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-9: 'phags pa dag gsol na bzhed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-11: de dag gis bcu bdun sde dag las bza' ba dang btung ba byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-12: de dag gis longs spyad nas de dag gis zung du bsdebs te 'chag cing kha don bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-13: nye dgas de dag kha ton byed pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-15: bcu bdun sde dag gis shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-16: btsun pa nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis bden chos mngon par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-17: sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gis len pa po la zas sbyin pa ni gnas lnga sbyin par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-23: bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa ni legs par gsungs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222a-24: zos na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-2: khyed dus ma yin par bzar rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-3: gal te dus su ma rnyed na kho bo cag gis ltogs te 'chi bar bya'am ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-4: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dus ma yin par bca' ba dang bza' ba za bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-9: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bcu bdun sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-12: dge slong dag khyed dus ma yin par bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' zhing za ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-16: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:222b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-0: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos @223a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-1: rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-2: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-3: yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha'am za na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-4: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni bcu bdun sde'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-5: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-6: dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin pa gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-7: skya rengs ma shar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-9: bca' ba'am bza' ba zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-10: bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-11: 'cha'am za na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-16: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-17: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-18: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223a-19: dge slong gis dus ma yin pa la dus ma yin par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-0: dge slong gis dus ma yin pa la yid @223b gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-1: dge slong gis dus su dus ma yin par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-2: dge slong gis dus su yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-4: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-5: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-6: dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-8: tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i kun tu spyod pa ni grong ngam grong rdal gang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-9: nye bar rten cing gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-10: de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-11: grong ngam grong rdal de nyid du lus shin tu bsrungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-12: dbang po rnams kyis shin tu bsdams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-13: dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag pas bsod snyoms la 'jug cing gal te 'bras chan gsher pa rnyed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-14: lhung bzed kyis len par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-15: gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyi snod kyis len par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-16: de grong ngam grong rdal der bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:223b-17: 'bras chan gsher ba ni za bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-1: chan skam po ni bskams nas rdza ma so btang ba bkang ste 'jog par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-2: de rlung ldang ba'am yul ngan 'byung ba'am char pa 'bab pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-3: lhags pa 'byung ba gang dag byung bar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-4: rlung langs pa'am yul ngan byung ba'am char pa bab pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-5: lhags pa byung ba de lta bu'i tshe 'bras chan skam po chu dron mos sbangs te zos nas bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs la gson zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rjes su thugs brtse bas dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-14: gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs pas don 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs par bzhed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-15: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224a-16: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-0: khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu gtsug lag khang @224b rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long zhig ces gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-2: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-3: khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu gtsug lag khang rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-5: gtsug lag khang rgyu zhing gshegs pa na tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-6: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang na 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po dag bting zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i gtsug lag khang na 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po dag bting zhing 'dug pa gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-8: gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-9: kun dga' bo 'bras chan skam po rab tu mang po bting ba 'di dag su'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-10: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nag po'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-11: grong ngam grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:224b-12: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-0: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te grong ngam grong rdal de nyid du lus shin tu bsrungs pa dang @225a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-1: dbang po rnams kyis shin tu bsdams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-2: dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag pas bsod snyoms la 'jug cing gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyis len par bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-3: gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na ni lhung bzed kyi snod kyis len par bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-4: de grong ngam grong rdal der bsod snyoms la brgyus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-5: gtsug lag khang du mchis te 'bras chan gsher ba ni 'tshal bar bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-6: 'bras chan skam po ni bsams nas rdza ma so btang ba bkang ste 'jog par bgyid cing de bser ma ldang ba'am yul ngan byung ba'am dgung char 'bab pa'am dgung lhags 'byung ba gang dag byung bar gyur ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-7: bser ma langs pa'am yul ngan byung ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-8: dgung char 'bab pa'am dgung lhags byung ba de lta bu'i tshe 'bras chan skam po chab dron mos sbangs te 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-9: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-10: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-11: kun dga' bo dge slong dag gsog 'jog byas pa za'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225a-15: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la @225b sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nag po la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-2: nag po khyod bca' ba dang bza' ba gsog 'jog byas pa za ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang mi sbyor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-5: ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson pa dang sbyor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-7: brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-9: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-10: yang dge slong gang bca' ba dang bza' ba gsog 'jog byas pa 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-11: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa nag po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-12: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-13: bca' ba dang bca' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-14: gsog 'jog byas pa zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-15: gsog 'jog byas pa rnam pa gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-16: snga dro byin len byas pa phyi dro'i bar du gsog 'jog byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-17: phyi dro byin len byas pa thun stod las yol bar gsog 'jog byas pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:225b-18: 'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-0: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang @226a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-1: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-4: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-5: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-6: dge slong gis gsog 'jog byas pa la gsog 'jog byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-7: dge slong gis gsog 'jog byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bca' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-8: dge slong gis gsog 'jog ma byas pa gsag 'jog byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-9: dge slong gis gsag 'jog ma byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-10: dge slong gis lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu dang kha gzar dang kha phor dang tsha khug dang lhung bzed kyi snod dang gos dang man shel dang khri dang khri'u dang 'khar ba dang bum pa dang ril ba dang lde mig dang lde mig kyog po gsog 'jog byas pas 'bags pa za na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226a-11: dge slong gis gsog 'jog byas pas kha dang gsog 'jog byas pas lag pa dag gis bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-0: dge slong gis me tog dang 'bras bu gsog @226b 'jog byas pa dang dge slong ji tsam du gsog 'jog byas pa za na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-1: dge slong gis kha ma bkrus par skom 'thung na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-3: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-4: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-5: gsog 'jog gi ltung byed de sum cu brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-7: tshe dang ldan ba nag po chen po ni thams cad dur khrod pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-8: de'i lhung bzed kyang dur khrod pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-9: chos gos kyang dur khrod pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-10: bsod snyoms kyang dur khrod pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-11: gnas mal yang dur khrod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-12: ji ltar lhung bzed dur khrod pa yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-13: 'di lta ste nye du dag gis shi zhing dus la bab pa'i rdze'u dur khrod du 'dor bar byed pa de tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos gyo mo kha gzhogs te bsregs nas lhung bzed du byin gyis brlabs shing 'chang bar byed de de ltar lhung bzed dur khrod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-14: ji ltar chos gos dur khrod pa yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:226b-15: 'di lta ste nye du dag gis shi zhing dus la bab pa'i gos dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-0: dur khrod du 'dor bar byed pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos bkrus te drubs shing khab sgyur nas chos gos su byin gyis brlabs shing 'chang bar byed de de ltar chos @227a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-1: gos dur khrod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-2: ji ltar bsod snyoms dur khrod pa yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-3: 'di lta ste nye du dag gis shi zhing dus la bab pa'i zas lnga dur khrod du 'dor bar byed pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos blangs shing za bar byed de de ltar bsod snyoms dur khrod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-4: ji ltar gnas mal dur khrod pa yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-5: 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po dur khrod du gnas mal byed de de ltar gnas mal dur khrod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-6: gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas byung ba de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po tsho ba dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag rgyas par gyur cing de yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-7: gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas ma byung ba de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang rke ba dang skem pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-8: lus ma thob par gyur cing de yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-9: sgo bas de mtshan mar bzung nas 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas byung ba de'i tshe na tsho ba dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag rgyas par gyur cing 'di yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227a-10: gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi ngas ma byung ba de'i tshe na 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di ring ba dang nyam chung ba dang rke ba dang skem pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-0: lus ma thob @227b par gyur cing 'di yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-1: 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di mi sha mi za'am snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-2: thams cad du yang 'phags pa nag po mi sha za'o zhes sgra grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-3: mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-4: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu mo zhig byung nas bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-5: dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de dus la bab nas nye du rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-9: dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-10: bsregs shing dong nas de'i chung ma dang bu mo gnyis mtha' gcig tu dong ste bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-11: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po de'i gdong du lta zhing sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-12: bu mo des 'phags pa nag po chen po de'i gdong du lta zhing sdod pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-13: mthong nas kyang ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-14: yum 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di bya rog mo zhar ma bzhin du nges par rtog cing sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-16: dge slong dag bram ze'i bu mo zhig smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:227b-17: nye bar smras par gyur te des nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pas bram ze'i bu mo de tshe rabs lnga brgyar bya rog mo zhar mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo de tshe rabs lnga brgyar bya rog mo zhar mar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to zhes sgra grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-2: bram ze mo des bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bu mo tshe rabs lnga brgyar bya rog mo zhar mar 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-3: de nas bram ze mo des bu mo de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-5: bcom ldan 'das bu mo 'di la bzod pa mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-6: 'dis rab tu sdang pa'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po ma smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-8: ci ngas 'ga' zhig la mna' 'dor bar bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-9: gal te bu mo 'dis rab tu sdang pa'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras par gyur na sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-10: mnyan yod na bram ze'i khye'u dag gis 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha za'o zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-12: shes ldan dag ci yang dag pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228a-13: 'on te de yang dag pa ma yin ba bdag cag gis 'phags pa nag po chen po bgam par byas bdag cag las gcig shi ba'i cha lugs su byas la de bdag cag gis dur khrod du bskur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-0: bdag cag @228b las gang zhig shi ba'i cha lugs su bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-1: khyod shi ba'i cha lugs su gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-5: kho bo cag gis khyod bsrung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-6: des shi ba'i cha lugs su byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-7: de dag gis de khur dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te khyogs spyil du bzhag nas mnyan yod nas phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-8: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po yang mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te des de mthong nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-9: bdag dgang dka' ba 'di'i don du grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs te ci rung phyir log la zas lnga po 'di dag nyid bza' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-10: bram ze'i khye'u des de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-11: shes ldan dag 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di phyir log pas kho bo zos par mi 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-13: kho bo cag 'khod bzhin du ji ltar za bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-14: de dag gis de dur khrod du bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-15: mtha' gcig tu dong nas tshang tshing dang lhab lhub dag gi nang du mgo bsrings te bsdad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-16: der wa zhig gis bgrod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-17: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-18: was zas lnga po dag zos shing bdag gi zan gcad par gyur na mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-20: des myur ba myur bar 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:228b-21: bram ze'i khye'u de skrag ste kho bo zos kho bo zos zhes ngu bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-1: khye'u de dag dbyug pa thogs te myur ba myur bar dong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-2: 'phags pa drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs shing sdig pa'i las rtsub po 'di dang 'di lta bu lhag par spyod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-6: bzhin bzang dag khyed kyis kho bo mtshon thogs te sha gcod cing za ba mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-8: 'o na ci'i slad du myur ba myur bar byon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-9: bzhin bzang dag kho bo la blo skyes pa wa 'dis zas lnga po dag zos shing bdag gi zan chad par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas myur ba myur bar 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-10: 'phags pa zas lnga po dag gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-11: mi sha gsol ni ma 'tshal gyi 'di ltar thams cad du 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha gsol zhes sgra grags bar gyur to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-13: dge slong dag byin len byed du ma gzhug par za ba las gyur pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-14: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste za na de nyid dpang por 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229a-15: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis byin @229b len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-1: de dag gis byin len du yod mi shes nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-3: byin len ni rnam pa lnga ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-8: lus dang 'brel bas lus dang 'brel bar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-9: bzhag pa'i cho ga nyid ni lnga pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-10: ji ltar lus kyis lus su zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-12: de ltar lus kyis lus su'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-15: ji ltar lus kyis lus dang 'brel bar zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-19: lhung bzed kyis sbyin par byed cing lhung bzed du len par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-20: de ltar lus dang 'brel bas lus dang 'brel bar ro //
