K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-22: dge slong dag smad pa zhes bya ba'i yul gyi mi dag yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-23: de dag ma yang smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:229b-25: phu nu dang bu sring yang smod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-0: dge slong gang der 'gro ba des dkyil 'khor byas te 'dir zhog cig ces brjod par bya zhing de dag gis der gang bzhag pa de byin len byas par @230a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-2: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus byin gyis brlabs te bza' bar bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-3: de ltar bzhag pa'i cho ga nyid ni lnga pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-4: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams la shing tog dag 'bul bar byed pa na dge slong rnams de dag mi len nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-5: 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma gshegs pa de'i tshe na ni gzhan mu stegs can dag sbyin gnas lags mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-6: de ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pas khyed cag sbyin gnas lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-7: gal te khyed cag mi bzhes na ci bdag cag dge ba'i shul rgyags dang bral ba dag gis 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi bar bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-8: bzhes shig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-9: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-11: blang bar bya zhing blangs nas rung bar bya ste bza' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-12: de dag gis rung ba du yod mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-14: rung ba ni rnam pa lnga ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-15: lnga gang zhe na mes rung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-19: ne tsos rma phyung bas rung ba nyid ni lnga pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230a-20: gzhan yang rung ba lnga ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-1: sa bon gyi chos med pa nyid ni lnga pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing tog dag byin len byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-3: bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-4: de dag gis byin len du yod mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-6: lag pa bkan par byin len lnga ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-12: lhung bzed kyi gzhi nyid ni lnga pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-13: dge slong rnams shing tog dag re re nas rung bar byed du 'jug pas yun ring du thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa phung por byas te mes gnas gnyis sam gsum du reg par byas na thams cad du rung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-15: mtshon dang sen mos ni re re nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-16: khyim pa rnams shing tog dag mi snyoms par 'drim par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-18: dge tshul dag 'drim du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-19: dge tshul dag kyang mi snyoms par 'drim par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-21: dge slong dag gis lag pa dag bsnyal te byin len byas nas brim par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-22: 'on kyang ma snyoms par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-24: brim par bya ba gces pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-26: tha ma dag so sor bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-27: gang dag 'drim par byed pa de dag gis phyis thams cad kyi tha chad dag thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:230b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-0: 'drim par byed pa'i skal ba ni mkhan @231a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-1: po dang slob dpon dag gis mnod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-2: de dag gis bzang po dag thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-4: de dag gi drung na 'dug pa dag gis mnod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-5: de dag langs shing langs shing rab tu mang po dag gi skal pa dag byin len byed du 'jug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-7: stan las ma 'phags pas; ji tsam nus pa de tsam dag byin len byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-8: 'drim pa na de dag yang byin len byed du 'jud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-10: stan las ma 'phags pas gang dag len nus pa de dag ni byin len byed du bcug zin par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-11: stan pas ma 'phags pas gang dag len mi nus pa de dag ni yang byin len byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-12: khyim pa dag na re 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis kyang brim par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-13: zhes zer ba na dge slong dag mi btub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-15: 'drim du gzhug par bya'o; ;de dag dang por 'dzin cing dge slong dag phyis 'dzin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-17: dge slong dag gis dang por gzung bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-18: phyis khyim pa dag gis gzung bar bya'o; ;dge slong rnams dge slong dag las blangs pa gang dag yin pa de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-19: yang byin len byed du 'jud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-0: dge slong dag las blangs gang dag @231b yin pa de dag gi byin len ni de nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-1: khyim pa dag las blangs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byin len byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-2: gtong ba na dang por khyim pa dag gis gtong zhing phyis dge slong dag gis gtong bar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-3: dge slong rnams de dag gsog 'jog byas pa yin no zhes 'dor bar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-5: dang por dge slong dag gis gtang bar bya zhing phyis khyim pa dag gis gtang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-6: phyi de nyin par dge 'dun la brim par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-7: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge 'dun la zhun mar gyi bum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-10: bu ram gyi dbu ba'i bum pa dag 'bul ba na dge slong dag mi len nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-11: blang bar bya zhing blangs nas dge 'dun la brim par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-12: de dag gis chos gos dag snum par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-14: bar du rtsva'am lo ma dag bcug ste brim par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-15: de dag bzung ste 'greng ba na ngal bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-18: de dag gis bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-19: 'dril nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:231b-21: de dag gis de dag zos nas de dag nyid la phyir sbyin nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-0: 'phags pa gzhun mar dang 'bru mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bu @232a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-1: ram gyi dbu ba dag phul na bum pa dag ma phul lam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-2: bum pa dag kyang khyed nyid snoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-3: de dag gis mnos te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-5: de dag chu'i rdzing bu zab mo'i nang du zhag bdun nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-6: brgyad gzhug par bya zhing gang gi tshe nya'am rus sbal lam sbal pa'am chu srin byis pa gsod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-7: nya khyi ba dag gis ma lus par ldog par gyur pa de'i tshe na rung ba'i khang par bcug ste spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas de dag gis ji ltar byin len byed du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-9: ji ltar byin len byed du ma bcug pa mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-11: rnam pa lngas ni byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-12: rnam pa lngas ni byin len byed du bcug par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-13: rnam pa lnga po gang dag gis byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-14: mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-18: lag pa khas phub pas byin len byed du 'jug pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-19: rnam pa lnga po de dag gis ni byin len byed du ma bcug par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-20: rnam pa lnga po gang dag gis ni byin len byed du bcug par brjod par bya zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232a-21: mtshams kyi phyi rol ma yin pa na 'dug pas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-0: @232b mi 'thob pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-1: glo ma yin pa nas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-2: rgyab ma yin pa nas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-3: lag pa khas phub pa ma yin pas byin len byed du 'jud pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-4: rnam pa lnga po de dag gis ni byin len byed du bcug par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-6: drug sde dag byin len byed du bcug pa dang byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za bar byed nas dge slong don nyung du dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-7: ci'i phyir dge slong dag byin len byed du bcug pa dang byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-9: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-12: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-16: dge slong dag ngas byin len byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na khyed byin len byed du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:232b-17: byin len byed du ma bcug pa yang za ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-3: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-5: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-7: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-10: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-11: yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-12: dge slong dgon pa dgon pa na gnas pa rnams la chu dang so shing gi byin len stobs pa med nas de dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal dag bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-13: grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233a-16: kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong dgon pa pa dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal dag bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-0: grong @233b mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-1: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad pas dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa na gnas pa rnams la chab dang so shing gi byin len stobs pa ma mchis nas de dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal dag bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-2: grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-4: de lta bas na chu dang so shing ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-5: glang po che cang shes dang spre'u cang shes dang dom cang shes dag yod nas de dag gis dge slong rnams la shing tog dag 'bul ba na dge slong rnams 'gyod pas de dag mi len nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-6: gang la len pa yod pa de la stobs pa yang yod pas de dag gis bstabs pa ni byin len byas par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang bslab pa la gus pa dang bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-9: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-10: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:233b-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-0: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab @234a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-1: pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste yang dge slong gang ma byin par kha nas mid pa'i zas za na chu dang so shing ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-2: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-3: ma byin par zhes bya ba ni de la skyes pa'am bud med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-4: ma ning gang dag gis kyang ma byin par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-5: kha nas mid pa'i zas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-6: bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-7: za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-8: chu dang so shing ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni chu dang so shing bzhag ste'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-12: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-13: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-14: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-15: dge slong gis byin len ma byas pa la byin len ma byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234a-16: dge slong gis byin len ma byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha'am za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-0: dge slong gis byin len byas pa la byin len ma byas par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang bza' ba @234b 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-1: dge slong gis byin len byas pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang bza' ba 'cha'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-3: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-4: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-6: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen pos las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas thams cad dur khrod pa dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis shing dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas yang dag pa ma lags pas skur bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-9: dge slong dag rigs kyi bu nag po chen po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas nag po chen po nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-10: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:234b-13: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-0: @235a *// las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-1: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-2: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-4: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-5: grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir rang sangs rgyas bla ma zhes bya ba zhig nye bar rten cing gnas pa de lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te dur khrod chen po'i dbus nas w'a ra n'a sir bsod snyoms la zhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-12: bdag gis 'di la bsnyen bkur ma yin pa bya'o snyam nas des de'i lhung bzed du mi'i lag pa bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-13: w'a ra n'a si thams cad du rab tu byung ba de mi sha za'o zhes sgra grags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-14: rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235a-15: gnod sbyin gdug pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smras pa dang nyams par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235b-0: 'di lta lag nas drang ba sbyin no snyam nas de de la snying brtse ba'i phyir des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang pa ltar @235b steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:235b-11: steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:236a-0: mi'i lag pa sa la bor te rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam 'di skad ces bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur bar mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'dri bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi @236a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:236a-3: des rang sangs rgyas la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs mang po dag tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang dag pa ma yin pas skur nas da ltar dgra bcom pa thob kyang yang dag pa ma yin pas skur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la @240a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-2: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-3: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-5: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha dang sha skam dag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-6: yang dge slong gang bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-7: dge slong na ba zhig gis sman pa la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-8: bzhin bzang je kho bo la sman ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-10: bzhin bzang kho bo la 'o ma sus sbyin par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-11: 'phags pa khyim dag nas slongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-12: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-13: 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can lags pas de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-0: de @240b lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-1: de bzhin du dge slong gzhan la 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha dang sha skam dag khyim dag nas slong du gnang ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab par 'dod pa dang bslab pa la gus pa dang bslab pa la ye byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-3: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-4: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-5: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-7: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha skam dag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-8: yang dge slong gang mi na bar bdag nyid kyi phyir zas bsod pa de lta bu dag gzhan gyi khyim dag nas bslangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-11: dge slong rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-13: zas bsod pa gang dag gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:240b-14: 'di lta ste 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha dang skam dag ste zhes bya ba ni zas bsod pa dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-1: zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-2: mi na bar zhes bya ba ni na ba ma gtogs par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-3: bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bsngos te'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-4: zas bsod pa de lta bu dag ces bya ba ni 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang nya sha dang sha dang sha skam dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-5: gzhan gyi khyim dag nas zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-6: bslangs te zhes bya ba ni gsol te'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-7: 'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-9: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-12: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-13: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-14: dge slong gis mi na bas slong zhing mi na bas za na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la za ba la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-15: dge slong gis mi na bas slong zhing na bas za na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la za ba la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-16: dge slong gis na bas slong zhing mi na bas za na de slong ba la ltung ba med la za ba la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241a-17: dge slong gis na bas slong zhing na bas za na gnyi ga la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-0: dge @241b slong bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim dag tu 'gro ba na bud med kyi yul zas thogs te phyir 'byung ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-1: dge slong cang mi smra bar sdod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-2: bud med kyi yul na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-3: 'phags pa ci bzhed ces dris na bstabs par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-4: ci 'dod pa de bslang bar bya ba la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-5: sbyin bdag gis ci bder byas pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-6: zho sbyin pa na chur khu dang dar ba slong ba la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-8: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-9: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-10: bsod pa slong ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-12: srog chags bcas dang nyal sar 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-13: 'greng dang gcer bu dmag dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-14: zhag gnyis bshams dkrugs 'gro ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-15: rdeg dang gzas dang gnas ngan len //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko'u shambhi na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-17: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-18: de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-19: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la ma spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-21: kho bo la 'ga' zhig gis bgrangs te gtad dam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-22: shar gyi rgya mtsho chen por ci'i phyir mi 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:241b-23: lho dang nub dang byang gi rgya mtsho chen por ci'i phyir mi 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-0: 'bab chu dang mtsho dang lteng ka dag tu ci'i phyir mi 'gro zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag @242a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-1: ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-10: 'dun pa khyod shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-0: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon @242b par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-1: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-2: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-3: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-4: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-5: srog chags dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni srog chags dang bcas pa rnam pa gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-6: gang dag mig sngar snang bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-7: gang dag chu tshags kyis zin par 'gyur ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-8: chu la spyod na zhes bya ba ni chu'i spyad pa gnyis su ste nang gi dang phyi rol gyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-9: nang gir spyad pa ni khrus byed pa dang 'thung ba dang so shing 'dor ba dang lag pa dang rkang pa dag 'khru ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-10: phyi rol gyir spyad pa ni lhung bzed 'khru ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-11: lhung bzed chung ngu 'khru ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-13: tshon gyi las byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-14: gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-16: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas nyug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:242b-17: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-2: dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la yid gnyis za bas spyod na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-3: dge slong gis srog chags med pa'i chu la srog chags dang bcas par 'du shes pas spyod na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-4: dge slong gis srog chags med pa'i chu la yid gnyis za bas spyod na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-5: dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i zhun mar dang 'bru mar dang sbrang rtsi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-6: bu ram gyi dbu pa dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-7: dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i tshva dang 'bru'i tshva dang zhog chu dang rtsab mo 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-8: dge slong gis srog chags dang bcas pa'i shing tog dang bca' ba 'cha' na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-10: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-11: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-12: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'char gas bsam pa'i nor bu'i rig pa shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243a-15: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-0: lhung bzed @243b dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-1: mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dug pa des zong bkram pa na bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyes nas des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de mthong nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-2: da ltar tshong pa gzhan dag zong 'grems par byed na spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di zong sdud par byed pa ci'i phyir snyam nas des yang bsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-3: 'di chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pas 'di chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'dod do snyam du shes nas de dag song la re ba med par bya'o snyam nas de dang por de'i khyim du song ste stan la 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-5: 'dug cig dang chos bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-6: bu mo des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang des de la chos bstan par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-7: ji tsam na spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'ongs nas des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-8: 'phags pa 'char ka la bsod snyoms phul la bzhud du gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-9: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:243b-10: bzhin bzang kho bos bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par byas te 'ongs nas chos ston par byed na khyod chos nyan mi 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-1: cig ces des de nan kyis 'dug tu bcug ste des ji tsam gyis de'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de tsam du chos bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-2: de sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-3: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-4: 'di ltar rang gi chung ma la yang dbang med do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-6: kha zer bar byed nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-8: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-14: 'char ka khyod shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244a-17: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-1: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-3: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-4: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-5: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-6: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-7: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-8: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-9: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-10: nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin la skyes pa ni bud med kyi nyal po byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-11: khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-12: phyis gnon byas te zhes bya ba ni phyis zhugs te'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-13: stan la zhes bya ba ni gzhi la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-14: 'dug na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du rkub tshos bzhag na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-15: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:244b-16: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-3: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-4: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-5: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-6: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon byas te stan la 'dug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-8: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-9: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-10: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bsam pa'i nor bu'i rig pa shes te snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-13: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-14: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-15: mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dug pa des zong bkram pa na bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyes nas des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245a-16: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de mthong nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-0: da ltar tshong pa gzhan dag zong 'grems par @245b byed na spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di zong sdud par byed pa ci'i phyir snyam nas des yang bsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-1: 'di chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pas 'di chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'dod do snyam du shes nas de dag song la blta'o snyam nas de dang por de'i khyim du song ste sgo glegs kyi rgyab na mgo sri zhing 'greng ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-2: de'i 'og tu spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'ongs nas des chung ma khrid de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-3: bu mo des 'char ka dben pa na 'greng ba mthong nas des khyo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-4: rje'i sras 'phags pa 'char ka sgo glegs kyi rgyab na 'greng ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-6: 'phags pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang na bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong zhing 'greng ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-7: zhes des chung ma la dga' mgur spyad nas gang gi tshe de'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-8: des 'char ka mthong ba dang de sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge slong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-9: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste 'di ltar rang gi chung ma la yang dbang med do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:245b-12: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-1: byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-4: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-7: 'char ka khyod shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-10: rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246a-13: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-0: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa @246b skyabs yod par 'greng na ltung byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-2: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-3: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-4: nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-5: skyes pa ni bud med kyi nyal po byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-6: khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-7: dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-8: skyabs yod par zhes bya ba na lngas bskyabs par te; rtsig pas bskyabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-13: 'greng na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du 'greng na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-17: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:246b-18: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-1: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-2: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-3: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-5: de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-6: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:247a-13: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:248a-3: btsun pa kun dga' bo gal te btsun pa kun dga' bo la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:248a-4: btsun pa kun dga' bos kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar mi spro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:248a-5: btsun pa kun dga' bos mtshan ma'am /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:248b-0: de dag gis tshe @248b dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang bar byas nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-5: zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-6: grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-7: dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-8: thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-9: dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-10: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-11: mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-12: khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-13: glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-14: seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-15: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-16: nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-17: bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-18: sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-19: dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-20: sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-21: ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250a-22: tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-0: @250b mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-1: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-2: zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-3: nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-4: yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-5: 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-6: mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-7: nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-8: thags bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-9: brgya byin ltar sum cu pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-10: tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa ris kyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-11: dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-12: chu gter ltar ting nge ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-13: sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-14: glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-15: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-16: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-17: 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-18: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-19: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-22: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:250b-23: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-10: lag bza' la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-11: gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mnyan yod ga la der logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-12: don mthun de dang shes pa can zhig lhan cig 'gro ba de phongs pa'i dus la bab cing bkres pas nyam thag par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-14: bdag gang gis bkres pas nyam thag par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas des yang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-15: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la skyabs btsal na des bdag bde bar lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-16: khyed cag gi ston pa ni bzang po la mos pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-17: de gser gyi gshol gyis zhing rmo bas des khyed cag la zas ro brgya pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-18: gos 'bum ri ba dang khang pa brtsegs pa lnga brgya pa yang rjes su gnang bas khyed cag ni re zhig tshe 'di nyid la yang bde ba la reg par gnas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-19: 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-20: kho bo cag gi ston pa ni ngan pa la mos pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251a-21: de til gyi tshigs ma'i gshol gyis zhing rmo bas des kho bo cag la gcer bu dang sgre byi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-2: sa la nyal ba las gzhan rjes su ma gnang bas kho bo cag ni re zhig tshe 'di nyid la yang sdug bsngal la reg par gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-3: 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyang sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-4: dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-5: shes pa can 'di dad par gyur to snyam nas de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-6: shes pa can ji ltar 'tshor dka' bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-7: dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-8: shes pa can des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-9: gal te dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma ma zos na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-12: shes pa can dge slong rnams zan za ba'i mig lam du 'dug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-13: dge slong rnams khyod la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-14: shes pa can de dge slong rnams za na za ba'i mig lam du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-15: dge slong rnams kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin nas de'i slong phor 'khur bas byur bur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-16: de slong phor 'khur bas byur bur byas pa thogs te phyir byung ba ded dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-17: shes pa can khyod la 'khur ba sus byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:251b-19: khyed kyi yon gnas ni dge slong de dag yin la de dag gi yon gnas ni kho bo yin pas kho bo la de dag gis phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-1: slong rnams kyis khyod la snying rje bas byin na khyod de skad ces de dag gis yon gnas kho bo yin zhes zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-2: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-5: ded dpon mad kyang bzhad gad bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-6: lam de nas don mthun tshur 'ong ba dag cig lhags nas don mthun de dang lhan cig shes pa can zhig 'ongs pa des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-7: shes pa can nyod pa nyod dam des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-11: khyim bdag sgre byi 'di dag kho bo la mkho bo stobs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-13: shes pa can khyod ni byis pa mi shes pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-14: 'di dag khyod kyi khyim bdag sgre byi dag yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-15: 'di dag las ni lnga brgya pa'i tshogs dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang gi khyod kyis shes pa can ni gcig 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ngam zhes des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-16: ngan pa ci phyir sa la 'bying mi byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-17: ci phyir lce yang tshal ba brgyar mi 'gas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-18: khyod kyi lus la ci phyir gsar ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-19: rdo rje'i ser ba mdung thung mda' mi 'phen //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-20: ji ltar seng ge'i lhag ma za ba'i wa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252a-21: seng ge nyid la gsod pa 'dod pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-0: de bzhin khyod kyang stobs @252b bcu'i khyos za zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-1: stobs bcu nyid la smod byed ma 'phags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-2: gang du gang la nye bar brten byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-4: de ni nges par mdza' bshes dgra rnams la; ;mnyam mdzad blo ldan thams cad mkhyen pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-5: mi rnams gang dag byas pa mi shes pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-6: de dag khyi bas shin tu ngan par bsam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-7: khyi yang mi la byas pa shes snang na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-8: sbrul 'dra'i mi dag dug ni gtong bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-9: 'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-13: mnyan yod na skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzugs can brgyan cing gsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-14: gzugs can lta bu chos dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-15: bsreg byas btab ba'i me lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-16: gser gyi snod na 'dug pa'i mar me lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-17: gser gyi ri bo 'gro ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-18: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu grags pa dang gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:252b-21: rnam par dag pa'i blo dang ldan pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-0: mthong nas kyang 'di lta ste dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang por sangs @253a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-1: rgyas mthong ba na sems nyams bde ba skyed par byed pa de ltar ni lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-2: dbul pos gter mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-3: bu med pas bu thob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-4: rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba yang sems nyams bde ba skyed par mi byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-5: de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-7: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-8: bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-9: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-10: de dag gis bden pa dag mthong nas gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-14: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-15: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-16: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-17: byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253a-18: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-0: rus @253b pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-1: ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-2: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sngo dag ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-4: dud 'gro dang yi dvags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-7: thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-8: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-9: btsun pa bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-10: btsun pa bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-11: btsun pa bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-12: bdag cag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-13: deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-14: de dag gis bsams pa; gal te bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-15: der bdag cag gis skabs kyang mi rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-16: bdag cag gis 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-17: de nas rigs kyi bu mo de dag stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:253b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis sang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-1: bu mo dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-2: de nas rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-9: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-10: btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na btsun pa kun dga' bo kar sha pa na ji tsam gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod 'tshal bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-12: kar sha pa na lnga brgyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-13: de dag gis kar sha pa na re re bsdus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-14: btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la snod spyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-16: gnas mal gyi 'byor pa ma mchis na khyod kyis zhal zas sta gon mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-17: bdag cag mchis te brim par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-18: kar sha pa na dag zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254a-19: de dag gis kar sha pa na dag mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste dong ngo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-2: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon ces thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-3: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-4: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-5: yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jud par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-6: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-7: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-8: rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-11: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-12: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:254b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:255a-1: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-6: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-7: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-8: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-9: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-10: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-11: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig pa'am gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-12: dge slong gi zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'i'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-13: gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba zhes bya ba ni gnas ngan len gnyis te pham par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-14: dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-15: ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len ces bya zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-17: kun nas slong ba las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274a-18: 'chab na zhes bya ba ni mkhyud na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-0: @274b zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-1: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-4: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-5: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-6: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyes na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-7: skya rengs shar na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-8: dge slong gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyes na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-9: skya rengs shar na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-10: dge slong gis dge slong ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyes na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-11: skya rengs shar na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro; ;dge slong gis dge slong so sor bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyes na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:274b-12: skya rengs shar na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-0: dge slong gis dge slong nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la bcab pa'i sems skyes na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su @275a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-2: skya rengs shar nas yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-3: bdag la gzhi 'dis bde ba la mi reg pa dang dge sbyong gi tshul dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-4: bdag la gzhi 'dis dge 'dun dbye ba dang dge 'dun 'khrugs pa dang dge 'dun gnyis su 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun tha dad par 'gyur na ltung ba med do; ;las dang po pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-5: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-6: tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-7: gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-11: bde dang me dang 'dun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-12: rdzogs par ma bsnyen chos dang smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-13: dge tshul kha dog bsgyur ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-14: rin po che dang tsha ba'i dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-16: dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa dge slong chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid du de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275a-17: gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus @275b gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-1: nye dgas dga' bo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-2: slob dpon chos 'dis kho bo sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du mtho btsams pa ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-3: kho bos kyang 'di la nges par gnod pa cung zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-5: dge slong 'di ni ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa bslab pa 'dod pa yin pas khyod kyis 'di la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-6: nges par 'di'i zan gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-8: khyim bdag cig gis dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis zan la mgron du bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-10: deng chos 'di'i zan gcad par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-11: chos dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-12: mkhan po bdag bsod snyoms la mchi ba zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-14: chos kho bo cag deng khyim bdag cig gis zan la mgron du bos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-15: tshur shog la 'di nyid du zan zo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-17: bdag mkhan po dang lhan cig sngan chad mgron du bos pa 'ga' yang mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-19: chos kho bos gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:275b-20: kho bos ko khyod ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-0: khyod mkhan pos mi rung ba'i dngos po yang dag par 'dzin du bcug gam ci na gang gi phyir mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig @276a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba las slob dpon dang mkhan pos bsgo ba na khas blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-3: khas mi len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes ma gsungs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-4: de la dge slong rab tu grags pas smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-6: lhung bzed dang chu tshags blangs te mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-8: der lhung bzed dang chu tshags kyis ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-9: der snod bkrus pa dag dang chu btsags pa dag 'thob kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-11: chos de gnyis dang lhan cig 'phags pa bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-14: zas kyi tshod shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-17: 'on te zan gcad par 'gyur gtol med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-18: de de gnyis dang lhan cig mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang de gnyis srang du dong ste tshong khang du 'khod nas nye dga' khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste zan zos nas phyir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-19: de'i 'og tu dga' bo yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste zan za zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-20: chos kyis nye dga' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-21: slob dpon gdugs tshod la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276a-24: der thams cad sta gon byas zin pas der song ste bza' ba las gzhan pa'i bya ba ci yang med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-0: @276b gdugs tshod kyi kha kho nar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-2: rkang pa gnyis kyis grib tshod gzhal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-4: glen pa khyod kho bo cag gi bslab pa la cung zad yid mi ches sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-5: ci khyod kyi snying lam na kho bo cag dus ma yin par za bar 'gyur snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-6: kho bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-7: 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-8: 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-11: gal te bdag gis lhung bzed dang chu tshags khyer te 'ongs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-12: bdag bsod snyoms la rgyu bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-13: da ni ci byar yang med do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-14: de gtsug lag khang du song ste ji srid du de'i lus la mdangs yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas gang gi tshe de'i lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-15: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-16: tshe dang ldan pa chos gal te zan gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin nam ci na ji tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa de tsam gyi zan zos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-21: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:276b-22: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag gis bsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-0: dge slong zan gcod du 'jud ces smod @277a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-3: kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-9: nye dga' khyod klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-10: dge slong la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-11: khyim dag tu 'dong dang der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-12: khyod kyis de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-13: 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-15: khyod song zhig ces zer zhing zan gcod du 'jug pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277a-18: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-0: tshul @277b dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-1: zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-3: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-4: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-6: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-7: yang dge slong gang klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-8: snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-9: dge slong la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-10: khyim dag tu 'dong dang der khyed la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-12: des de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-13: 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-14: 'dug na bdes khyod song zhig ces zer na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-15: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-17: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:277b-18: klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-0: ci nas kyang dge slong 'di'i zan gcod @278a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-1: du bcug par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-2: de nyid rkyen du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-5: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-6: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces smras nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-7: tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-8: khyim dag tu 'dong dang zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-9: der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lda dang bza' ba lda'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-10: ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-11: ji tsam gyis chog par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-12: des de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la khyod dang lhan cig smra ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-13: 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-14: 'dug na bdes khyod song zhig ces zer na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-16: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-17: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-20: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-21: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-22: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278a-23: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad ched du bsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-0: dge slong gis zan @278b gcod du 'jud na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-1: nad pa'i byed du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-2: sman pas bstan pa byed du 'jug pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-4: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-5: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-6: zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-8: de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-12: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-13: yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jud par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-14: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-15: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-16: rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-19: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:278b-20: de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong ba rab tu mang po dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:279a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par @279a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:279a-2: rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:279a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong nas /
