K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid don mthun gyi mdun du gshegs pa dang ji tsam na seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa zhig rngam ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dor cing byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa lnga sprul pa mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-5: des de dag gi dri tshor nas skrag ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-6: ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir me sprul pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-9: kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur cing 'bar bar mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' zhig na zhi bar mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-10: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang g-yung drung dang dra bas 'brel pa bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-12: 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs te bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-13: bzhin bzang khyod sngon gyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-14: khyod da ltar drag shul can lag pa dmar ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:289b-15: snun pa dang rab tu snun pa la gzhug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-2: gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-3: gzhan gyi srog gcod bas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas khyod 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-6: bzhin bzang 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-7: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes tshig gsum gyi chos bstan nas bzhin bzang khyod nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis shig dang des dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-9: dge slong dag seng ge de la reg par byed pa na de sgra 'byin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-11: dge slong dag khyed seng ge la ma reg cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-12: de ci'i phyir na dge slong dag seng ge ni bzod par dka' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-13: bsnyen par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-14: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-15: dge slong gis seng ge de la reg par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-16: dge slong seng ge la reg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-17: de nas ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-18: gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas zas za bar byed pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290a-19: de zas mi za ba la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-0: dud 'go'i skye @290b gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi me ni rno ba yin pas de bkres pas nyam dmas pa na bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-1: lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-5: des dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-6: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-7: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-8: de nas sngon seng ge lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-9: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-10: bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-11: de nas sngon seng ge lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g-yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-12: se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-15: padma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:290b-16: bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-0: @291a *// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-1: 'di ltar sngon seng ge lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon seng ge lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-4: khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon seng ge lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-6: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-9: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-10: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-11: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-12: byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-13: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-14: rus pa'i ri dvags las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-15: ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291a-16: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-0: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi @291b dvags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-1: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-3: khyod mthus rab drags nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-4: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-5: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-6: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-7: shin tu rnam dag khyed brten bdag gis ni; ;de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-8: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-9: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rdal bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-10: 'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-11: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-12: srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-13: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-14: de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-15: zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-16: dgra thul g-yas nas yongs su bskor byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-17: lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-18: de nas sngon seng ge lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-19: zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-20: dpa' bo g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-21: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-22: cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:291b-23: dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-0: nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson @292a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-1: par gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-2: mthong nas the tshom za ba'i yid kyis mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-5: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-6: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-8: lha'i bu 'byor ba che ba mthu che ba gzhan zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-9: bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du nye bar mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-11: dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-12: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-13: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-14: lha'i bu 'byor pa che ba mthu che ba gzhan yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-15: dge slong dag 'di ltar khyed kyis ngas ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge gang la tshig gsum gyi chos bstan pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-17: dge slong dag de de nas shi 'phos te rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-18: de mdang sum nga'i gan du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-19: ngas de la chos bstan nas des bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292a-20: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-0: btsun pa sngon seng ge lha'i bus @292b las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas seng ge rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-2: las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-3: las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-5: dge slong dag sngon seng ge lha'i bu nyid kyi las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-7: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-8: gdon mi za bar gyur pa dag byas shing bsags pas sngon seng ge lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-9: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-12: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-13: 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-15: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-16: las rnams bskal ba brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-17: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:292b-18: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @293a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-2: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-5: de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi gnas na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-6: gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-7: w'a ra n'a si na bram ze 'khor shin tu mang ba rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu son pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-8: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyi ston par gyur pa zhig 'dug pa de 'jig rten thams cad kyis shin tu bkur stir byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-12: gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du byung bar gyur ba de'i tshe na de la phyin chad 'ga' yang bkur stir mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor ba brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston par mdzad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293a-17: bram ze 'khor shin tu mang ba de phyogs de nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-0: bram ze des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor brgya @293b phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-2: dge sbyong 'di ni seng ge bzhin du 'jigs pa med pa dang bag tsha ba med par 'khor la chos ston par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-3: nyan thos 'di dag ni ri dvags phra mo dag bzhin du chos nyan par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de gsan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-5: gsan nas kyang bram ze de la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-6: bram ze khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub bo smras kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-7: nyes pa nyes pa'i sgo nas shogs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-8: de lta na khyod kyi las de srabs pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-10: yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-11: bram ze des nyes pa nyes pa'i sgo nas bshags te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-12: bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-13: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la seng ge zhes brjod pas kun tu spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sngon seng ge lha'i bu 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-14: de'i tshe 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la seng ge zhes brjod pas kun tu spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar seng ge rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:293b-15: da ltar gyi bar du yang seng ge rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-0: 'dis nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa'i las de'i rnam par @294a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-1: smin pas ni shi zhing dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-2: 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-3: bslab pa'i gzhi 'di dag blangs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-4: nga'i spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong zhing des bden pa dag mthong nas rang gi gnas su phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-5: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-6: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-7: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin par yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-10: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-11: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhig gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-13: rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-14: de'i dus na drug sde dag gis mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294a-17: mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:294b-0: gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni mes gzhan la @294b gtong bas rtse bar byed cing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:296a-6: 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can lags pas 'di ltar de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:298a-2: bcu bdun sde dag gis chos gos de dag 'gyur byed kyis btsal nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:298b-8: slob dpon gyis der 'dun pa phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:298b-9: ci kho bos bdag gi nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:298b-10: kho bo dge 'dun gyi bya ba de lta bu la 'dun pa mi 'bul gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-0: @299a *// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-3: yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-9: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299a-10: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-0: spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa @299b phyir byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-1: khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-2: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu dga' bo'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-3: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-4: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-5: bya ba chos dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni las chos dang ldan pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-6: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-7: 'dun pa phul nas zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa byin nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-8: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-9: khros khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-10: spong ba'i chos su byed cing zhes bya ba ni bsnyon pa'i chos su byed cing ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-11: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-12: dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-13: khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-17: gzhan yang ji srid ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-18: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-19: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:299b-20: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-0: de'i 'og tu khros khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i @300a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-1: chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-2: khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-4: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-5: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-6: 'dun pa phyir sgyur ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-8: chos mnyan pa dang sgra gcan zin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-9: nad dang dge slong sdig can dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-10: don mthun gnyis su byas pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-11: mdun du btud dang dge tshul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-13: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-14: 'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-15: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-16: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar deng zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-17: bcom ldan 'das khyed cag la chos ston par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-19: 'phags pa dag ston pa nyag gcig tu bas re zhig lha rnams la chos ston par mdzad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-22: mi rnams la chos ston par mdzad sus 'tshal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300a-23: khyed cag gis kyang chos bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-0: bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge @300b slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-2: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan par bya bar gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyang chos bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-4: de dag nyin mo chos ston par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-5: de na gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'tsho ba de dag ni nyin mo chos mnyan nas mtshan mo rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-6: shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag chos snyan pa snyan pa ston par mdzad cing sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu bzhin du chos sbrang rtsi lta bu ston cing stobs par mdzad do zhes rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-7: rtsol ba'i 'bras bu 'tsho ba dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-8: khyed cag las gang dag chos nyan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-9: 'o na khyed cag ci'i phyir chos nyan par mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-10: khyed cag ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag yin pas nyin mo chos nyan par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-11: kho bo cag ni rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag yin pas gal te nyin mo las dag ma byas na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-12: gal te 'phags pa dag mtshan mo chos ston par 'gyur na de lta na bdag cag gis kyang chos mnyan par bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:300b-14: mtshan mo chos bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-1: dag mtshan thams cad kho nar chos ston par byed cing de dag ngal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-3: mtshan thams cad kho nar chos bstan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-4: de dag nam phyed kyi bar du chos ston par byed pa na de lta na yang ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-5: tshes brgyad dang tshes bcu bzhi la chos bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-7: tshes bcu bzhi la chos ston par byed pa na bsod snyoms pa zhig gtsug lag khang du chos nyan du 'ongs nas dge slong rnams kyis nam phyed kyi bar du chos bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-8: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-9: da ni 'gro ba'i dus ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-10: 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o zhes de mtha' gcig tu song nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-11: der lhags pa'i khyim pa de dag kyang de nyid du nyal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-12: dge skos kyis mar me gsad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-14: 'phags pa zhugs mar ma dgum zhig dang bdag cag gis 'bru mar dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-15: dge skos kyis mar me gsos te song nas khyim pa de dag de na 'khod cing de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-16: 'phags pa che ge mo zhig gis ni chos snyan pa snyan pa dag ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301a-17: 'phags pa che ge mo zhig gis ni chos ches snyan pa snyan pa dag ston to zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-0: de na dge slong rgan zhugs rjed ngas pa zhig nyal ba des rmi lam na sngon gyi rnying pa dang lhan cig nyal bar rmis @301b nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-1: des ci dang ci dag tshig brdol par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-2: khyim pa de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-3: shes ldan dag khyim pa ci dang ci dag brdol ba 'di su yin zhes de dag gis de bskyod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-4: ji tsam du rgan zhugs de phyis gan du nyal zhing ci dang ci dag brdol ba mthong ba la de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-5: shes ldan dag rgan po rnams kyi gnas skabs kyang re zhig 'di 'dra na 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba gzhon nu dag yin pas 'di dag gi gnas skabs ji lta bur 'gyur zhes ma dad pa go bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-6: bsod snyoms pa de nang par sngar langs te dgon pa'i gnas su song ba dang dge slong spong pa dag gis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-7: tshe dang ldan pa ji lta tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan cing skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-9: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos snyan pa snyan pa dag bstan cing skye bo phal po che'i tshogs te por mngon par dad par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-10: rgan zhugs shig gis ni skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par ma dad par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:301b-12: des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig @302a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-2: snang ba la nyal bar byed pa las gyur to snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-3: de lta bas na dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nyal bar mi bya zhing snang ba la yang nyal bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-4: nyal bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-5: 'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-6: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la dge tshul sgra gcan zin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-7: skul byed ces bya ba gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-8: dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa zhig 'ongs pa na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin nyin mo spyod du song ba'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa de'i gtsug lag khang du bskos nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyi lhung bzed dang chos gos phyi rol tu phyung ste mtha' gcig tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-9: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin nyin mo spyod pa nas phyir 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-10: ji tsam na rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos phyi rol tu phyung ste mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa mthong nas des sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-11: ji tsam na dge tshul skul byed 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-12: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302a-13: sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-0: kho bo nyin mo spyod du song ba'i gtsug lag khang dge slong @302b glo bur du 'ongs pa'i gtsug lag khang du bskos nas des kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos phyi rol tu phyung ste mtha' gcig tu bzhag na sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus pas kho bo deng mal gang du bsham par bya ba mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-2: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug tu yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-4: sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-5: tshe dang ldan pa skul byed khyod ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-6: mthu che ba yin pas lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-9: de'i tshe na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi snam phyis spos kyi byug pas bskus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-10: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dus ma yin par bshang ba mdzad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas med cing skabs ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-13: der nyal bar bya'o snyam nas de der song ste snyam phyi sa'i zhabs rten la mgo bzhag ste nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-14: de'i mtshan mo sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus nas der char 'bab par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-15: snam phyi sa de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo zhig gi tshang 'dug pa der char bab pa'i chus gang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:302b-16: sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo de bcom ldan 'das kyi snam phyi sa ga lab der 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' @303a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-1: ba'i chos nyid can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-2: gal te sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo des sgra gcan zin rnyed par gyur na ming gi lhag ma tsam las par byed par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-3: sh'akya nga rgyal can dag gal te gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po rab tu byung bar ma gyur na rgyal po dngos brtsan par 'gyur ba zhig na de rab tu phyung nas mgon med pa'i bya bas dus la bab bo zhes ma dad pa go bar byed par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i phyag brkyang ste sgra gcan zin blangs nas nyid kyi gzims mal du bsnyal te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig gnas gcig na gzims par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgung la 'chag pa dang bzhugs pa gnyis kyis shas cher mtshan mo 'da' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-5: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal du 'ong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni gal te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar bzhed na de'i tshe dge slong ma 'ongs pa rnams la ni gzhes par mdzad la dge slong 'ongs pa rnams ni phyir gtong bar mi mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-0: tshe dang ldan pa skul byed bcom ldan @303b 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-1: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das kyi gzims mal na nyal ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-2: mthong nas kyang se gol gyi sgras tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin sad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-4: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin khyod gang du nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-6: ji tsam na bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi gzims mal na nyal bar mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-7: des myur ba myur bar kho nar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi gzims mal nas babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-9: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gal te khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs su zin na sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bos khyed ming gi lhag ma tsam las bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-11: dge slong dag dge tshul 'di dag la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-12: ma yang med pha yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-13: byams pa dang mdza' bshes kyi tshogs gzhan 'ga' yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-14: tshangs pa mtshungs pa spyod pa khyed cag 'ba' zhig tu zad cing 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i sgo nga dad ldan pa dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-15: gal te khyed cag gis 'di dag yongs su skyong bar mi byed na gzhan su zhig byed par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:303b-16: dge slong dag de lta bas na gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal bar rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-0: dge slong zhig la 'khru ba'i nad byung nas de @304a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-1: mun pa'i nang du bshang ba byed pa na rkang pa gnyis la gos nas rkang pa gnyis brkyang ste nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-2: de'i gan du nang par sngar dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag 'ongs nas de dag gis dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-7: des skabs de rgyas par brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-9: de lta bas na snang ba bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-11: de 'gyod pas mi nyal nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-13: nyal bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-14: dge slong nad g-yog dag 'gyod par mi nyal ba na de dag na bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-16: de dag gis kyang nyal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:304a-17: der byin len stobs pas bya ba byung nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:313b-10: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:314a-1: chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba la bar du gcod pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:314a-12: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:314a-13: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340a-18: ji tsam na de'i chung po grogs 'ongs nas des de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340a-19: grogs po khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340a-21: kho bo chad pas bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-0: sh'akya'i bu'i @340b dge slong dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-2: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-3: de sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-4: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-5: 'di ltar gar mkhan dag la yang chad pas gcod par byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-8: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag mi mdzes pa de lta bu byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-10: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-12: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba 'di ni dge slong dag khyim pa'i gos gyon pa las gyur pa de'i phyir dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen pa nyid du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:340b-16: dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul @341a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-1: dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-3: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-5: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-6: dge slong dag gis gos sar pa zhig rnyed na kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-8: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha bsgyur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-9: gal te dge slong gis gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-11: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur bar spyod na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-12: dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni drug sdes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-13: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-20: nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-21: sar pa zhig ces bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-22: gsar pas gsar pa dang rnyed pas gsar pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-23: don 'di ni rnyed pas gsar pa yin par dgongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-24: rnyed na zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341a-25: kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-1: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-2: sngon po zhes bya ba ni rams nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-3: dmar po zhes bya ba ni btsag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-4: ngur smrig ces bya ba ni shing shun no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-5: kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni kha dog ngan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-6: gal te dge slong gi gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-8: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kham bsgyur bar spyod na zhes bya ba ni gyon na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-9: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-12: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-13: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-14: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad gos sar pa zhig rnyed na tha na lhung bzed kyi kha g-yogs kyang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-15: kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-17: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha bsgyur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-18: gal te dge slong gis gos sar pa kha bsgyur ba gsum po sngon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-20: ngur smrig las gang yang rung bar kha ma bsgyur bar spyod na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-22: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:341b-23: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-0: kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa'i @342a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-1: ltung byed de lnga bcu brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-3: bya rgod phung po 'phongs dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-4: rol mo li tsa chen po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-5: sil snyan ri dvags 'dzin ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-6: sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro shams thabs gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-10: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la babs nas slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal ba dang po'i mi rnams kyis gter sbas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-12: lhas char phab pas phyogs der chu'i 'od pa bab cing de yang lam lam lam 'bar zhing 'dug pa gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-13: gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-14: kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-15: bcom ldan 'das sbrul dug drag po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-16: kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-17: bde bar gshegs pa sbrul dug drag po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342a-18: de na ha cang thag mi ring ba na mi 'bras bu dang rtsa ba thu ba zhig 'dug pa des de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-0: bdag gis sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa ni mthong na sbrul dug drag po ni ma mthong bas sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong @342b rnams kyi sbrul dug drag po ci 'dra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-1: bdag kyang phyogs 'dir nyin mtshan du rgyu bas bdag sbrul dug drag pos zin par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-4: ji tsam na gter zhig lam lam lam 'bar zhing 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-6: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sbrul dug drag po ni mdzes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-7: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sbrul dug drag po ni shin tu bzang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-8: 'di ltar sbrul dug drag po 'di lta bus ni pha dang ma sdug pa yang zin kyang bla'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-9: bu dang chung ma dang bran dang bran mo dang las mi dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-10: mdza' bshes dang blon po dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams sdug pa yang zin kyang bla'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-11: mi des gter de lo ma'i chun po dag gis g-yogs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-12: khad kyis khad kyis rim gyis rang gi khyim du bskyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-13: gang gi tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra sdig pa'i grogs po lhas byin gyis nye bar bskor bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-14: pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po srog dang phral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-15: rang nyid cod pa na bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por bzhag pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-16: des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:342b-17: shes ldan dag song la gang la 'du ba ni ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-0: gang na ci zhig gis 'tsho bar byed pa @343a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-2: de nas zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi de dag gis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-3: zhes lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-4: rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi de dag gis phyogs su byul ba na mi de khyim gyi 'byor ba dag byed pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-5: de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-6: kye nang rje khyod dbul po rtsa ba dang 'bras bu thu ba rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag btsongs shing 'tsho ba dag sbyor bar byed pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-7: khyod kyis khyim gyi 'byor pa 'di ga las 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-8: khyod kyis gter ma rnyed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-10: bdag gis gter ma rnyed de bdag nyid la 'byor ba 'di lta bu dag yod mod kyi sngan chad ni rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa byung bas de'i phyir bdag gis ma phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-11: da ni rgyal po chos dang ldan pa byung bas de'i phyir bdag gi khyim gyi 'byor pa byas te rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho brang 'khor dang ljongs kyi mi dag rjes su dga' bar zad kyi de chos dang ldan pa ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-12: rgyal po ma skyes dgra la ni pho brang 'khor dang ljongs kyi mi rjes su mi dga' yang de chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343a-14: kye nang rje rgyal po gzugs can snying po chos dang ldan pa ma yin na gang chos dang ldan pa de chos dang ldan pa ma yin par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-0: pha bsod pa gang yin pa de chos dang ldan par gyur tam khyod @343b kyis kho bo cag su yin shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-2: shes te rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-3: khyod kyi mig gis rgyal po mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-5: kye nang rje kho bo cag rdzun kyis ma slu zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-7: phyed ni khyod khyer la phyed ni kho bo cag la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-9: kho bos gter ma rnyed de 'di ni kho bo nyid kyi yin mod kyi 'on kyang sum cha sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-11: de dag gis spyos te lag pa gnyis phying ka log tu bcings nas gnya' zungs rgyud mos rgyal po'i drung du khrid de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-14: kva'e nang rje nga su yin shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-15: lha 'tshal te 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni 'jig rten skyong bar bgyid pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-16: khyod ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba 'jig rten skyong ba lnga pa lags te skye dgu skyong bar mdzad pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-17: kva'e nang rje khyod kyis gter rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-18: nga la rdzun gyis ma slu bar bden par smros la phyed ni khyod khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-19: phyed ni nga la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-20: lha bdag gis gter ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-21: kva'e nang rje khyod kyis gter rnyed kyi sum cha nga la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-22: lha bdag gis gter ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-23: rgyal po khros te blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:343b-24: shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag pa de la chad pa ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-2: lha dgum pa la thug pa'i chad pa mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-4: shes ldan dag ngas mi 'di yongs su gtang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-5: 'di'i nye du rnams kyang phyag sbal du chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-6: 'di'i nor thams cad kyang rgyal po'i pho brang du phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-7: de nas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas mi de'i nye du rnams kyang btson rar bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-8: de'i nor thams cad kyang rgyal po'i pho brang du phul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-9: mi de nyid kyang mi gos sngon po gyon pa lag na ral gri thogs pa dag gis ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar po dag gis mgrin pa bcings te gsad sar khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-10: mi des byung rgyal du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-11: kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-12: bcom ldan 'das sbrul dug drag po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-13: kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-14: bde bar gshegs pa sbrul dug drag po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-15: rgyal po de'i chos nyid ni gsad par bya ba'i mi gang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-16: gzhan dris la lan gzhan 'debs par byed pa de ji srid du rgyal po la ma zhus kyi bar du re zhig gsod par mi byed pas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344a-17: lha mi de gzhan dris na lan gzhan 'debs par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-0: blon po rnams @344b kyis khrid de 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-2: kva'e nang rje khyod ci zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-4: kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-5: bcom ldan 'das sbrul dug drag po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-6: kun dga' bo sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-7: bde bar gshegs pa sbrul dug drag po lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-9: kva'e nang rje smras pa de'i don ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-10: lha je mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-12: des skabs de rgyas par brjod nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-13: gal te sbrul dug myur du khyab par bgyid pas bdag zin par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-14: bdag gcig pu dus la bab par 'gyur ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-15: sbrul dug drag pos bdag zin pas de'i slad du bdag dang nye du dang nor thams cad kyang tshul ma lags pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-16: de'i tshe na lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-17: bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas ring po ma lon pas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-19: khyod bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-21: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra mchi mas brnangs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-23: kva'i nang rje de khyod kyi yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-25: de nas rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:344b-26: mi 'di'i nye du rnams kyang thong la 'di'i nor thams cad kyang phyir byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:345a-1: rnams kyis de'i nye du rnams kyang btang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:345a-2: de'i nor thams cad kyang phyir byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:345a-3: de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi khyim na dpal dang skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad ci yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la brten pa yin pas bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol lo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:345a-4: de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:345a-5: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
