K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ci dgyes par bzhugs nas yangs pa can ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-11: nye dga' snga dro na sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-12: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-13: li tsa byi'i khye'u rab tu mang po dag kyang yangs pa can nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-14: yangs pa can gyi phyi rol tu rgyan thams cad phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste rtse bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-15: nye dgas de mthong nas des gnod sbyin gyi nor yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-16: zhes rgyan de dag thams cad khyer te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-17: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u de dag gis nye dga' la las ni lag pa nas bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:350b-18: la las ni rkang pa nas bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-1: gos nas bzung ste 'phags pa ci'i phyir kho bo cag gi rgyan 'phrog par byed ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-2: li tsa byi chen pos yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u dag gis nye dga' bzung ste tho 'tsham pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-4: khye'u dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa nye dga' la mtho 'tsham par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-6: 'dis bdag cag gi rgyan dag phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-8: 'phags pa nye dga' ci'i slad du khye'u dag gi rgyan 'phrog par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-10: kho bos gnod sbyin gyi nor 'di rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-12: 'di 'dra ba gnod sbyin gyi nor lags re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-13: gzhon nu dag gi rgyan lags kyi ma 'phrog par 'or cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-14: nye dgas de bor te rdul gyis gos pa'i chos gos dag gis gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-15: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-16: btsun pa nye dga' ci'i phyir rdul gyi tshogs kyis gos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-18: li tsa byi chen po nad med par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-19: kho bos gnod sbyin gyi nor thob pa des 'dor du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-20: 'di yang re zhig byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351a-23: drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-0: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa @351b can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-1: lam gyi bar na yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dag yod nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-2: dga' bo nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi dag gis dpe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las blangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-3: de dag gi skyed mos tshal dag ci 'dra ba bltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag der zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-4: ji tsam na de na yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-5: khrus kyi chal dag dang so phag dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-14: su gho sha ka dag bzhag pa mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-15: dga' bo nye dga' je dang por khrus bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-16: 'on te glu blang zhing bro brdung bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-18: bdag cag gis yun ring po nas glu blangs shing bro brdungs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-19: je glu blang shing bro brdung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-20: zhes de dag gis glu blang zhing bro brdung bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-21: rgyal po zas gtsang gi skyed mos tshal du spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra gang yin pa de ni lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i g-yul ngor spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra yin pas de dag gis rol mo'i sgra 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-22: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi dag gis thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:351b-23: thos nas de dag sngangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-0: shes ldan dag pha bsod pas ma sbran par dmag drangs te @352a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-1: 'ongs so zhes de dag go bgos te phyir 'byung bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-2: drug sde dag kyang skyed mos tshal de nas phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-3: de dag gis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi dag go bgos te phyir byung ba mthong nas drug sde dag gis de dag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-6: 'dir pha gsod pa 'ongs pas de dang g-yul dgye ba'i phyir sur 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-9: 'dir lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i g-yul ngor spyad pa'i rol mo'i sgra byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-10: shes ldan dag de ni kho bo cag gis bzhad gad byas pa yin na khyed cag de ltar bred ngas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-12: 'phags pa dag khyed kyis rol mo'i sgra'i yo byad de dag sgra phyung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-13: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-14: kho bo cag gis sgra phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-16: 'phags pa dag yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi dag sdangs pas khyed la gnod pa byed na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-18: de dag phyir log pa dang dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ji ste phyir log /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-20: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-21: tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag de'u gsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352a-23: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-0: ci'i phyir de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag mi mdzes pa de lta bu byed ces smod par @352b byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-2: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-7: dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-12: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:352b-13: yang dge slong gang rin po che'am rin po cher smos pa rang gi lag gis len tam len du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-1: yangs pa can du ci dgyes par bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-2: mnyan yod ga la ba der logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba ri dvags 'dzin gyi mi'i khang bzang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-3: ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-4: mnyan yod na bdag gi khang bzang na bzhugs zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-5: thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mnyan yod nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-6: de ngo tsha dang ldan pa yin pas des rgyan bkrol te thum por bcings nas bu mo'i lag tu byin te de bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-8: de na ha cang thag mi ring ba na sna ma'i yal ga me tog rgyas pa zhig 'dug nas bu mo des de mthong nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-9: 'di las me tog dag gtogs te bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma dag gis gtor gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353a-10: 'thog tu 'gro'o snyam nas des rgyan de mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste sna ma'i yal ga de las me tog dag gtogs nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma dag gis gtor te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yun @353b ring du chos bstan nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te song ba dang rgyan gyi thum po de nyid du brjed de lus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos des rgyan de bor te song ba mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-2: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi 'di nyid rkyen du mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-3: gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyan de sbed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-5: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-6: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-7: btsun pa ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas rgyan bskyud de mchis nas bdag la blo skyes pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi 'di nyid rkyen du mdzad de gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro snyam nas bdag gis rgyan de sbed du stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-8: kun dga' bo 'di ltar ngas ma gnang yang gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis shes pa legs so legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:353b-9: kun dga' bo de la bas na kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-0: bud med kyi yul ni rgyan la nye bar spyod pa yin pas sa gas phyi de nyin par rgyan de dran pas des bu @354a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-4: jo mo de nyid du bsgyud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-7: de'i bu dag gis de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-9: yum mdzod khang du bzhag par mkhyen nam ci ga las blangs te mchi bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-10: sa gas bu rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-11: bu dag kho mo ni nor chud mi za ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-12: de nas bu mo de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gan du song ba dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-15: 'phags pa jo mos rgyan bskyud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-19: bu mo des khyer te song nas sa ga la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-20: jo mo rgyan de 'tshal te mchis pa 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-21: sa gas bu rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-22: bu dag rgyan de khyer te 'ongs pa 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-23: kho mos kho mo ni nor chud mi za bar yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-25: bu de dag gis bu mo de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-26: bu mo 'phags pa gang gis sbed du bcug par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-30: 'phags pa kun dga' bos gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354a-31: des na thob par zad kyi gal te drug sde dag gis mthong bar gyur tu zin na de dag gis bca' ba'i rin du byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-0: de dag gis de bdag cag gis @354b ma 'di nor chud za ba yin nam ma yin pa brtags na shes par 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis ma'i sor gdub rgya blangs te khron pa'i nang du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-1: sa gas bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-2: bu mo chu chus shig khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-3: bu mo des chu bcu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-4: de'i bum pa'i nang du sor gdub rgya de chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-5: sa ga khrus byed pa na sor gdub rgya de phang par lhung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-6: sa gas bu rnams la bstan te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-7: bu dag kho mos kho mo ni nor chud mi za ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-9: yang de dag gis sor gdub rgya de chu klung gnas can gyi nang du 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-10: de nya bo ches mid nas nya bo che de nya ba dag gis rgya mos bcus te phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-11: sa ga'i bu mo mngag gzhug ma nya sha'i phyir chong 'dus su song nas des nya pa las nya bo che de nyos te bshas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-12: ji tsam na de'i lto nas sor gdub rgya de byung ba mthong nas des sa ga la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-13: jo mo sor gdub rgya de 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-14: sa gas bu rnams la de bstan te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-15: bu dag kho mos kho mo ni nor chud mi za ba yin no zhes ma smras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-16: bu de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-17: yum nor chud mi za bar lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-18: ma lags pa da dung yang brtag par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:354b-19: zhes de dag gis de na ra dag gis sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu bkang ste lam po che'i bzhi mdor bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-0: skye bo phal po che de nas 'gro bas mthong nas sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin no zhes yongs su spangs te @355a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-1: 'gro zhing 'ga' yang len par mi byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-3: 'di ni sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu de na ra dag gis gang ba 'dug na mi len tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-5: 'di ni sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa yin gyi sre mo lta bu rkyal bu de na ra dag gis gang ba ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-7: de nas bu dag lhags te ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-8: yum khyod ni nor chud mi za ba lags mad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-9: thams cad du yang ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ni nor chud mi za ba yin bden no zhes sgra grags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-10: dge slong gis kun dga'i ra bar gtogs par sre mo lta bu rkyal bu de na ra dag gis gang ba zhig lhung ba mthong nas phyogs der mi zhig 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-11: dge slong des mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-12: kye nang rje sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu 'di khyod kyi ma yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-15: des de khyer te myur ba myur bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-16: mi gzhan zhig mgo rdul gyis gang ste ngu zhing 'ongs nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-17: 'phags pa khyod kyis sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu zhig gzigs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-19: mi zhig gis khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-20: des sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu de ma rnyed pa na smyos shing sems 'khrugs pas de dang der tshol ba na tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-0: de bzhin du gya @355b tshom du smra bar mi bya bar de la sre mo lta bu'i rkyal bu ci 'dra ba zhig srang du ba zhig ces dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-1: gal te rtags la bab par smra na sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-2: gal te rtags la ma bab par sman sbyin par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-3: de dag gis de der bor te dong ba na de gzhan dag gis brkus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-5: de bzhin du bor te 'dong bar mi bya bar 'gro ba'i lam g-yogs su sa'am lo ma'i tshogs dag gis g-yog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-6: de dag gis de yal ba kho nar bor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-8: de yal bar dor bar mi bya bar zhag bdun nam brgyad du der song ste bsdad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-9: gal te bdag po 'ongs shing rtags la bab par smra na sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-10: gal te ma 'ongs na de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-11: gal te bdag bo zla ba drug 'das nas 'ongs shing rtags la bab par smra na sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-12: gal te ma 'ongs na de'i 'og tu dngos po brtan por btsongs te gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-13: gal te de'i tshe bdag po 'ongs par gyur na de la de dngos po 'dir btsongs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-14: rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-15: gal te rjes su yi rang na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-16: gal te rjes su yi rang bar mi byed na sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:355b-17: gal te skyed slong na kho bo cag gis yongs su bskyangs pa gang yin pa de nyid drin che bar mi sems sam /khyer te song zhig ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-0: de lta bas na kun dga'i ra bar @356a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-1: gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-3: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-4: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-6: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-7: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-8: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-9: yang dge slong gang rin po che'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-10: rin po cher smos pa rang gi lag gis len tam len du 'jud na kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-11: gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-12: dge slong gis kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-13: gnas khang du gtogs pa na rin po che'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-14: rin po cher smos pa 'dug pa la 'di su'i yin pa de len par 'gyur grang snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis blang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-15: de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-16: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-17: rin po che'am zhes bya ba la rin po che zhes bya ba ni nor bu dag dang mu tig dag dang bee d'urya dang man shel dkar po dang byi ru dang gser dang dngul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356a-18: rdo'i snying po dang spug dang dmar po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-1: rin po cher smos pa zhes bya ba la rin po cher smos pa zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-2: g-yul ngor spyad pa'i mtshon cha thams cad dang rol mor spyad pa'i yo byad thams cad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-3: rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni lag pas lag par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-4: len tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-5: len du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-6: kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-7: gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga'i ra ba'i nang na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-8: ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa na 'dug pa 'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-9: gnas khang du gtogs pa na 'dug pa na bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-10: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-13: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-14: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-15: dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-16: kun dga'i ra bar gtogs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-17: gnas khang du gtogs pa na rin po che'am rin po cher smos pa 'dug pa la 'di su'i yin pa de len par 'gyur grang snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis blang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:356b-18: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba la de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-3: nor bu mgul rgyan pi wang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-4: dung dang gzhu dang mda' dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-5: sku gzugs sku gdung bcas pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-6: sngon gyi tshul ni tha ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-7: dge slong gis nor bu len na bdar ba len na ltung byed du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-8: ma bdar ba len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-9: nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du mu tig dang bee d'urya dang man shel dkar po dang byi ru dang dngul dang gser dang rdo'i snying po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-10: spug dang dmar po dang g-yas su 'khyil ba yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-11: tha na nor bu mching bu len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-12: dge slong gis mgul rgyan len na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-13: mgul rgyan ji lta ba bzhin du gdu bu rgyan can dang dpung rgyan dang ngo shal dang sen mo do yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-14: tha na sog ma'i phreng ba len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-15: dge slong gis pi wang len na rgyud dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-16: rgyud med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-17: pi wang ji lta ba de bzhin du 'od ma dang bal la ri dang ma ha ti dang su gho sha ka yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-18: tha na mchu sbrang len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-19: dge slong gis dung len na sgra 'byin pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-20: sgra mi 'byin pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-21: dung ji lta ba bzhin du rnga bo che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-23: rdza rnga yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357a-24: tha na rdza rnga kha cig pa len na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-0: dge slong gis @357b gzhu len na rgyud dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-1: rgyud med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-2: gzhu ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang ral gri khyog po dang ral gri so gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-3: mdung dang 'phang mdung dang lcags kyo yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-4: tha na gzhu len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-5: dge slong gis mda' len na mde'u dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-6: mde'u med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-7: mda' ji lta ba bzhin du lcags mda' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-8: mda' phyed lcags las byas pa yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-9: tha na mda' ltar bcos pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-10: dge slong gis sku gzugs len na sku gdung dang bcas pa len na ltung byed du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-11: sku gdung med pa len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-12: ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste len na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-14: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-15: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-16: dge slong rnams la the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-17: btsun pa ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas nor chab mi 'tshal bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:357b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-0: dge slong dag ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa gnyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur pa dag byas shing bsags @358a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-1: pas ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa gnyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-2: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-5: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-6: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-7: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-8: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-10: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-14: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-16: gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' da mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-17: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su las 'das pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358a-18: rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba rgyal srid dang 'byor pa dang rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-0: skye @358b bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-1: 'thab mo dang 'thab pa dang 'khrug long dang nang 'khrug dag rab tu zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-2: chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-3: s'a lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-4: ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du 'jug pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi rgyal srid byed du 'jud pa'i rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-5: de na bud med rgan mo skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa gcig cig bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-6: de nas rgyal po kri kri dpyid kyi dus kyi tshe shing ljon pa me tog kha bye zhing 'bras bu rgyas pa dang ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-8: shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i tshal gseb dag tu btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-9: rgyal pos de myur ba myur bar yang w'a ra n'a sir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-10: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sna ma'i yal ga dag la mu tig gi chun po dpyangs te khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-11: des rgyal po myur ba myur bar w'a ra n'a sir zhugs pa thos nas de yang brtad pa dang bcas pas mu tig gi chun po brjed de por nas w'a ra n'a sir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-12: bud med rgan mo des mu tig gi chun po de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:358b-13: des mu tig gi chun po de smyug ma la btags te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-0: bud med kyi yul ni rgyan la nye bar spyod pa yin pas des phyi de nyin @359a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-2: des rgyal po la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-3: rgyal po zho shas 'tsho ba dag der btang nas de dag gis mu tig gi chun po smyug ma la btags pa de mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-4: de dag gis bud med rgan mo la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-5: mu tig gi chun po 'di sus smyug ma la btags te bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-8: de dag gis mu tig gi chun po de rgyal po la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-9: rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-10: khyed cag gis de ga las rnyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-12: bud med rgan mo zhig gis smyug ma la btags te bzhag pa de nas bdag gis rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-14: bud med rgan mo de bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-15: de dag gis bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-16: lha bud med rgan mo de 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-18: khyed kyis mu tig gi chun po 'di smyug ma la btags te bzhag pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-22: khyod de la 'dod pa ma skyes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-24: lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-25: bdag gzhan gyi rdzas la 'dod pa'i chos skyed par ga la 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359a-26: rgyal po dga' nas des de la mu tig gi chun po de nyid bya dga' byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-0: rgan mo des mu tig gi chun po de khyer te btsongs nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs @359b ba'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-3: smon lam 'di skad ces bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nor chud mi za bar gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-4: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-5: bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-6: ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-7: 'dis de'i tshe smon lam de ltar btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas nor chud mi za bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-8: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-9: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-10: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-12: las gcig tu gnag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-14: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-17: longs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa'i ltung byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-18: lnga bcu dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ga'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-22: rgyal po'i khab na chu dron gsum yod pa gcig tu ni ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po khrus byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:359b-23: gnyis par ni btsun mo'i 'khor khrus byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-0: gsum par ni grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi dag khrus byed @360a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-1: do; ;ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-2: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas yo byad thams cad kyis btab na khrus kyis ma bstabs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-3: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bcas pa la khrus kyis bstab par bya'o snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-5: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-6: btsun pa rgyal po'i khab 'di na chab dron gsum mchis pa gcig tu ni bdag khrus bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-7: gnyis par ni mchis brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-8: gsum par ni grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi dag khrus bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-9: btsun pa gang du bdag khrus bgyid pa der 'phags pa dag kyang khrus mdzad cing gang gi tshe 'phags pa dag khrus mdzad pa de'i tshe na bdag sdod par bgyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-10: gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid pa de'i tshe yang 'phags pa dag gis gzhes par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360a-11: gang du mchis 'brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid pa der yang 'phags ma dag khrus mdzad cing gang gi tshe 'phags ma dag khrus mdzad pa de'i tshe yang mchis brang gi 'khor sdod par bgyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-0: gang gi @360b tshe mchis brang gi 'khor khrus bgyid pa de'i tshe yang 'phags ma dag gis gzhes par mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-2: de nas ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-4: drug sde dag la blo skyes pa dga' bo nye dga' ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dad pa dang ldan pa ni yin na dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa bltas khrus byed du 'dong ngo zhes de dag der khrus byed du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-6: dga' bo nye dga' gal te bdag cag thams cad gcig car khrus byas na myur du zin par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-7: gnyis kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-8: de'i 'og tu gnyis kyis khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-9: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis kyang khrus bya zhing bzhis grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-10: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gnyis kyis khrus bya bar brtsams te bzhis grogs byed cing 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-12: des mi gsang la gtogs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:360b-13: kva'e nang rje song la da ltar su khrus byed ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-0: @361a *// zhes ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-1: der song ste bltas na ji tsam na drug sde dag khrus byed pa mthong nas rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-2: lha 'phags pa drug sde dag khrus bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-4: khri'u tshugs shig dang bsdad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-5: des khri'u btsugs nas rgyal pos bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-6: ji tsam na yun ring zhig lon nas rgyal pos yang mi gsang la gtogs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-7: kva'e nang rje song la da ltar su khrus byed ltos shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-9: lha 'phags pa drug sde de dag nyid khrus bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-10: rgyal pos yang khri'u btsugs pa de nyid la bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-11: ji tsam na yun ring zhig lon nas yang rgyal pos mi gsang la gtogs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-12: kva'e nang rje song la da ltar su khrus byed ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-13: mi des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas der song ste bltas na ji tsam na da rung yang drug sde dag khrus byed pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-14: de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361a-15: lha da dud yang 'phags pa drug sde de dag nyid khrus bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-1: shes ldan dag 'o na ni de dag yun ring por da la mtho 'tsham par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-2: chu 'on cig dang dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-3: de dag gis chu blangs nas rgyal pos de nyid du dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-4: chos mnyan pa ma mnyan pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-6: dga' bo ci'i phyir rgyal po gzugs can snying pos chos mnyan pa ma mnyan par song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-7: btsun pa rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di drug sde dag gis mtho btsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-8: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba de ni dge slong dag khrus byed pa las gyur pas de'i phyir dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-10: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-13: 'phags pa dag dri nga ba'i 'di su lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-14: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:361b-16: 'phags pa dag ci'i slad du khrus mi mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-2: ci khyed cag dri ma'i rdzab 'chang bas dag par 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-3: zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-7: zhes bka' stsal nas so ga'i dus la bab pa dang dge slong dag tsha bas snyom nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-17: de lta bas na tsha ba'i dus ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-18: dge slong dag na bar gyur nas de dag sman pa'i gan du dong ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:362a-19: bzhin bzang kho bo cag na na kho bo cag la sman ston cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:363b-9: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:363b-10: dge slong dag de bas na snga ma bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:363b-12: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:363b-13: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:363b-15: lhag ma ni na ba dus so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:363b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-0: zla ba phyed phyed cing khrus bya bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba ngo phyed @364a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-2: de las 'dums par byed na zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed phyed las 'dums par byed na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-3: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-5: zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-8: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-10: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-11: so ka rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-12: dbyar rnams kyi dang po dang zla ba phyed dang gsum po 'di dag ni tsha ba'i dus so zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-13: so ga rnams kyi zla ba lhag ma phyed dang gnyis zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis ni dbyar nye bar bsgrub par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-14: dbyar zla ra ba tshes nas dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i bar gyi zla ba phyed dang gnyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-15: dbyar rnams kyi dang po zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-16: gnas par khas blangs pa rnams kyis dang po zla ba gcig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-17: dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes bcu drug nas dbyar zla tha chung nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-18: lhag ma ni na ba dus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-19: zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-20: dge slong na ba khrus ma byas par 'tsho bar mi nus na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364a-21: las dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-0: mchod rten gyi las tha na re lde tsam zhig phyags @364b sam dkyil 'khor ba mal tsam zhig byug pa byas na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-1: lam dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong dpag tshad gcig tu song ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-2: dpag tshad phyed du song ste phyir 'ong na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-3: rlung dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste tha na rlung gis gos kyi gra bskul bar gyur na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-4: char dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste tha na lus la char gyi thigs pa gnyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-6: rdze char dus so zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste tha na rdzi char gyis gos kyi mtha' bskul bar gyur cing lus la char pa'i thigs pa gnyis sam gsum bab par gyur na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-7: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-8: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-9: dge slong gis dbang bskur ba'i khrus kyis khrus byed na des dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:364b-10: dus byin gyis ma brlabs par khrus byed na ji srid du chus lte bar ma son gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-5: chus lte bar son na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-7: dus phyin gyis ma brlabs par khrus byed na ji srid du chus lte bar ma son gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-8: chus lte bar son na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-10: dus byin gyis ma brlabs par khrus byed na ji srid du chus lte bar ma son gyi bar la nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-11: chus lte bar son na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-12: dge slong dag chu klung rgal ba na de dag 'gyod par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-14: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya bar gal te khrus byed par 'dod na dus byin gyis brlabs te khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-15: dge slong dag skam sa'o snyam nas chur zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:365b-16: de dag der lhung zhing de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-2: 'di la 'gyod bar mi bya bar gal te khrus byed par 'dod na dus byin gyis brlabs te khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-3: de bzhin du dge slong dag 'chags na yengs pas chur lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-4: brgyal ba la chus btab pa na de dag 'gyod par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-6: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya bar gal te khrus byed par 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-7: dus byin gyis brlabs te khrus bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-9: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-10: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-11: khrus byed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-14: rtse dang lhan cig sdangs byed dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-15: sbed dang rdeng med gzhi med dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-16: skyes pa med par lam 'gro ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-18: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-19: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas der bsod snyoms brgyus te 'phong gi dpong sa mthong nas de der zhugs pa dang 'phong gi slob dpon ni med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-20: khye'u dag 'khod nas des khye'u dag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366a-25: bu dag legs te khyed kyis sgyu rtsal mchog la brgal te bltas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-0: g-yon 'phongs dang g-yas @366b 'phongs dang mda' lnga 'phong ba byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-1: de dag gis g-yon 'phongs dang g-yas 'phongs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-2: mda' lnga 'phang ba bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-3: de lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-4: bzhin sgyur bar byed do; ;de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-5: 'phags pa ci'i slad du phyag gnyis 'dril bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-8: da dung khyed cag gi slob dpon gyis kyang mi shes na khyed dag gis lta shes par 'gyur re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-10: 'phags pa 'di la mkhyen pa cung zad mnga'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-12: sa'i steng na kho bos mi shes pa'i bzo'i gnas dang las kyi ga nas gang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-15: g-yon 'phongs dang g-yas 'phongs dang mda' lnga 'phang ba mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-18: de dag gis gzhu phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-20: gzhu 'di ras bal gyi gzhu 'dras gzhan 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-21: de dag gis gzhu gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-24: gzhu 'di dag kyang ras bal gyi gzhu 'dras khyed kyi slob dpon gyi gzhu 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-25: de dag gis slob dpon gyi gzhu phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-27: 'di yang tshod yod pa zhig go zhes gzhu de ras bal gyi gzhu bzhin du brdungs te sgra sbrengs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:366b-28: steng gi nam mkha' la bya rog gi tshogs rgyu bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-0: ji ltar je bya rog 'di'i rkub tu bsnun la khar dbyung bar bya @367a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-2: 'on te khar bsnun la rkub tu dbyung bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-4: 'phags pa rkub tu bsnun la khar dbyung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-6: shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mda' gcig 'phangs shing lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la yang mda' re re 'phangs pa dang bya rog des kha gyen du phyogs te 'gro bar brtsams pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-7: 'char kas de'i phyi bzhin mda' gcig 'phangs pas rkub tu bsnun te khar byung nas bya rog des la lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-8: de dag ya mtshan skye nas sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-10: bu dag bzo 'di ltar bslab par bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-11: yang na slob dpon gzhan btsal bar bya'i 'bras bu med pa'i sbun pa 'phyar zhing 'khod de ci rung zhes smras te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-12: de dag sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-13: ci tsam na de dag gi slob dpon 'ongs nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-14: khye'u dag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-15: g-yon 'phongs dang g-yas 'phongs dang mda' lnga 'phang ba byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-16: de dag lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-17: bzhin sgyur bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367a-19: khye'u dag sngon ma byung ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba 'di lta bu byung na 'dir 'ga' zhig 'ongs par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-0: mda' lnga 'phangs pa @367b bgyis nas bya rog 'di'i rkub tu bsnun nas khar phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-2: khye'u dag byang chub sems dpas 'phong gi dpong sa gang du 'phong bslab par gyur ba der des kyang bslabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-3: gal te de rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu 'phong gi slob dpon mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-4: 'on kyang kho bos ci shes pa re zhig kho bo las slobs la lhag ma gzhan las slobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-6: de yang dang yang du bdag la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-7: bdag gis de mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas des khye'u de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-8: khye'u dag khyed cag phyogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-9: phyogs mtshams rnams su btsun pa 'char ka'i sgra'i tshogs snyan pa rgya chen po grags pa 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-13: gang gi tshe 'phags pa 'char ka bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis bya rog gi ro 'di smyug ma ring po'i rtse mo la thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-14: de'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su song la mi'o cog la 'di skad ces 'phags pa 'char kas mda' lnga 'phang ba 'di lta bu byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-15: bya rog 'di'i rkub tu bsnun nas khar phyung ba la ltos shig ces sgrogs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-16: gal te phyir log cig ces zer na yang ma log cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-17: phyi de nyin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:367b-18: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-0: khye'u de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis bya rog gi ro de smyug ma ring po'i @368a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-1: rtse mo la btags te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i phyi bzhin du rjes su song nas mi'o cog la 'di skad ces 'phags pa 'char kas mda' lnga 'phang ba 'di lta bu byas pas bya rog 'di'i rkub tu ba snun nas khar phyung ba la ltos zhes bsgrags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-2: 'char kas de dag mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-3: khye'u dag ci'i phyir kho bo la mtho 'tsham par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-5: 'on kyang de dag phyir ma log par de skad sgrogs par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni srog gcod par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-6: srog gcod pa las ma log /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-8: so sor ma spangs pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-9: shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong sems can gang gi pags pa yang dgos par mi rung sha dang rgyus pa dang rus pa yang dgos par mi rung ba 'di lta bu yang gsod par byed pa la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-10: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems shes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba @368b la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-1: 'char ka khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-5: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-6: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-7: yang dge slong gang bsams bzhin du dud 'gro skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags gsod na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-8: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-9: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-10: bsams bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rnam par brtags nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-11: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags zhes bya ba ni bya rog gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-12: gsod na zhes bya ba ni de'i srog gcod par byed na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:368b-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-1: yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-2: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-4: bdag nyid kyis ni zin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-5: phyi rol tu ni 'phangs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-6: gnyi ga dang ni ldan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-7: sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-8: ji ltar bdag nyid kyis zin pas she na dge slong gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can la gsad pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam nas sor mo gcig gis snun par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-9: de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-10: des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu ni dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-11: des de'i tshe yang ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-12: des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-13: dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369a-14: sor mo gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas sor mo gnyis kyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369b-0: tha na rkang pa'i mthe bos snun par byed cing de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge @369b slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369b-1: des de'i tshe ma yin kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369b-3: dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369b-4: des de'i tshe yang ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369b-5: des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes byas su 'gyur te de ltar bdag nyid kyis zin pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:369b-6: ji ltar phyi rol tu 'phangs pas she na dge slong gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can la gsad pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas mdas snun par byed cing de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:378b-0: tshe dang ldan pa dag chu klung gnas can gyi ngogs su chu'i don du 'dong zhing des khrus kyang @378b bya'o zhes de dag la chu tshags dang chu bum thogs te chu klung gnas can ga la ba der dong nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-9: ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje dang 'dra bas nyon mongs pa rnams ni ye shes kyis 'joms so zhes gsungs pa de ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-10: rgyal po thos pa nyung bas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-11: phreng ldan mas kyang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-12: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa dag chu la phyar g-yeng gis rtse ba de ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-13: de ni gnas med do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-14: de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas mi zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-15: kye nang rje khyod tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-16: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:379b-17: kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la 'di skad btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i mchid nas btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag chab la phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar bgyis pas rgyal po glo ba mi dga' bar sems na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-0: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'phags pa @380a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-1: dag chab la phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar mi 'gyur ba dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' bar mdzad na legs so zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-2: mi des jo mo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes btsun mo phreng ldan ma las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-3: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-5: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-6: btsun pa btsun mo phreng ldan ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-7: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang khyod bde bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-8: btsun pa btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i mchid nas 'phags pa 'di dag chab la phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar bgyid pas rgyal po glo ba mi dga' bar sems na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-9: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'phags pa dag chab la phyar g-yeng gis rtse bar mi 'gyur ba'i dran pa bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-11: de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-0: zhes bya ba @380b la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa mdzad pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcu bdun sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-3: dge slong dag khyed chu la phyar g-yeng gis rtse ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-6: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-9: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-10: chu la rtse na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-11: chu la rtse na zhes bya ba ni chu la rtse ba'i bsam pas lus kyi las dang lus kyi spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-12: lus kyi g-yo ba byed na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-14: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-17: gzhan yag ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:380b-18: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-1: ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na gzhi dgu las te rtse bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-4: rtsed mo byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-6: dga' bar byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-9: lus bsgyur bar bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-10: de la ji ltar rtse bar bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-11: dge slong gis chu la rtse ba'i bsam pas khri las ldang bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-14: 'gro bar byed cing gos dag bzhag nas khrus ras gyon par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-15: chur 'jug par byed cing 'og tu nub par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-16: steng du 'byung bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-17: sim par 'dod pa'i bsam pas ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-18: tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du 'gro bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-19: pha rol gyi 'gram nas tshu rol gyi 'gram du 'ongs na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-20: rgal ba'i bsam pas ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-21: rgyun phyogs su rtsol na ltung byed du 'gyur ro; ;rgyun las ldog phyogs su rtsol na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-22: slob pa'i bsam pas ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-23: chu la rnga bo che rdung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-24: chu la rdza rnga kha gcig pa rdung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-26: chu la khor yug byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-27: chu la rdo rje byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-28: chu la chu srubs 'dren na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381a-29: tha na chu la bem tol gyis brdeg na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-0: dge slong gis bum pa dang phru ba @381b dang ril ba dang kham phor du chu la rnga bo che rdung bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-1: chu la rdza rnga kha gcig pa rdung bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-2: tha na bem tol gyis rdeg na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-3: dge slong gis sran tshod dang 'u sha dang thang tsha bar chu la rnga bo che rdung bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-4: rdza rnga kha gcig pa rdung bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-5: tha na bem tol gyis rdeg na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-6: grangs par 'dod pa'i bsam pas ni ltung ba med de de ltar rtse bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-8: rtser gzhug go snyam pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-10: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-11: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-12: chu la rtse ba'i ltung byed de drug cu bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-16: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing rnam par grol ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba'i tshe de 'di snyam du sems te bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag la phan pa mdzad pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-17: bde bar gshegs pa de ni bdag la legs pa mdzad pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-18: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po sel bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:381b-19: bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po sgrub par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-1: ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mang po sel bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-2: bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi dge ba'i chos mang po sgrub par mdzad pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-3: bdag gis de la ci zhig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-4: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-6: rab tu byas par 'gyur snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-7: yang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-9: bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni sems can gyi don gyi phyir yin pas bdag gis kyang gdul ba'i bya ba cung zhig bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa phye ma bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-11: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-14: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-15: btsun pa bdag ljongs rgyur mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382a-17: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-0: ma 'gags pa khyod song la sems can ma rgal ba @382b rnams ni sgrol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-1: ma grol ba rnams ni khrol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-2: dbugs ma byin pa rnams ni dbugs phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-3: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-5: rjes su yi rang ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-8: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-9: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-10: phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-11: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-12: ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-15: de la bu gnyis dang bu mo gcig yod nas des bu de gnyis kyi khyim phub cing bu mo de yang bag mar btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-16: dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de yang dus la bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-17: de'i bu mo de yang khyo shi bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-18: ming po gnyis kyi khyim du gnas par brtsams shing de skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:382b-19: ri brags de na de'i ming po de gnyis gtso bor grags pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-1: gnyis 'ga' zhig dang lhan cig 'thab pa de'i tshe na 'thab zla de na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-3: khyed gnyis kyi sring mo skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-4: de gnyis dong ste sring mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-5: sring mo kho bo cag gnyis mi dang 'thab pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-6: de na re khyed gnyis kyang smra'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-7: khyed gnyis kyi sring mo skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-9: ming po gnyis bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags na skye bo rdzun ma dag bdag la skur bar mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-10: dus gzhan zhig na de la sems can zhugs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-11: mngal na gnas pa'i mtshan ma dag kyang byung nas ming po gnyis kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-13: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-14: skye bo rdzun ma dag skur bar mchi'o zhes zer na 'di ga las byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-16: ming po gnyis 'di ni sems can spyi rdol can zhig nan gyis bdag gi mngal du zhugs pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-17: dus gzhan zhig na de btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags te khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed pa na de dag 'di snyam du sems te khye'u 'di ma btsas pa kho na nas mas spyi rdol can zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tu brjod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383a-18: khye'u 'di'i ming spyi rdol can du gdags so zhes khye'u de'i ming spyi rdol can zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-0: de'i ma yang spyi rdol can gyi ma @383b zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-1: ming po gnyis kyis de gnas gzhan du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-2: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin nas des der bsti gnas brnyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-3: khye'u dag cig rtse zhing 'khod pa de dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-4: 'phags pa spyi rdol can gyi ma la bsti gnas g-yor cag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-5: de khyod la bsti gnas 'bul bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-6: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas de der song ste bsti gnas brnyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-7: des de la bsti gnas phul te stan bshams nas 'dir bzhugs shig ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-8: de der 'dug pa dang des de'i rkang pa bkru ba'i chu khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-10: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-11: kho bo ni bud med kyis rkang pa mi 'khru'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-13: rab tu byung ba dag la 'di lta bu'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa yod do snyam nas des de'i rkang pa bsku ba khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-15: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-16: kho bo ni bud med kyis rkang pa mi skud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-18: rab tu byung ba dag la 'di lta bu'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa yod do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-19: des zan khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa; 'phags pa bshos gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-20: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:383b-21: kho bo ni dus ma yin par mi za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-0: rab tu byung ba dag la brtul zhugs 'di lta bu yang dag par blangs @384a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-2: des de'i mal bshams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-3: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas mal der skyil mo krung bcas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-4: lus drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-6: bud med kyi g-yo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-7: bud med kyi gya gyu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-8: bud med kyi ya yo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-9: bud med kyi sgyu gang dag yin pa de dag nye bar bstan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-10: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dbang po dag 'bebs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-12: 'di chad pas re zhig nyal du bcug ste nam phyed na 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-13: de nam phyed na song ste de bzhin du bud med kyi g-yo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-14: bud med kyi gya gyu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-15: bud med kyi ya yo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-16: bud med kyi sgyu gang dag yin pa de dag bstan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-17: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas dbang po dag 'bebs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-19: skyes bu 'di lta bu dang ni shin tu thag ring du song yang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa bya ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-20: gang gis 'di bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ba'i thabs des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-21: bud med kyi yul gyi rig pa ni dug yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-22: bdag gis 'khyud na 'di bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam nas des 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384a-23: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang pa ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-0: char 'bebs pa dang glog @384b 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-1: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-2: bud med de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-3: yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-5: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-6: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bud med de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-7: de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te stan shin tu dma' ba zhig blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-8: chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-9: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:384b-10: khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos na bud med des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par byas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-2: byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs dag gis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-3: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-4: rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-5: ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-6: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-13: btsun pa ma 'gags pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-14: btsun pa ma 'gags pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-15: chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-16: bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-19: sring mo dam tshig gis bza' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-20: gal te sgo bcad te sbyin par byed na bza'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-21: des smras pa chab sgo bkum ste gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-22: des de nyid kyi mtshan mo kha zas sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385a-23: nang par sngar langs te stan bshams nas sgo bcad de gdugs tshod la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-0: tshe dang ldan pa @385b ma 'gags pa bde bar 'dug par rig nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-2: rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang gza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-3: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-4: lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan chos dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-5: de'i tshe na de'i ming po gnyis mi zhig dang lhan cig 'thab mo byung ba na mi de na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-7: khyed gnyis kyi sring mo ya mtshan can sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i mchod sbyin byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-8: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong yang ma btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-9: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong khar tsang zhugs na da dung yang ma byung ngo zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-11: bdag cag gnyis gang cung zad mis brnyas par gyur pa thams cad ni 'di'i le lan yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-12: de gsod du 'dong ngo snyam nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste de'i khyim ga la ba der logs su phyogs te brgyugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-13: srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ltad mo skyes pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-14: kha cig sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-15: de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin phyir bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-17: sring mo kho bo phyir 'byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:385b-19: de phyir byung ba dang des sgo bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386a-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas ngang pa'i rgyal @386a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386a-9: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386a-13: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu; kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386a-14: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386a-15: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-0: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu @386b sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-1: kha cig gis ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-2: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-3: 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang chos la 'bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-4: dge 'dun la bab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas 'khor de la chos bstan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-8: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-10: ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba na skyed mos chal zhig yod pa der mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go /
