K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-18: des smras pa khyod su zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:386b-21: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:387a-2: de na dmag dpon gang yin pa de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa sngon khyim na gnas pa'i bran du gyur cing tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas 'phong gi dpong sa gang du bslab pa der des kyang bslabs shing de gcad pa la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:387a-3: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa khyim nas rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na de yang chom rkun pa'i nang du zhugs te chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i dmag dpon du gyur pas des de skad las tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ngo shes nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:387a-4: 'phags pa ma 'gags pa ma lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:387a-5: bzhin bzang skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:387a-6: des smras pa shes ldan dag 'di ma gsad cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:387a-7: 'di ni mi skal ba bzang po rab tu byung ba yin te 'di'i ming gis tshong ba dag rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang gru bo che legs par grub ste 'ong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:389a-5: deng la de nyid du zhog cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-15: sgo phyi rol nas gcod par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-16: srung ba dge slong 'jog par mi byed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-17: skya rengs shar na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-18: khyim thab kyis bsrungs na ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-19: dge slong ba lang gi lhas sam phyugs lhas su nyal na dge slong des phyogs de re lde dag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-21: yol ba dag gis bskor bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393a-22: srung ba dge slong gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-0: @393b phyogs der re lde dag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-2: yol ba dag gis bskor bar mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-3: srung ba dge slong 'jog par mi byed na ji srid du skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la; skya rengs shar na yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-5: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-6: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-7: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-8: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-9: nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te des 'dul ba'i bya ba de snyed bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-11: dge slong dag rigs kyi bu ma 'gags pa nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-12: rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-13: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-14: ma 'gags pa nyid kyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-15: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:393b-18: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-2: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-3: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-4: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-5: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-7: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-11: 'di de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur nas ri brags shig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa de na 'di zhal ta byed par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-12: de lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas kyang lnga brgya yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-13: ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang phal cher de la mngon par dad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-14: dus gzhan zhig na de na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-15: de la lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-16: mkhan po khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' zhig thob pa mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394a-19: mkhan po smon lam ji ltar btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-0: kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i @394b khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-2: zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-3: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-4: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nges par skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du lung bstan pa de'i gsung rab la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-6: bdag cag kyang mkhan po la brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-7: bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyid par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-8: ri brags de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs des de ltar 'phags pa na'o zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-9: de dag de'i gan du song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-10: 'phags pas yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' zhig thob pa mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-12: 'phags pas smon lam ji ltar btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:394b-13: kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @395a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-1: sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-3: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nges par skal pa dang ldan pa nyid du lung bstan pa de'i gsung rab la bdag rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-8: bdag cag kyang 'phags pa la brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-9: bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la bden pa dag mthong bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-10: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'gags pa 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-11: 'dis der chos dang ldan pas zhal ta byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-12: nor mang po longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-13: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-15: nye gnas lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-16: 'di dag gis der smon lam de skad btab pa'i dbang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395a-17: da ltar ma 'gags pa la brten te nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-0: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon @395b sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus na ri brags de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-2: da ltar ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-3: 'di dag gis der smon lam de skad btab pa'i dbang gis da ltar ma 'gags pa la brten te nga'i gsung rab la bden pa dag mthong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-4: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-5: las de'i rnam par smin pas lha'i mig dang ldan par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-6: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal ba chen po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-7: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-9: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-10: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-12: des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po mdzes pas de'i mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa rgyar dpag tshad gcig pa 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:395b-13: des de la dus ston bya ba yang bshams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-0: der dus ston la bab pa na chom rkun pa 'joms par 'dod pa lnga brgya der lhags nas de na chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyi lham ral nas de dang ha cang mi ring ba @396a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-1: na dri gtsang khang 'dug pa de na mar me'i 'od tshod du mi gsal bar chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon des mthong nas de dri gtsang khang der zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-2: lham brub par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-3: mar me'i 'od tshod du mi gsal bar 'bar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-4: des mar me'i snying po bskul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-5: mar me de shin tu 'od gsal bar 'bar bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-6: ji tsam na des sku gzugs mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-7: mthong nas kyang de shin tu dad pa skyes nas des dbyig gis mchod pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-8: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag lha'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-9: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma 'gags pa 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-10: 'dis mar me'i snying po bskul cing sems dad pa bskyed pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lha'i mig dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-11: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-12: dge slong dag de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-13: gang du smon lam btab ce na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-14: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal ba chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396a-15: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-0: bde bar gshegs @396b pa; 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-1: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste de w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-2: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong gang gis de rab tu byung ba'i dge slong de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-3: de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-4: bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs ba'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-7: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:396b-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-0: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan @397a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-1: 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-2: zhes nges pa nyid du lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-3: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-4: ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-7: sh'akya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-8: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-9: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-10: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-12: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-13: dge slong dag de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397a-14: bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed de drug cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi @397b tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-1: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos nye bar 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-2: rdzogs par bsnyen par byas pa de'i tshe na de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-5: de nas 'char kas de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-6: bcu bdun sde dag tshur shog 'di dang 'di gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-8: khyod kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-12: glen pa dag 'o na gzhan ci byed ces des de dag gnya' ba dag nas bzung ste bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-14: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag drug sde dag gis gang cung zad brnyas par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni bdag cag thos pa nyung ba las gyur pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-15: bdag cag thos pa 'dzin du 'dong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-16: des na phyin chad drug sde dag la cung zad kyang dri bar mi bya'o zhes de dag dge slong zhig gi gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-17: btsun pa bdag cag klog tu stsol cig //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-18: des de dag la thabs yin no zhes smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-19: de dag gis de las bklag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:397b-21: btsun pa 'char ka bcu bdun sde dag de bar bdag cag la sten par mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-0: de dag kho bos bskrad nas thos pa @398a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-2: btsun pa 'char ka khyod kyis bdag cag gi sbrul nya la ba lcag gis gzhus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-3: ji srid du glen pa de dag thos pa nyung bar gyur pa de srid du de dag bdag cag la sten par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-6: gang gi tshe de dag mang du thos par gyur cing mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-9: gdug cing pha rol gnon par gyur pa de'i tshe na de dag bdag cag la gnod pa bya bar sems par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-11: kho bo ci nas kyang de dag gis ma rtogs pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-12: rtogs pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-13: bcu bdun sde dag me khang du mar me btsugs te kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-14: ci tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la ba zhig spu phyir bstan te gyon nas me khang du zhugs te mar me bsad nas 'byung po'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-15: de dag sdangs cing skrag nas me khang nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-17: de dag slob dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-18: gzhon nu dag ci'i phyir kha ton mi byed par kha rog ste 'khod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398a-20: slob dpon bdag cag mi ma lags pas gtses so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-0: rgyal byed kyi tshal gnod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas rtag tu mi stong bas 'di na mi ma yin pa yod re @398b skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-1: lhung bzed nag po can gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag bsdigs so snyam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-2: gzhon nu dag khyed cag mi ma yin pa de 'dzin par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-6: gzhon nu dag me khang gi grva bzhir mar me btsugs te rdza mas khob la dbus su mar me btsugs te kha ton gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-7: gal te de 'ongs te dbus kyi mar me bsad nas 'byung po'o 'byung po'o zhes zer ba na sgo chod la me khang gi grva bzhi'i mar me phye la zung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-8: de dag gis de ltar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-9: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la ba zhig spu phyir bstan te gyon nas me khang du zhugs te dbus kyi mar me bsad nas 'byung po'o 'byung po'o zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-10: de dag gis sgo bcad nas me khang gi grva bzhi'i mar me phye ste bzung nas brdeg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-14: khyod kyi snying lam na 'char ka kho bo cag gi grogs yin pas de yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-15: zhes byas na btang bar 'gyur snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-16: shi drod kyis ma bzung gi bar du mi gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-18: tshe dang ldan pa dag mi ma yin pa shin tu chen po zhig bsad kyang nyes pa sbom por 'gyur bar zad pas bdag cag gi ltung ba mthol zhing bshags par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:398b-19: te por brdeg go zhes de dag gis te por gtal te btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-2: de phyi de nyin par lus dag 'bru mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas khri la nyal zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-3: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos ku re cung zhig byas na nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-8: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-9: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-10: khyod dge slong la sdangs par byed du rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-11: gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-12: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong la sngangs par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-14: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-18: 'char ka khyod dge slong la sngangs par byed pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399a-21: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-0: @399b tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-2: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-3: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no; ;nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-4: yang dge slong gang dge slong la sngangs par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-5: sdangs par byed du 'jug na tha na bzhad gad bya bar bsams kyang rung ste ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-6: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-7: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-8: sngangs par byed dam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-9: sngangs par byed du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-10: tha na bzhad gad bya bar bsams kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni tha na ku re bya bar bsams kyang rung ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-11: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-12: ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:399b-15: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:400a-0: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong @400a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:400a-3: lus srul po gzugs la ba nag po dang sol ba dang ka ba tshig pa lta bu gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba dag yod de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-1: skyo bar bya ba'i ched du sems can dmyal ba'i gtam dang dud 'gro'i gtam dang yi dvags kyi gtam dang lha'i gtam dang mi'i gtam zer ba la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-3: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-4: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-5: sdangs par byed pa'i ltung byed do drug cu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-9: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po nye bar 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-10: rdzogs par bsnyen par byas pa de'i tshe na de dag drug sde dag la sten par byed bsnyen par byed bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-11: khyim bdag zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-12: drug sde dag dang bcu bdun sde dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:401b-13: de na lam ka na rdzing bu chus gang ba zhig 'dug nas drug sde dag gis bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-0: bcu bdun sde dag kye ma khyed cag dang kho bo cag lhan cig shin tu 'gran pa @402a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-1: yin na tshur sheg yu bu cag chu'i nang du gang yun ring du nub cing 'dug sus phod pa lta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-3: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad chur zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-4: nye dga' chu nas byung ste bcu bdun sde dag gi gos dag sa 'bus pa zhig gi 'og tu sbas te bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-5: drug sde dag myur ba myur bar rdzing bu nas byung ste gos dag gyon nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-6: bcu bdun sde dag chu'i steng du byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-7: drug sde dag mi snang nas de dag gis bdag cag pham par byas na mi rung ngo zhes de dag yang chu'i 'og tu zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-8: de dag yang dang yang du steng du byung ste bltas na drug sde dag mi snang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-9: de dag da dung yang chu'i 'og tu 'dug go snyam nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-10: tshe dang ldan pa dag drug sde dag gis gos dag sbas te 'dong ngo zhes bgros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-11: ji tsam na gos gcig kyang mi snang nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-12: tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis bdag cag la mtho btsams so zhes de dag rdzing bu nas byung ste mtha' gcig na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-13: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis 'khor lnga brgya dang ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-14: ji tsam na rgyal byed kyi tshal stong par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402a-16: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gar gshegs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-0: khyim bdag zhig gi spyan @402b drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-2: skol cag gnyis kyang der bzhud la bsod snyoms gsol lo zhes de gnyis dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-3: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcu bdun sde dag rdzing bu'i 'gram na rtse zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-4: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-5: slob ma rnams kyi 'byor ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-6: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-7: bdag gi mchid mi nyan pas bdag gis ji ltar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-8: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-9: gzhon nu dag gdugs tshod yol na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-13: drug sde dag gis bdag cag gi rad pa dag sbas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-14: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos ci khyer te dong ngam 'on te 'di nyid du sbas te bzhag snyam du bsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-15: de ji tsam na de nyid du sbas te bzhag par mthong nas des blangs te de dag la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-16: bcu bdun sde dag gos dag gyon te der dong ba dang tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis dge slong dag la bshugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-17: bcu bdun sde dag kyang dge slong dag bshug par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-18: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:402b-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ni 'dul ba'i bya ba byas te 'ong ba yin pas de gnyis kyis re zhig dge slong dag bshugs pa ni rigs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-1: khyed cag gis ci zhig byas na da 'dir lhags te dge slong dag bshug par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te kho bo cag la mkhan pos ma dgongs su zin na kho bo cag gi zan gcad par byas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-5: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dge slong gi gos dag sbed par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-7: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-11: dge slong dag khyed dge slong dag gi gos dag sbed pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:403a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-1: las dag la brtson par gyur pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin no snyam nas yang dang yang du de lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-2: de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-3: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-4: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-5: chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-6: de'i tshe na dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis kyis phyag dar khrod cig rnyed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-7: de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang tshe rabs tshe rabs su kho na byung ste rtag tu klan ka tshol ba la brtson pa yin pas mdza' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-8: sa las skyes phyag dar khrod rnyed pa ni gang du 'khrur gzhug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-9: sa las skyes kyis smras pa; rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can ni rgyun lugs nyung zhing nye 'khor gtsang ba yin pas der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-10: de gnyis phyag dar khrod khyer te rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-11: de gnyis kyis phyag dar khrod der 'khrur bcug nas nyi ma la bting ste 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-12: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis chos gos kyi grva rlung gis bskyod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-13: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog gi mgo la reg go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-14: de mdza' bos mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408a-15: sa las skyes gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-0: 'dong @408b la dge slong rnams la brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-1: sa las skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-2: tshe dang ldan pa mdza' bo de'i tshe yang re zhig bdag cag gnyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-3: ci da yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed du 'jud par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-5: tshe dang ldan pa sa las skyes de'i tshe na ni yang dag pa ma yin pas yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-6: da ni yang dag pas yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis lan du zhes bya ba ni skra dag dang de dang 'brel ba'i gos yin no zhes ma gsungs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'di la brdzun du smra ba ga la yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-9: tshur shog 'dong la dge slong rnams la brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-10: sa las skyes de mdza' bos bslus pa na btub par gyur nas de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-11: dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-13: 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma byung ba mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-14: 'di la bdag cag gnyis gang gi dad pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-16: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:408b-17: tshe dang ldan pa gnyis ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-0: khyed gnyis lha dang mi rnams gcig tu yongs su btang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang dud 'gro rnams su gcig tu gnas sam ci na dge slong dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par ston pa de la khyed gnyis gzhi med pa'i dge 'dun @409a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-1: lhag ma'i chos kyis skur ba 'debs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni bdag cag gnyis kyis ma nyes kyi 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyi mig dag gis mthong bas mig dbyung bar bya grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la ci zhig mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-7: khyed gnyis don ci la der song bas der mthong zhes legs par rab tu gleng bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-8: brtag par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-9: dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis la ci zhig mthong ji ltar mthong gang du mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-10: khyed gnyis ci'i phyir der song bas der mthong zhes legs par rab tu gleng zhing brtags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-11: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis legs par rab tu gleng zhing brtags pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-13: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-14: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ma byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-15: 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'dun pas smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-16: zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'jigs pas smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-17: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis bskur ba 'debs bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409a-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di @409b dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-1: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-4: dge slong dag khyed gnyis khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-5: dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur ba 'debs pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-8: tshul dang mthun pa yin de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-10: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-12: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-13: yang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:409b-14: dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-0: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni mdza' bo @410a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-2: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-3: khros shing zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs shing ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-4: zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni yid mi dga' bar gyur nas te 'khrugs pa ma bsal bar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-5: dge slong dag pa zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ram gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-6: ltung ba med pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi 'di'i ltung ba med pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-7: gzhi med par zhes bya ba ni gzhi gsum po mthong ba'i gzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-9: dogs pa'i gzhi med par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-10: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis zhes bya ba ni bcu gsum po gang yang rung ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-11: de ni chos ma yin par chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-12: skur na zhes bya ba ni skur ba 'debs na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-14: dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-17: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-18: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-19: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-20: gang zag dag pa la skur ba 'debs pa la gzhi bcus ni ltung bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-21: gzhi lngas ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-22: ji ltar gzhi bcus ltung bar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410a-25: mi dogs par des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-3: lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-5: bdag dogs so zhes zer na brjod do cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-6: des thos la de yang brjed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-7: de dogs la de yang brjed bzhin du 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang 'dod pa dang blo gros dang rtog pa dang lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis thos te de yang ma brjed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-8: bdag dogs te de yang ma brjed do zhes zer na brjod do cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-14: de ltar gzhi bcus ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-15: ji ltar gzhi lngas ltung bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:410b-18: mi dogs pa la des 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-0: ji ltar gang zag ma dag pa la skur pa 'debs pa la gzhi bcu gcig gis ltung bar 'gyur la gzhi drug gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du gang @412a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-1: zag ma dag pa dag pa ltar bcos pa la skur pa 'debs pa la yang gzhi bcu gcig gis ltung bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-2: gzhi drug gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-3: dril bsgrags pa la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-4: ngos la ri mor bris pa phan chad la yang ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-5: ji ltar bdag gis shes pa bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-8: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-9: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-10: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed de drug cu dgu pa rdzogs so;; ;;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-11: rgyal po'i khab na tha ga pa spyi cer zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des mnyan yod pa'i tha ga pa zhig gi bu mo bag mar blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-12: de bu mo de la yang dang yang du khu tshur dang thal lcag gis rdeg par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-13: de'i sdum tshes bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-14: bu mo de bud med rgan mo de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-15: yum bdag la khyim bdag 'di yang dang yang du khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg bar bgyid pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412a-18: bu mo khyod la ji srid du bu ma btsas pa de srid du khyod la khyim bdag 'dis rdeg par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-0: gang gi tshe khyed la bu btsas @412b par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'di khyod la byams par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-1: ma 'bros par sdod cig dang kho mos bzlog par bya'o zhes bud med rgan mo des tha ga par spyi cer la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-2: bu khyod bu mo 'di la yang dang yang du khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg pas 'di bros par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-4: tha ga pa de de ltar bud med rgan mo des bzlog kyang ma btub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-5: phyin chad yang dang yang du bu mo de la khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-6: de nas dus gzhan zhig na tha ga pa de tshong khang du chang 'thungs te ra ro nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-7: des bu mo de shin tu brdegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-9: bdag bu btsas par ma gyur gyi bar skabs su 'dis gsad par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-10: bdag la bu med kyang blas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-12: bu mo des tha ga pa de gnyid log par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-13: sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-14: dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'phags pa de yang sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-15: bu mo des dge slong de mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:412b-20: bdag kyang mnyan yon du mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-3: bu mo de dge slong de dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-4: ji tsam na tha ga pa spyi cer ra ro ba sangs te sad nas bu mo de mi snang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-5: de bud med rgan mo'i gan du song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-6: yum bu mo de mi snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-8: bu kho mos dang po nyid nas khyod la de bros par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-9: ma rdegs shig ces ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-10: de bros te song pa snyam gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-12: tha ga pa de song ste sgo ba la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-13: kye nang rje'i sgo 'di nas bu mo zhig phyir byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-15: sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-16: tha ga pa der ba las 'dzegs te phyi bzhin bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-17: ji tsam na thag ring po kho na nas song ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-18: de myur ba myur bar babs te bsnyags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-19: ji tsam na dge slong zhig dang lhan cig 'gro ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-21: bdag ni gcig pu yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-22: 'di gnyis ni gnyis yin pas gal te de bzung na 'di gnyis log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-23: bdag rdeg par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-24: gang gi tshe grogs rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe na gzung bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-25: de de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-26: ji tsam na ri brags zhig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-27: ri brags de na tha ga pa lnga brgya tsam 'khod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-28: tha ga pa spyi cer song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413a-29: shes ldan dag khyed kho bo'i nye du yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-0: kho bo'i chung mar sh'akya'i bu'i dge @413b sbyong gis phrogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-1: de la grogs kyis zhig ces ra mda' 'dog tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-2: tha ga pa dag ni yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-3: de dag gis thags zangs lnga brgya tsam thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-4: ri brags nas phyir byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-5: de dag gis dge slong de shin tu brdegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-7: phor bu dang 'khar ba yang bcag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-8: chos gos dag kyang ral nas shi'o snyam du bsams te bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-9: bu mo des dge slong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-10: 'phags pa khyed cag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang pa thob pa lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-11: rgyal po'i gan du bzhud de gsungs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-12: 'di dag gi lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcod du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-13: de dag skrag nas dge slong de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-14: 'phags pa bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-15: dge slong gi snying ni mar dang 'dra bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-16: des smras pa bzod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-18: gal te 'phags pas bzod kyang bdag gis mi bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-19: de dag gis bu mo de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-20: sring mo khyod bdag cag gi nye du yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-21: khyod kyis kyang bzod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-23: khyed cag la ni bzod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-24: tha ga pa spyi cer 'di la mi bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-25: bdag gis 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:413b-27: 'di la yang bzod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-0: dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste gal te @414a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-1: phyin chad bdag la mi rdeg na bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-2: tha ga pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-5: gal te de ltar na bzod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-6: dge slong de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-7: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-10: ji lta bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-11: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-12: kho bo tha ga pa dag gis had por srog dang de'u phral lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-13: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-14: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-15: khyod skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gror rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-16: gang gi phyir 'gror mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung ngo; ;dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gro zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-18: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-0: @414b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-1: dge slong khyod skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gro ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-4: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-6: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-8: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-10: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-11: yang dge slong gang skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gro na tha na grong bar du yang rung ste ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-12: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-14: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-15: skyes pa med par zhes bya ba ni de dang de'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-16: bud med dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos sten nus pa dang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-17: mgron lam du 'gro na zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du 'gro na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:414b-18: tha na grong bar du yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-0: tha na rgyang grags kyi bar du yang rung @415a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dvags ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-5: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-8: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-9: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gro na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-10: rgyang grags kyis bar du chod pa'i grong bdun las grong nas dgon par 'gro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-11: rgyang grags phyed phyed du ni nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-12: rgyang grags re rer ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-13: dgon pa nas grong du 'gro na yang rgyang grags phyed phyed du ni nyes byas su 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-14: rgyang grags re rer ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-15: bud med bsel byed du 'dzud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-16: lam nor ba bud med kyis lam du 'dzud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-17: 'gro mi nus pa bud med kyis khrid pa la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-19: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-20: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-21: bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-23: rku dang nyi shu ma lon dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415a-24: rko dang mgron dang bslab pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-0: mi @415b gus chang 'thung dus min pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-2: dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas su dbyar gnas par khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-3: de nas dge slong de dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-4: chos gos byas pa dang ldan chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'phags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-6: mnyan yod du 'gro ba'i don mthun btsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-7: des tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-13: shes ldan dag kho bo yang khyed cag dang lhan cig mnyan yod du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-16: de dag gis thabs yin no zhes byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-19: 'phags pa bdag cag ni tshong ba sho gam 'dral ba dag lags pas dus su yang mchi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-20: dus ma yin par yang mchi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-22: shul gol bar yang mchi bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-23: khyod kyis bdag cag dang lhan cig bzhud mi spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:415b-25: ci khyed cag stong par 'dong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-3: khyed cag khur dag gis 'dong na kho bo stong par 'gro bas ci'i phyir khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'gro mi nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-5: gal te spyod na bzhud kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-6: phyogs 'dir bzhud la bdag cag ma mchis kyi bar du gzhes shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-7: der song ste bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-8: ji tsam na tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag 'ongs nas de de dag dang lhan cig 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-9: ji tsam na ri brags shig tu sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-10: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag sho gam gcod pa dag gis 'jigs pas lam gol ba nas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-11: dge slong de yang mdun du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-12: de dag lam gol ba nas 'dong ba na de dag sho gam pa dag gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-14: kva'e tshong pa sho gam 'dral bdag gar 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-15: de dag gis dge slong de mdun du 'gro ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-17: shes ldan dag tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba 'di dag gis ma nyes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-18: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong mdun du 'gro ba 'dis nyes kyi 'di gsad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-19: zhes de dag gis dge slong de shin tu brdegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-20: lhung bzed kyang bcag phor bu dang 'khar ba dag kyang bcag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416a-21: chos gos dag kyang bral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-0: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag gis dge @416b slong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-1: 'phags pa khyed kyis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob pa lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-2: rgyal po'i gan du bzhud de gsungs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-3: sho gam pa 'di dag gi lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-4: rkang pa dag gcod du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-5: sho gam pa de dag skrag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-6: dge slong de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-7: 'phags pa bdag cag la bzod par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-8: dge slong gi sems ni zhun mar dang 'dra bas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-10: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-11: gal te 'phags pas bzod kyang bdag cag gis mi bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-12: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-13: khyed cag kyang bzod pa gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-14: sho gam 'dral ba dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-15: dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-16: khyed cag sho gam pa ji snyed pa dag gis kho bo cag tshong pa ji snyed pa dag sho gam 'jal du mi 'jug na kho bo cag gis kyang bzod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-17: sho gam pa de dag gis tshong pa de dag la gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-18: dge slong de yang mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-19: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-20: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-22: ji lta bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-23: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-24: kho bo sho gam pa dag gis had por de'u gsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-25: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:416b-26: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-1: rkun ma dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gror rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-2: gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-3: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gro zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-5: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-9: dge slong khyod don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig mgron lam du 'gro ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-12: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-14: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-15: zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-007-001:417a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
